detail: Glistening white petals wet with crystalline drops of morning dew. A floral bouquet of precious ethically harvested tuberose awakened by the delicate touch of morning sunlight. A magical and extraordinary moment to treasure.

name: rose-gipsy
detail: Rose Gipsy is a fragrance whose name conveys the image of a dancing rose with swirls of petals unfurled like a fabulous dress. A delicate and poetic olfactory creation  in which the rose reveals its identity before being gathered at the height of its refinement and perfection.

name: gelsomino-nobile-2
detail: Gelsomino Nobile is an elegant and delicate fragrance  the essence of femininity that seduces with the grace of a white bouquet.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Powdery Notes', 'Dew Drop', 'Cyclamen', 'Heliotrope', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Tuberose', 'Violet', 'Apricot', 'Bergamot', 'Grapefruit', 'Red Berries', 'Almond', 'Amber', 'Green Notes', 'Musk', 'Neroli', 'Patchouli', 'Vanilla']

name: incandessence-lumiere-1
detail: Brilliant  luminous  and utterly radiant. Incandescence Lumiere is a mysterious blend of dewy florals  sun-warmed  and pure with exotic accords.

name: transcendent
detail: Transcendent is blended with notes that truly transcendent your senses. Sophistication and beauty bottled to perfection.
ingredients: ['Heliotrope', 'Dew Drop', 'Woody Notes', 'Jasmine', 'Rose', 'Fruity Notes', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Orange', 'Sandalwood', 'Green Watery Accord']

name: bamboo-rose
detail: Kyoto's stunning moss gardens and Arashiyama bamboo grove were the inspiration for Bamboo Rose  a perfect everyday scent.

name: dont-leave-me-alone
detail: Don't Leave Me Alone evokes the scent of magnolia after the rain  washed spotlessly  without any aggressiveness  accompanied by the faint fragrance of lemon  which entered the heart and spleen. The mind gradually relaxed  revealing a gentle disposition again.

name: magnolia-5
detail: "I was inspired by the majestic beauty of southern charm when magnolias are in full bloom. On my trips to Charleston  Savannah and New Orleans  seeing for the first time the beauty of the magnolia tree in full bloom left a lasting impression on me with its striking character and unmistakable fragrance. The sun-drenched petals of the magnolia blossom left a magnificent reminder of how the sweet scent of spring lingers in the air from dawn to dusk evoking a clean freshness " Donna Ramanauskas  Master Perfumer.

name: waterlily-sun
detail: "Inspired by the waterlilies of the garden of Giverny  Waterlily Sun reflects the tranquillity of a peaceful place: quiet  warm with sunshine  and filled with beautiful greens " Aerin Lauder  Founder.

name: alchimie-du-matin
detail: Alchimie du Matin takes us to a springtime morning  among dewdrops and ethereal flowers. A dreamy wave of genderless charm.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Dew Drop', 'Woody Notes', 'Gardenia', 'Magnolia', 'Jasmine (Grandiflorum)', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Musk', 'Pink Pepper']

name: lily-eau-de-toilette
detail: Lily takes inspiration from the history and rich folklore of the lily of the valley  cultivated for over 400 years and a symbol of rebirth  purity  love and happiness.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: early-roses
detail: Early RosesA light and subtle floral fragrance. Close your eyes and imagine yourself strolling peacefully through a rose garden still bathed in delicate morning dew. A very refined fragrance with a fine elegance.

name: jason-wu-velvet-rouge-1
detail: "I created the Velvet Rouge fragrance to represent the seductive and opulent side of the Jason Wu woman. I was inspired by the richness of pure rose and the warmth of golden amber that creates a perfectly refined scent." - Jason Wu
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Dew Drop', 'Rose Centifolia', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Magnolia', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Peony', 'Pepper', 'Violet Leaves']

name: windscape-for-him-1
detail: Windscape for Him is a stimulating and inspiring fragrance for the adventurous man.

name: eternity-1
detail: Inspired by a simple and beautiful wedding ring given to the Duchess by the Duke of Windsor  the diamond band was inscribed with one word: Eternity. This idea was translated into the fragrance itself in this romantic floral scent  which echoes the simplicity  power and timelessness of that ring. "As long as intimacy endures  so will Eternity". Calvin Klein

name: musc-et-freesia
detail: Far removed from the astounding elixirs of the past  it invents a new intimate sensuality  more subtle and elegant than ever before... Infinitely provocative. Its development differs for each woman as it burgeons in the body's warmth. Exhilaration is a certainty.

name: ofresia-eau-de-toilette
detail: A garden on the coast of Normandy  a freesia amid a marvellously fragrant combination of plant notes. Ofrésia plays upon olfactory contradictions: the freshness and floral delicacy of freesia mingle with a devilishly spicy and heady black pepper.

name: fresia
detail: Fresia tells you a gentle story  inspired by 800 years of tradition  waiting to become your story. The flower  originally from South Africa  gives you an aura of enchanting freshness that touches all your senses. Fresia tells you a gentle story  inspired by 800 years of tradition  waiting to become your story.

name: lyrd-bouquet-de-freesia
detail: Lyrd: layers redefined. A world of authentic fragrances crafted by master perfumers with multi-faceted ingredients that come together  inspired by the beauty found in everyday life. Bouquet de Freesia is a romantic floral scent that will surprise and delight you.

name: vanilla-freesia-1
detail: Vanilla Freesia is a romantic scent with captivating fruits and sensual exotic notes.

name: caro-cuore
detail: A duality between freshness and carelessness. A versatile fragrance that dyes your days with its own shine.

name: freesia-magnolia-1
detail: Freesia and Magnolia echo each other in this warm fragrance with crystalline tones. Enjoy this luminous duo for elegant femininity with a fragile and discreet sensuality.

name: freesia-pear-1
detail: Freesia & Pear is an irresistible fragrance with a unique scent to accompany you all day long.

name: english-pear-freesia-2023
detail: Orchards steeped in golden sunshine  warming the russet curves of luscious pears. The sensuous freshness of the just-ripe fruit wrapped in elegant white freesias  enhanced with rose and rooted in patchouli.

name: fresia-di-portofino-1
detail: A timeless perfume  spaceless and wrapped in an aura of mystery boundless. A marriage between the sacred and the profane.

name: english-freesia-1
detail: Freesia  the 7th Anniversary flower  has a sweet  citrus scent and its delicate  vibrant flowers are a springtime favourite  symbolising friendship  thoughtfulness and innocence.

name: freesia-1
detail: Awaken your emotions with Freesia  a luminous fragrance with fruity inflections to bring out your joie de vivre.

name: melrose-freesia
detail: Melrose Freesiaan energetic white floral composed like an Eau Fraîche from the late 1960s.

name: freesia-bergamot-1
detail: Forming part of our Contemporary Classics range  the Freesia & Bergamot fragrance by Yardley is inspired by a diverse variety of flowers. A refreshing  light citrus fragrance.

name: 2b-pencil-1
detail: 2B pencil is always doing multiple choice  and you hope you would never worry about the answer of your life.

name: police-potion-for-him-1
detail: A penetrating and magnetic potion with a strong personality.

name: remix-cologne-lemon-edition-2020-2
detail: "I love retro bars and found inspiration in one in the form of a vibrant  sparkling citrus cocktail. The result is an incredibly refreshing and elegant fragrance " Alex Lee  Perfumer.

name: figues-agrumes-1
detail: Redolent of Mediterranean orchards  Figues & Agrumes boasts a unique freshness with notes of green fig with zesty citrus and soft jasmine. An enchanting offering from the Parisian scent makers  the decadent fragrance is presented in a captivating glass and gold bottle that will take pride of place in your collection.

name: strawberry-planet-1
detail: Sweet and fresh strawberries release the rhythm of the music. The rebellious and romantic cold flames of fireworks lit up the sky in an instant. People in leather jackets and boots jump and hug each other on this planet from dawn to dusk. The spirit of rock and roll will live on forever   giving you love and freedom.

name: misty-rainbow-1
detail: Deep and shallow greens are forests and hills  bright yellow is the sun breaking through the clouds. Purple and red are an endless sea of flowers. The blue sky after rain is the softness of the sun and water. This rainbow of fragrance is more brilliant than the sun  the moon and the stars.

name: rose-chant-2021
detail: Rose Chant is a fragrance evoking an intoxicating love affair. Feel the love story for yourself from the master of all masters  Oscar Wilde  and his classic masterpiece  The Nightingale and the Rose.

name: preziosa-2
detail: Preziosa is a fragrance that speaks the language of sumptuous and luxurious grace.

name: be-insane-queen
detail: With Be Insane Queen  you're invited to discover the unforgettable Pacha Ibiza nights at a club where anything can happen. Unforgettable moments with top VIPs enjoying epic and exclusive parties. You know how it begins  but never how it ends. Create your own rules and then break them! The most important thing is to live the moment and create unique stories to tell. What are you waiting for? Discover how far the best party you’ve ever experienced could take you. Dare to submerge yourself in the authentic craziness of Pacha Ibiza. Be Epic. Be Insane.

name: sea-salt-8
detail: Sea Salt is the ideal scent for a dream summer in full Monotheme style!

name: tender-love-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Betty Barclay Tender Love is a spring-like fragrance that flatters the wearer and gives her the sense of being carried  and captivated by the joy of new love.

name: romamor-donna-1
detail: Roma and it's name spelled backwards  Amor  have always been extremely fascinating. This palindrome the only one that translated into Latin remains the same. Some historians have even corroborated the theory that Amor was the secret name of Rome. "With this new fragrance  we pay tribute to our love for Roma  yesterday  today and tomorrow " Lavinia Biagiotti Cigna  President.

name: dolce-garden
detail: Dolce Garden is a delicious flower blossoming in a garden where simple pleasures and spontaneity set the beat for a joyful dance during a lazy  yet groovy afternoon. Experience a walk through Dolce & Gabbana's garden with Dolce Garden  inspired by a playful take on the Sicilian garden.

name: united-dreams-green-cactus-for-her-2023
detail: Green cactus has come to inspire us  to show us that being sustainable is an attitude to life rather than a fashion. With this unique scent  United Colors of Benetton demonstrates once again that sustainability is part of its DNA  and that green is more than a colour  it is a philosophy. Green Cactus for Her takes its inspiration from the restorative properties of the cactus. Green cactus has a fresh  green aroma with a with a fun  lively touch  full of energy.Let yourself be carried away by a current of the greenest energy with Green Cactus for Her. The femininity and sensuality of its floral heart is refreshed by the cactus and the acidity of the greengage plum. Seductive  sparkling  unexpected.

name: fresh-floral-rose-de-grasse-accord-fruite
detail: A powerful and joyful eau de parfum  where the liveliness of citrus fruits and deep iris take you on a journey through sunny landscapes.

name: magenta-tanzanite
detail: Magenta Tanzanite reinterprets the tanzanite stone in a magenta tone  to evoke the atmosphere of the savannah at dawn  and capture this moment of serenity suspended in time  against the backdrop of a wild and natural environment.

name: dolce-rose
detail: Dolce Rose is a lively and addictive eau de toilette for the Dolce girl. Bold  optimistic and sociable  she speaks her mind and brings her spontaneous feminine spirit to the street. Dolce Rose captures this fun and joyful attitude as lively as the Dolce girl is bold.

name: replica-under-the-lemon-trees
detail: Maison Margiela's Under The Lemon Trees eau de toilette evokes the fresh  relaxing  and bright scent of citrus trees in Palermo  Italy.

name: the-only-one-2-1
detail: The Only One woman is empowered and irresistible. She remains  now more than ever  the center of attention. Unique  captivating and magnetic. She knows what she wants and she knows how to get it.

name: replica-bubble-bath-1
detail: Bubble Bath envelops you in a soothing cocoon. It is the most universal “me time” moment.  Set the water temperature and indulge yourself in the foam of a hot bath. A sensation of quiet comfort gently washes away all your worries.

name: the-only-one-intense
detail: The Only One Intense celebrates the most enchanting and fascinating qualities of The Only One woman. The absolute essence of mesmerising allure and irresistible sensuality  this hypnotic fragrance is bewitching  beguiling and utterly addictive.

name: gyokuro-1
detail: Gyokuro is a fragrance that pays tribute to the Land of the Rising Sun  exalting the namesake raw material  the most precious of Japanese green teas. The name Gyokuro means 'jade dew' and refers to the delicate colouration that the bright  shiny leaves release when infused. The unique and intense aroma  slightly sweet and refreshing  combines pure and crystalline notes with a smooth and enveloping character.

name: the-one-gold-1
detail: The One Gold celebrates a woman who radiates elegance in all that she does. Independent and charming  her luminosity is generous  spreading light over others and never overshadowing them. She is uniquely herself  and her joy and charisma shine from within.

name: tender-love-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Betty Barclay Tender Love is a spring-like fragrance that flatters the wearer and gives her the sense of being carried  and captivated by the joy of new love.

name: look-gold-1
detail: Look Gold is the ideal perfume for self-confident girls who are not afraid to show themselves to the world as they are. Improve your mood instantly and fill your days with optimism  confidence and a magnetism that attracts everyone around you. And above all  have fun whatever you do!

name: pas-ce-soir-extrait-1
detail: Like its original signature  Pas ce soir Extrait evokes Parisian mystery and sensuality. More concentrated  this more faceted creation is addictive and gourmand.

name: the-only-one-1
detail: The Only One captures the essence of glamour and magnetic femininity. Sharing the warm and cordial spirit of The One  with a floral and gourmand signature  the fragrance evokes an intricate interplay of opposites.

name: police-to-be-goodvibes-for-woman
detail: To Be Goodvibes wins everyone over with its positive energy  it is a statement of optimism  an explosion of joy that smells of freedom!

name: creme-de-cuir-1
detail: It's Indian summer  when the hot days are over and the sweet coolness of the sunset begins to fall. A sensual elixir marked with white and beige tones  pure representation of contemporary sensuality. The perfume evolves through Rothko's monochromatic style  where materials dance in a circle one after the other.

name: dans-ma-bulle-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Dans Ma Bulle L’Eau de Toilette is an invitation to the Carven girl’s new adventure into her light and soft world.

name: greenlion
detail: Greenlion Eau de Parfum is a green and musky fragrance that plays on the contrast between strength and sensuality.

name: glacier
detail: No limits. Harder  higher  faster. better. Live for the challenge. Feel the rush. Choose the cool  fresh and invigorating scent of Glacier and get ready to face the challenge.
ingredients: ['Juniper Berries', 'Orange Blossom', 'Vetiver', 'Lavender', 'Rosemary', 'Tarragon', 'Vodka', 'Frozen Mint', 'Geranium (Egypt)', 'Pineapple', 'Watermelon', 'Bergamot', 'Citruses', 'Floral Notes', 'Lime', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Sandalwood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Woody Notes', 'Yuzu', 'Pennyroyal']

name: juniper-sling-7
detail: Nothing brings jubilance and joy to the senses quite like… Gin! And now a cocktail  or Sling  a tribute to les années folle  the exuberant 1920s that roared that is one part crisp  evening-elegance  one part party-playful effervescence.

name: paris-prague
detail: A delicate creation perfume with aromatic spicy notes. A warm  intoxicating  masculine fragrance.

name: 401-lavender-juniper-1
detail: The olfactory facet 401 is an elegant and retro fragrance created around aromas  wood and juniper that create a sophisticated and confident atmosphere.

name: pino-silvestre-original
detail: A sense of wellbeing for those wearing it  its unmistakable notes inspired by the scents we experience in nature's great outdoors.

name: united-dreams-one-summer-for-men-2019-1
detail: United Dreams One Summer for Men 2019 tells us that there are no limits to what you want to achieve. You must choose your own path  embrace dreams and aim high.

name: spice-bazaar-1
detail: Spice Bazaar welcomes you with a charming smell of The Grand Bazaar. Berries together with highly prized spices intensified by woody notes and gourmand accents in an oriental way. Take a sniff from the fragrance if you haven't been in!

name: 24-old-bond-street-vinegar-1
detail: As delightfully acerbic and elegant as such timeless British luminaries as Oscar Wilde and Noel Coward  Atkinsons 24 Old Bond Street Vinegar is a sublimely irreverent cologne. A modern classic  just the merest splash will sharpen your senses  leaving you reinvigorated and ready to conquer the world with your dazzling wit and savoir-faire.

name: vanille-paradoxe
detail: It is a surprising paradox that this vanilla is incredibly tenacious and fresh. Vanille Paradoxe is a perfume for all open to adventure  and who love amazing discoveries!

name: y-live-eau-de-toilette-intense
detail: Y Live Eau de Toilette Intense is a fresh but sensual fragrance  with two distinct olfactory aspects  which elegantly reflect the two environments where an exceptional artist lives: the scene and the offstage.

name: deauville-bleu-1
detail: Deauville Bleu. Brimming with coastal and citrus essences.

name: itasca-evocations-1
detail: Lake Itasca in Minnesota is the source of the Mississippi River. It is surrounded by dense forests. It is the land of the Chippewa Indians  the only people who know its secrets.

name: casanova-2161
detail: The only fragrance in this collection produced by Didier Guillon  Casanova 2161 is inspired by the universal seducer  Casanova. His charisma and confidence are expressed in this timeless and elegant woody fragrance  which pays homage to the iconic vetiver.

name: neon-amber-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Sparks of high-voltage amber glow in the nocturnal cityscape. A riot of neon light and darkness. Resinous fumes vibrate. Mysterious yet warmly familiar  where the imagination of the future challenges the past. Reinvent your rules. Play with fire.

name: pur-blanca-sunshine-bloom
detail: Let summer last forever with the fruity and floral fragrance of Pur Blanca Sunshine Bloom.

name: bigarade-concentree
detail: For those who believe that seduction is found in cleanliness and perfection  here is a cologne designed to renew its wearer with every splash.

name: harvest-mouse
detail: Like a field bathed in sweet sunlight  Harvest Mouse evokes images of homemade goodness. Wheat stalks sway amidst chamomile  davana and hay  and rich beer extracts are softened by resins and woody notes. Snuggle into a warm nest of homemade scents.

name: haystacks
detail: This fragrance evokes the dry and dark woody scent of haystack. A celebration of harmony  warmth and calm.

name: new-mown-hay-1
detail: New Mown Hay was created so that gentlemen could remember their country estates whilst in London.

name: ouranon
detail: Ouranon is a celebration of endings. Grounding notes of resinous woods  earthy minerality and incandescent spices evoke the return home in preparation for new beginnings.

name: the-noir-29
detail: Thé Noir 29 combines depth and freshness  softness and strength through permanent oscillation between light notes an warm woods. A special extraction in the heart wraps up the composition by bringing to the formula a dry leafy feeling in the drydown to transform this creation into a sensuous and addictive essence.

name: basilico-fellini
detail: The unmistakable smell of risotto bianco and a minty  peppery kick as the ultra-fresh basil warms on the dish. A bon vivant who wanted to show life in all its glorious reality – people eating  sleeping and making love – Federico Fellini was said to request extra servings of this herb  rumoured to be an aphrodisiac.

name: lirano
detail: Lirano captures all the freshness and liveliness of seawater  with the graceful notes of lilac  jasmine and hay. An exquisite  very subtle  never ordinary fragrance.

name: chergui
detail: Southern Morocco. The white  misty sun is casting a sleepy shadow over a still  diffuse land. Miniature tornadoes improvise a ballet  dance across the sands  roll  spin and then disappear. They are the Djinn  the genies of good and evil. They announce the arrival of Chergui  a dry wind from the East. Burning  rolling  mica-laden knots for a curtain of red sand. The Chergui retreats  followed by the burning sands.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Hay', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Clary Sage', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Honey', 'Iris / Orris', 'Leather', 'Sandalwood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Juniper Berries', 'Rose (Morocco)']

name: mustang-blue
detail: A classic and masculine fragrance that brings the Mustang man into new territory.

name: vie-de-chateau-intense-cheverny
detail: Special commission for the Count of Cheverny  a pastoral note evoking oak moss and freshly cut grass with a pinch of hay.

name: lavender-2
detail: A delicate  subtle scent that celebrates lavender.

name: magnolia-romana-1
detail: "Magnolia Romana was born of our daily walks in Villa Borghese  in Rome  where there is a magnificent alley with more than seventy magnolia trees. In summer  when the trees bloom  the atmosphere is movingly beautiful  saturated with perfume. We started to work on a magnolia fragrance that was intended to be truer than natural  round but never sweet." - Eau d'Italie

name: brin-de-reglisse
detail: "A fragrance that blows fresh and warm  dry and sweet. A landscape of Provence  dry earth  fragrant purple fields  the mistral wind... wrapped in a luxurious layer of mouth-watering liquorice. The fragrance opens with the pure light of stylised lavender and moves on to the velvety black of liquorice". Jean-Claude Ellena  perfumer

name: pepe-rosa-arancio-amaro
detail: A small pink fruit with its extraordinary sweet and spicy scent becomes inebriated with citrusy notes and woody accents to create an enveloping and seductive fragrance.

name: eau-dorlane-1
detail: A sparkling and cheerful fragrance for summer days.

name: cynefin-1
detail: Cynefin's sprightly herbaceous overtures  fizzing in delight evoke curious consideration. What at first appears exhilarating and light leads to much deeper connotations.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Violet Leaves', 'Woody Notes', 'Floralozone (Lily Of The Valley)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Angelica', 'Davana', 'Amber', 'Moxalone (Musk)']

name: like-a-walk-in-the-summer-rain
detail: Essence Like A Walk In The Summer Rain  a fragrance as refreshing as the feeling of summer rain on a hot day. Embrace the summer.
ingredients: ['Marine', 'Floralozone (Lily Of The Valley)', 'Moss', 'Freesia', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Aldehyde', 'Cedarwood', 'Cyclamen', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Orange', 'Watermelon']

name: axe-dark-temptation
detail: Everyone knows that women can't resist the aroma of chocolate  and why should they? It's delicious. Axe Dark Temptation is the fragrance that makes you as irresistible as chocolate.
ingredients: ['Caramel', 'Watery', 'Patchouli', 'Clary Sage', 'Lavender', 'Agreste', 'Green Notes', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Woody Notes', 'Floralozone (Lily Of The Valley)']

name: nevermore-1
detail: Inspired by Edgar Poe's poem "Nevermore"  the fragrance is a tribute to the legend of the "Toaster"  whom every 19th of January  on the anniversary of the death of the poet  lays upon his grave three red roses and a flask of cognac.
ingredients: ['Floralozone (Lily Of The Valley)', 'Saffron', 'Rose Oxide', 'Aldehyde', 'Rose (Turkey)', 'Rose (Grasse)', 'Nutmeg', 'Black Pepper', 'Amber', 'Cedarwood', 'Red Wine', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)']

name: eau-dorange-verte
detail: The name Eau d'Orange Verte evokes all the freshness and fragrance of a citrus garden. A generous and universal fable. A lively  sparkling  natural and playful style. A pleasant sensation of everyday well-being for the whole family.

name: youre-in-in-the-future
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the original perfume Warhol used for a work of art in 1967. The original outrageous fragrance consisted of Coca-Cola bottles painted silver and filled with a citrus perfume. This prompted a cease and desist letter from Coca-Cola  so the project was abandoned. Moving away from Coca-Cola bottles  the reintroduction of this blend is presented in six unique industrial matte silver bottles  each with a whimsical Andy Warhol quote.

name: limon-de-cordoza
detail: A whirlwind of zesty citrus notes unfolds this extravagant opening - this fragrance is a tribute to the imaginary Kingdom of White Neroli... Sparkling  intense and citrusy.

name: bath-body-fresh-marbert-fresh-emotion-1
detail: Refreshing scent. Pure freshness for the whole body - simply irresistible! This "feel-good-fragrance" combines the freshness of citric fruits with the smoothness of light woods.

name: palermo-2
detail: For almost three millennia  empire after empire has colonised Palermo  depositing fragments of language  art  architecture and customs that make the place a fascinating mirror of Mediterranean history and culture All those centuries of interleaved layers remain palpable in the air  the water  the spirit of this beguiling city.

name: eau-des-merveilles-eau-de-toilette
detail: Eau des Merveilles tells the tale of an imaginary journey at Hermès  the feet on the ground  the head among the stars. A modern fairy tale  bursting with charm and mystery. The perfume of enchantment.

name: orangerie-venise
detail: The greenhouse at Venice's Giardini in Castello is a famed greenhouse that creates a heaven of tranquility  delicately protecting verdant and juicy treasures. Orangerie Venise encapsulates the beauty of this thriving space and subtly conveys the opulence of nature.

name: concerto-1
detail: Concerto is a simple and elegantly aromatic harmony of authentic fruity citrus freshness  softened with tea  amber notes and flowers. Touching and captivating  a bewitching combination.

name: turandot-1
detail: Inspired by Giacomo Puccini's opera Turandot  set in China and starring Prince Calaf  who falls in love with the cold-hearted Princess Turandot. To obtain permission to marry her  the suitor must solve three riddles; any wrong answer leads to death.

name: splash-orange-amere-1
detail: A fresh whirlwind that brings an overload of the leaves and branches of Calabrian citrus. As time goes by  this ultra-modern Cologne becomes increasingly addictive.

name: orange-peel-2021
detail: Marmalade making  the most British of traditions. Orange peel simmers on the stove  its zesty aroma and bitter bite tantalising the senses. Warm woods are blended with orange to create a refined  golden fragrance. Quirky natural rhubarb adds an enticing appeal to this fresh take on the classic marmalade.

name: andy-warhols-youre-in-1
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the original perfume Warhol used for a work of art in 1967. The original outrageous fragrance consisted of Coca-Cola bottles spray-painted silver and filled with a citrus perfume. This prompted a cease and desist letter from Coca-Cola  so the project was abandoned. Moving away from Coca-Cola bottles  the reintroduction of this blend is presented in six unique industrial matte silver bottles  each with a whimsical Andy Warhol quote.

name: bigarade-jasmin-1
detail: Bigarade Jasmin  sparkling and spicy  fresh and intoxicating  evokes a Mexican garden cultivated with joy and love of life. It sings in orange  yellow  green and pink.

name: frissons-d-agrumes
detail: The zest and flesh of citrusy notes awaken and shake up the mind and the senses. Sensations that vibrate and sparkle  a great wind of freshness and energy greet the new day. A perfume of air and passion.

name: rose-imperiale
detail: Exclusive to the Harrods Salon de Parfums  Creed's Rose Imperiale celebrates the elegance and grandeur of old Europe. This scent is a tribute to the noble rose and its many devotees throughout history.

name: tudor-rose
detail: The symbolic union of the rose entangled with a Kensington garden. Tudor Rose is a wild beauty steeped in British history.

name: rose-absolue-eau-de-parfum
detail: Some loves never die  they are passionate and uncompromising  just like the love Goutal feels for the queen of flowers. Created from the essence of the six noblest roses of the East and the West  including the majestic Turkish rose  Rose Absolue is without a doubt the most beautiful of tributes.

name: laguna-1
detail: Laguna  a name full of mystery and gentleness is an exotic fragrance that transports women to the islands of the Pacific  where all is plenitude  tranquility  and voluptuousness. Laguna becomes the supreme moment of replenishment and relaxation in a turquoise-blue lagoon  a dream of limitless horizons where floral  woody and fruity notes blend into one.

name: white-qasbah-1
detail: White Qasbah is a powerful blend combining unique Middle Eastern notes of rose  patchouli and oud.

name: midnight
detail: A sensory fusion smorgasbord to satisfy the most discerning epicurean bon viveur  inspired by an exclusive collaboration with Nth Degree  the world's leading private dining club.

name: musk-hareer
detail: A refreshing and deep scent with the mystical and sensual white musk as its central muse.

name: man-classic-sport
detail: This elegant  athletic fragrance begins with a dynamic mix of invigorating notes of citrus and fruit. A self-confident masculine composition  this is a timelessly modern creation.

name: amber-rose
detail: Entitled and decadent. The archetypal aristocrat of perfumery  Amber-Rose strikes a seductive pose. This elegant madame has a rich pedigree at the heart of history's most romantic fragrances. Here  she has been intensified and modernised to bring her up to date for the twenty-first century  to tempt and tantalise.

name: rose-de-mai-1
detail: Around Grasse's gourmand roses  the scent of flowers is seductive and discreet.

name: rose-chic
detail: Full of whims and dreams  this fresh scent will have you smelling like a heavenly fresh cut bouquet. Filled with bonheur and festivity  this fragrance will transport you to the magical blooming gardens of Grasse. Created to harvest your inner garden with a plethora of vitality. Perfect for the classy and oh-so-very chic summer day in Paris.

name: alchemists-rose
detail: Perfumer Vincent Schaller is fascinated by the idea of eternalising sensations through perfumery. Honour your essence with his fragrance Alchemists Rose  a delicate and unique scent.

name: essence-n-1-rose
detail: This fragrance is voluptuous and enveloping like layers of precious fabrics weaving the most magnificent essences and absolutes of Centifolia and Damascena rose.

name: amber-rose-extract-1
detail: Amber Rose Extract of Parfum is an intense delight for rose lovers. A decadent  elegantly romantic fragrance  marrying rare May Rose from Grasse with a voluptuous sweet milk note resting on a base of white amber to create a chic and modern scent.

name: roses-jasmine-1
detail: Roses Jasmine has a vibrant start  leading into a sophisticated and elegant heart  and leaves a beguiling trail.

name: rose-hubris
detail: Rose Hubris is a hedonistic tribute to the iconic raw material of Haute Perfumery  Rose of May.  The fragrance's composition highlights all the facets of this unique ingredient: a sumptuous floral heart of rose magnified by the freshness of green leaves and the sparkle of fruity  citrus and spicy notes. At the cutting edge of creation  it offers an exhilarating and utterly contemporary result.

name: lamour-rose-versailles-eau-de-parfum
detail: Imagine waking up in the Chateaux de la Loire  enjoying a leisurely lunch in the afternoon sun  then taking a stroll through the beautiful sea of flowers  surrendering to a romantic dream  making you want to continue this long holiday in Versailles forever. This is the freshness and joy that Anna sui L'Amour Rose Versaille.

name: rosa-ekaterina
detail: ROSA EKATERINA is a window opening onto a flowery garden; an elegant woman walks resolutely along the green paths with an open book in her hands  while nature blooms all around her.

name: a-kiss-from-a-rose-1
detail: "I wanted to express the petals and the thorns of roses. A Kiss from a Rose is delicate  yes  but like with a rose you simply cannot manipulate this scent without being careful. I consider it a warning when you approach! "Kilian Hennessy  Olfactive Director.

name: rose-concrete-1
detail: A single rose in a stone room.

name: roses-greedy-1
detail: This rose sophisticated enough for an adult but too sexy for the nursing home.

name: rose-rush-1
detail: "I wanted to bring together ingredients that would create an aura of femininity around the wearer of the fragrance. I wove together a multitude of juicy flowers and fruits to create a fragrance that surrounds her with pure joy and delicacy. In the background  I added comforting and sensual elements that create a sense of elegant luxury every time she wears it " Richard Herpin  Perfumer.

name: mile-high-38
detail: Mile High is a dynamic  sexy  modern fragrance dedicated to those who thrive no matter what challenges life has to offer.

name: courageous-rose
detail: Courageous Rose showcases the sensation of high-quality silk and brings the final touch of sophistication to an individual’s style.

name: tribeca-1
detail: Whether enjoying a reading at Poet's House or a martini at The Odeon  there's no doubt that the Triangle Below Canal Street (TriBeCa)  with its cobblestone streets  charming alleyways and New York's coolest restaurants and boutiques  brings charm. Today  the area is experiencing a modern renaissance and is seen as the city's next great creative hub.

name: my-new-york-1
detail: From Africa to Asia  Europe  and beyond  it doesn't matter where you live: everyone has their own NYC story. New York  New York  it's a helluva town! Meet our fragrance that begs the question: what is your New York?

name: chloe-leau-1
detail: An essential story that tells the story of femininity in brilliant capital letters. The story of a radiant  free-spirited woman. Her skin is bathed in the delicate aura of Chloé L'Eau.

name: byzance-gold
detail: The time has come. Time to awaken the magic of Byzance Gold. Time to don your most beautiful gowns and dance under the gilded ceilings of Parisian palaces. Byzance Gold diffuses its splendour deep in the night of festivities  when magic rules dreams and gazes and travellers are guided by the stars. Precious moments  illuminated by an unprecedented sparkling sillage that adds to the enchantment.

name: brioni-2021
detail: Broadening the definition of what it is to be a man  he conveys his emotions through his eyes  his attitudes  his actions. And through the most emotional of adornments: his fragrance. A secret olfactory code for initiates  connecting  beyond ages and borders  the members of the Brioni Society. You could be one of them.

name: bitter-mandarin
detail: A vibrant citrus scent inspired by a Mediterranean summer evening.

name: brioni-eau-de-parfum-essentiel
detail: “For a man of his time  our Brioni Eau de Parfum Essentiel is a modern  natural-origin fragrance. A powerful  unexpected and reassuring scent." Norbert Stump  Artistic Director of Brioni.

name: haute-provence-89
detail: Everyone has a memory of Provence  children or adults. This region is synonymous with lightness  letting yourself go and holidays. Haute Provence / 89 is our tribute to it.

name: dunhill-nordic-fougere-1
detail: This fragrance expresses the need to reconnect with nature for strength and tranquillity. It is now more important than ever.

name: chloe-eau-de-parfum-naturelle
detail: Chloé Eau de Parfum Naturelle celebrates authentic femininity that evolves in harmony with nature. The Chloé woman knows how powerful yet fragile nature truly is. Nature is both her inspiration and her respiration.

name: gold-coast-1
detail: With Gold Coast  Bond No. 9 creates a scent snapshot of a city that is always changing  but that retains its character and legacy: the meeting of distinguished old guard New York with the dynamism and spirit of new guard energy.

name: murano-parfum
detail: Bottega Veneta  the perfume  is an oriental chypre that combines the naturally refined scent of leather with a lush and sophisticated oriental accord. The Murano bottle is a particularly pure expression of Bottega Veneta quality and craftsmanship. The bottle is made of exceptionally fine glass hand-blown by craftsmen in one of the leading glassworks on the island of Murano.

name: saffron-wood-91
detail: London on December 19th  Big Ben rings 9 o’clock. The hustle and bustle of the horns have subsided. A rainy mist colours the grey cobblestones of the streets of Soho and I soak up this damp and surprisingly calm atmosphere. Saffron Wood / 91 is a leathery perfume  sophisticated and metallic. London in its most enigmatic colours.

name: comete-paradis-62
detail: An elegant scent that evokes exoticism and far away heavenly locations.

name: wake-up-world-1
detail: "As a fragrance  the first spray is an explosion that blows right in our faces  along the lines of 'hurry up  wake up  something is going wrong in the system.' As a more global message  it's clearly a denunciation of the global marketing system that makes people buy anything and everything  mainly based on what we're told  but not based on reality " Benjamin Almairac  Founder.

name: belle-joueuse-1
detail: Provocative and coquette  a game of seduction with no rules.

name: lhomme-rochas-aromatic-touch-1
detail: A warm and charming aroma with a contrasting virility.

name: the-scent-of-peace-natural-1
detail: Clean beauty isn’t just an ask  it’s a demand. The Scent of Peace Natural is a graceful eco-chic scent alternative. It’s easy being green when you have all the right ingredients. Eco-chic has never been more luxurious. Sustainably harvested notes that smell just as sweet? Meet our unique clean creation.

name: lux-visionaria
detail: Lux Visionaria helps us look up  giving us unexpected evolutions  returning to a suspended state in which we are amazed at the existence of the world and therefore at one's own existence. The scent was created with Bianca de la Garza  Mexican-American journalist and TV personality
ingredients: ['Vanilla', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Woody Notes', 'Artemisia', 'Patchouli', 'Saffron', 'Smoke']

name: bois-dambrette-1
detail: A fragrance for falsely innocent skin. After the clear and luminous opening  the sensual and slightly carnal notes unfold and settle with sobriety and elegance on a background of sensual chords.

name: ambrette-de-noir-1
detail: "For the latest perfume in my Premier Collection  I wanted to create something truly exceptional. Ambrette de Noir is just that " Aerin Lauder  Founder.

name: musc-pallas
detail: “Perfume is a bit like an invisible aura  something reassuring and protective that delineates one’s territory. It signs a presence: it says you’ve been here or announces your arrival. With Musc Pallas  the perfumer Vanina Murracciole and I wanted to create a powerful perfume  with a distinctive trail  that would inhabit the space around its wearer. We wanted it to be in the image of an asteroid belt in perpetual revolution " François Hénin  Artistic Director.

name: flacon-aux-abeilles-by-nadine-kanso-2023
detail: More than a bottle  it is a true declaration of love: the love of Guerlain for its mythic Bee Bottle  that celebrates its 170th anniversary. The love of the Guerlain perfumers for the voluptuous flowers that compose this exclusive eau de parfum  Rêve d’Amour. The love of Nadine Kanso  the Lebanese jewellery designer  for the Arab culture that inspires her. A glittering call to love that sublimes the splendid adornment of Guerlain’s legendary Bee Bottle in 30 unique  numbered and signed pieces.

name: valentina-poudre
detail: Invisible and impalpable  it delicately envelopes the body in a romantic  passionate mist  making it all that more sensuous  feminine and recognisable. Valentina Poudre lays a mysterious veil of ethereal notes upon the materialist of the senses.

name: sport-water-for-women-1
detail: Ji Sander Sport Water for Women vividly evokes all the sensations of the sea: the vitality of the salt-laden air  the harmony of the waves breaking on the shore  the sensuous sense of the sand beneath bare feet. Ideal after sport and on the hottest day  this fresh scent revitalises  replenishes  rebalances  seamlessly fusing the spirit and the senses.

name: over-the-musk
detail: Daring  breathtaking  addictive  noble  a new dimension in the fragrance universe. A collection of unique creations and original alchemies crafted around the major themes of traditional perfumery. This opus crystallizes the essence of the Mugler brand and reveals a little of the creator's inner life  quite simply letting us into his secret.

name: wood-sage-sea-salt
detail: Escape the every day along the windswept shore. Waves breaking white  the air fresh with sea salt and spray  alive with the mineral scent of the rugged cliffs. A lively  spirited and totally joyful experience.
ingredients: ['Clary Sage', 'Sea Water', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Driftwood', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Bergamot', 'Buchu / Agathosma', 'Dried Fruits', 'Mineral Notes', 'Musk']

name: voyage-dhermes
detail: Going on a voyage means going to another place  wherever the wind leads us  where our heart takes us  where those we meet captivate and liberate us. Not knowing in advance. Familiar and strange  between surprise and reassurance  masculine and feminine.

name: tygar-1
detail: Called the all-seeing stone  Tiger's Eye draws its energy from the vibrations of the earth and the sun. Like the name of the fragrance  this brilliant stone is inspired by the majestic feline and conveys the fiery courage  action and mental power of the great Indian warrior Shivaji.

name: amber-sogara
detail: This scent is a celebration of Al Sogara  a mystical hidden village in Oman  carved into a cliff. It is one of the most remote villages in one of the most remote countries  but the settlement has survived over 500 years. Uplifting  luscious and caressing.

name: angel-stories-lets-stay-in-bed
detail: Let's Stay in Bed. Lazy Sunday tangled in the sheets. Clean cotton  fresh air  bare skin.

name: honorine-blanc
detail: This scent pays tribute to classic perfumes with a youthful twist.

name: velvet-bergamot-1
detail: Like a sun drenched orchard of citrus trees in full bloom  Velvet Bergamot excites and refreshes the senses with a powerful and aromatic burst of rich bitter sweet sensation.

name: magnifying-musk-1
detail: The warm  sensual accord of Magnifying Musk is inspired by the intimate sensation of a caress. With its remarkable and expressive luminosity  the scent is reminiscent of the dazzling joy of an embrace.

name: iris-de-nuit
detail: "Iris absolute has to be one of my favourite scents. If angels smell of anything then I am sure they would smell something like this. Iris de Nuit is a very traditional iris scent that despite the cost I tried to keep as close as possible to Iris absolute which is light  airy  clean  warm  comforting and sensual." - James Heeley

name: lhomme-2
detail: Ungaro L'Homme is his fragrance  an original olfactive interpretation of ageless youth in which richness and sophistication find an appealing  innovative twist  combining elegance and sensuality with contemporary urban nuances.

name: imari-queen
detail: Imari Queen roars with a fierce radiance of mouthwatering yet bold juice fruits contracted with uplifting and empowering accords.

name: nautica-midnight-voyage-1
detail: Set sail and let the moonlight guide your way. A new adventure begins with Nautica Midnight Voyage.

name: peony-rose-1
detail: "This fragrance perfectly encapsulates the evolution of the rose. I was inspired by the sophisticated beauty of a rose  capturing its transparent and fresh blossom  making it timeless. The rose is a classic note  which is continually reinvented in a modern way. Peony Rosé is my modern take on a pink fragrance  which can appeal to women of any age today. Alexis Grugeon  perfumer.

name: polo-sport-fresh-1
detail: A modernised take on the classic polo sport  this bright scent brings a fresh edge to the iconic fragrance.

name: search-1
detail: A vibrant scent that carries its brilliance proud  like you  undefeated and undimmed.

name: cyprium
detail: Cyprium strikes a profound balance between rugged woods and modern aromatics. A raw natural showcase of an untouched landscape brimming with wild violets and lush herbs.

name: live-out-loud-1
detail: Live - Out - Loud (phrase): An exciting  affirmative statement of pure confidence  fierce independence and vibrant energy. Live Out Loud is the ultimate perfume for women seeking a fresh burst of brilliant scent. Express yourself with this free-spirited blend  designed for you to live life your way.

name: rem-1
detail: "In my dreams  I'm always the version of myself I was in (my music video) Break Free tbh. I always wanted to spend more time as this character/in this world  so maybe that's just what I'll do. So much to look forward to " Ariana Grande.

name: yes-i-am-delicious-1
detail: Yes I Am Delicious embodies the girl without limits. She is totally hedonistic  lives her life to the fullest and always says 'YES' with no regrets.

name: secret-gardenia
detail: Reveals the hidden brilliance of gardenia. Clear  bright and sensual. Inspired by Frances Hodgson Burnett's classic novel "The Secret Garden"  Secret Gardenia celebrates the scents that unexpectedly burst forth from London's secret gardens; a mist of clandestine white flowers  unfurling and flowing like linens in the breeze.

name: promise-1
detail: We all make promises to ourselves and one another  they are meant to be forever. Introducing Promise  the new fragrance by Jennifer Lopez. Promise embodies everything she stands for today  it’s the essence of a multifaceted and powerful woman. Jennifer invites us to make our own promises  to be better every day  no matter what stands in our way. What’s your Promise?

name: police-contemporary-deep-blue
detail: Police Contemporary Deep Blue celebrates modern men with a strong personality.

name: matcha-frangipani-2020-1
detail: Matcha notes have both a mild aroma and tart notes. Here  an extraordinary variety of tea meets the contrast of sensual floral aromas: a gentle creation for letting go  relaxing and for every wellness ritual!

name: enduring-glow-glitter-2020-1
detail: Inspired by Jennifer Lopez's inner beauty  power  and glow on stage. Her presence  her energy  all eyes on her. She captivates her audience one more time with her unique glow.

name: sous-le-pont-mirabeau
detail: Mirabeau  what a pretty word  peculiarly Parisian  suspended above the Seine. It composes a memory  joins another bank  and returns by following its trail of sandalwood  pink bay and cedar. In the heart of the City of Light  on the way to the twilight of the day  there is a bridge  a poem and a perfume.

name: white-musk-free-1
detail: This powerful little fragrance topper has a cool  mineral scent that will leave you feeling empowered to express yourself.

name: signature-lovers-man-1
detail: Replay Signature Lovers Man is a mysterious creation with a modern and irresistible charm.

name: castelbajac-homme-sport
detail: A concentration of freshness and sensuality blow over Castelbajac Homme Sport. An olfactory interpretation synonymous with energy  freedom and dynamism.

name: oud-laque-1
detail: A game of mirrors. Veined  gleaming  warm  exotic  precious: At Les Bains Paris  our silhouettes are reflected in the lavishly lacquered wood. Spaces within a mythical place. A trail of perfume. Spiritual potency. Radiant evanescence. Dark sensuality.

name: violet-ida
detail: A fragrant confection. A powdered kiss at the end of the pier. Violet Ida is warm  evocative and sensual. For Brighton belles and weekend divas.

name: 44-gerrard-street-1
detail: Radiating vitality and vigour  Atkinsons 44 Gerrard Street is an homage to the very first Atkinsons store  established in 1799 in London’s Soho. Brimming with energy and sophistication  it captures the eccentric  hedonistic spirit of Georgian London

name: leather-rouge-1
detail: Leather Rouge is a provocative and inviting perfume  conjuring the embers of a fire and the tactile richness of leather.

name: live-in-love-new-york-1
detail: Painting a portrait of one of the most iconic cities in the world  Oscar de la Renta Live In Love New York invites the senses into a sensual bliss of fresh floral nuances.

name: etoile-dune-nuit-1
detail: A highly textured oriental floral  Étoile d’une Nuit evokes the plush atmosphere of those unique moments when charm does it magic. The scent of confident femininity.

name: musk-butterfly-1
detail: Evoking Giacomo Puccini's masterpiece  Madame Butterfly  Kilian Hennessy notes: "The phonetic aspect of the name echoes the opera. Like the famous show  which features three moving acts  this fragrance offers a metamorphosis from beginning to end.

name: enduring-glow-1
detail: Inspired by Jennifer Lopez's inner beauty  power and glow on stage. Her presence  her energy  all eyes on her. She captivates her audience one more time with her unique glow.

name: mandarina-duck-for-him-1
detail: Mandarina Duck's for Her and for Him traces an authentic generational identikit  where HE and SHE become THEY  a group of people united not only by age  but also by shared values and aspirations. They don't believe that an open mind is a skull fracture. They are ironic  active and great travellers  able to enjoy life and concerned about the fate of the planet.

name: mandarine-2019
detail: At the heart of the note  an invigorating freshness. An intensely fresh and invigorating citrus scent.

name: irresistible-4
detail: Irresistible can be described as intangible and intoxicating. This is an ethereal fragrance for the contemporary woman.

name: lheure-verte-1
detail: L’Heure Verte mirrors uniquely Parisian inductions and illusions  wild nights and pleasures. The scent expresses Paris at its best: indulgent and life-changing in its luxuries and wonderful illusions.

name: bella-6
detail: Baldessarini Bella is an ode to femininity for women seeking the perfect fragrance to complement their timeless elegance and confident charm. A sophisticated fragrance that reflects the luxurious essence of the brand.

name: cacao-azteque-extrait
detail: Cacao Atzèque Extrait is a non-traditional scent blended with spices  creating a heady  light aroma that will sharpen your senses.

name: carnal-cacao-2
detail: A blend of precious ingredients  as comforting as a warm embrace.

name: cacao
detail: For lovers of strong emotions  a fragrance that envelops and soothes  but at the same time is capable of transmitting emotions.

name: cocoa-woods
detail: "Cocoa Woods stands for reaching your goals and pushing yourself to do things that are out of your comfort zone. When you do that  you feel a huge sense of accomplishment  and that empowers you." - Laura Slatkin  founder

name: rose-cocoa-1
detail: The star of Rose Cocoa Parfum is the decadent confection at the heart of this fragrance  inspired by La Maison du Chocolat. This delightful indulgence comes together with the florals that complete the image of an exquisite rose adorned in rich chocolate  a beautiful vision of luxury celebrating the holidays.

name: dark-2
detail: Dark borrows chocolate's most seductive facets to play with emotions and captivate the senses.

name: blue-agava-cacao-1
detail: Inspired by the rhythm and vibrancy of Latin music  a sparkling citrus melody of lime and grapefruit leads to an exquisite heart of the blue agava flower. A sensual blend of vetiver  cinnamon and the primitive rawness of cacao  make an unexpected and surprising harmony.

name: candy-night
detail: Prada Candy Night eau de parfum is sensual and addictive. An addictive cocktail of femininity  it is wildly liberated and elegantly refined.

name: moonlight-shadow
detail:
Olfactories Les Mirages - Moonlight Shadow perfume was launched by Prada.
The dominant ingredients of the fragrance are cedarwood  fig  cocoa  leather and peach.
The perfume is for women and men

name: amour-de-cacao
detail: Another Comptoir Sud Pacifique classic and one of the first fragrances created with a chocolate base. Dark chocolate combined with fruits and delicious gourmand flavours - a guaranteed aphrodisiac!

name: cacao-libertine
detail: A fragrance that invites you to a joyful and greedy transgression. Enjoy this dissolute and intoxicating dance.

name: good-girl
detail: Good Girl is a fragrance as powerful as it is sensual. An audacious blend of dark and light elements. For the woman who knows when it's good to be bad.

name: cacao-porcelana
detail: An elegant and distinctive fragrance  carried by the choice of an unusual ingredient  white cocoa. To capture its most beautiful facets  the perfumer collaborated with a French Maître Chocolatier to obtain the perfect roast  revealing sensual notes of nut and milk.

name: vanilla-diorama-1
detail: For this warm and joyful ode to vanilla  Dior Perfumer-Creator François Demachy composed a fragrance that is instantly pleasing  round and seductive  yet rich and brimming with freshness.

name: project-cheirosa-no-5-golden-cacao
detail: Savour the opulent embrace of Golden Cacao  where glistening cacao dances with the exotic charm of Brazilian orchid  weaving a narrative of rich decadence intertwined with floral mystique for a captivating olfactory journey.

name: plaisir-gourmand
detail: Part-iris and part-chocolate  Plaisir Gourmand is an elegant and delicate fragrance that starts the saga by gently nudging the senses awake. It celebrates the purest state of delicious pleasure. Smell and taste work in unison to treat you to a unique experience.

name: fico-selvatico
detail: The wild fig is typical of arid climates. It has been transformed into a perfume with a unique scent. The fresh notes of the wild fig will satisfy even the most difficult tastes.

name: leau-neuve-figaro-1
detail: The Barber of Seville  bold and seductive like the Figaro from Beaumarchais' plays. Figaro by Lubin takes liberties with conventions much like the character that inspires it. An extremely original unisex fragrance  its construction is based on the daring opposition of vetiver and fig.

name: wild-fig-cassis
detail: Inspired by breakfast in Tuscany – the moment of breaking open juicy figs  fresh from the tree – Wild Fig Cassis is a delicious fragrance. The scent of sun-warmed figs and delicate cassis is entwined with notes of hyacinth and cedarwood  enveloping the wearer in the warmth of the Mediterranean.

name: 1902-figue-blanche
detail: "A fine balance between the fresh citrus notes and the delicacy of luscious figs " Sébastien Martin  Perfumer.

name: fresh-fig
detail: This richly-toned scent captures the essence of fresh Celeste figs mingled with a dewy bouquet of apricot nectar and sensuous ylang-ylang to create a luxurious fragrance. The smooth  creamy notes offer a soft sweetness  while subtle green and earthy elements add an unexpected twist.

name: fig-neroli
detail: The crunch of fresh herbs in a Mediterranean garden in bloom.

name: fleur-de-figuier-eau-de-parfum
detail: Discover the bliss of an early evening spent in the Mediterranean garden of Esterel. This Eau de Parfum is a precious distillation of natural essences that reveals the intensity and sensuality of a sun-ripened fig heart. The mouth-watering and contrasting fresh notes enhance the accord of candied fig  musk and patchouli  for a truly relaxing effect.

name: premier-figuier-1
detail: Premier Figuier marks an innovative milestone in the history of perfume. Imagine lying under the shade of a magnificent fig tree in the south of France. The fresh leaves  milky sap  warm air  sweet fruit  and even the cool shade cast beneath this tree were all captured for this scent. The magic of this fragrance also lies in the dreamlike quality it evokes of sensual layers of light  movement and scent.

name: fico-nero
detail: A tribute to Sardinia  to its extraordinary landscapes that pulsate with beauty wherever you go. An island that smells of Mediterranean nature  emotion for the eyes. The fragrance of the Black Chia Fig  sweet  soft and fruity excellence.

name: fleur-de-figuier-intense
detail: Inspired by a late summer afternoon in the heart of the Esterel  in the Mediterranean. It reveals all the sensuality of a fig heart heated in the sun.

name: grape-pearls-1
detail: When the wind blows  opening the doors of Autumn and drying the leaves  it carries the scent of grape with it. It enraptures the senses with its sweet scent and the perfection of pearls kissing the lips of those who taste its clusters. Grape Pearls is the song of life and the positive energy that vibrates within.

name: luxury-n7-1
detail: Luxury Nº7 is a and extraordinary and luxurious perfume for the sophisticated and woman who knows and appreciates the finer things in life.

name: al-reda-1
detail: A creation with profound tranquillity and amalgamation of emotion. A delightful concoction that imbibes the wearer in its heavenly cocoon. Al Reda is for the man and woman who enjoy profound satisfaction and exuberance by using fine blends that create an everlasting impression.

name: lady-tubereuse-1
detail: An intense  provocative and hypnotic fragrance  inspired by the most enigmatic femme fatale in history  Mata Hari. Her dark eyes  as deep as the ocean's abysses  her body undulates with infinite grace between the floating veils and sultry gazes  telling of secret loves and desires  sweeping us toward the magnetic and mysterious Orient  which cannot be reached with the eyes. A scent that remains even after she's left  leaving behind her trail of mystery and voluptuousness.

name: en-lace
detail: Why is lace so fascinating? At its best  it’s a form of art. In ancient times women would express their creativity mostly with meticulous and patient handwork that would be taken for granted. Lace is precious  sensuous  and delicate  it imitates women’s intimate clothing. Its downside can easily become popular  excessive  and vulgar  but we only see its great  intricate beauty that resembles the apparently simple beauty of flowers.

name: ungaro-pink
detail: An elegant perfume for the sophisticated and alluring Ungaro woman.

name: kallisto-1
detail: The musky scent of Kallisto for her will take you to the land of dreams this Ramadan.

name: kind-of-blue
detail: Kind of Blue by Xerjoff JT is the perfume of musical fascination  like the jazz notes that inspired it  in a captivating concord of inspired composition. Kind of Blue has modern metropolitan rhythms with retro notes that Xerjoff has distilled into a seductive perfume.

name: daily-romance-1
detail: Daily Romance transports us to a delicate and feminine world in a delicate cloud of perfume.

name: mazaaji
detail: Mazaaji is a bright  shimmering  white floral fragrance.

name: al-athal
detail: This glorious fragrance awakens memories of heady smoke trails steeped with traditional aromatic incense  and combined with precious notes to create a warm and cocooning feel.

name: coffee-white-flowers-1
detail: Eccentric perfume with an enigmatic trail power. The sensual notes evoke an addictive union of smells and reflect the quintessence of this extravagant composition.

name: cars
detail: Lightning McQueen is a little red racing car who discovers the true meaning of family and friendship. He lives by the philosophy "In life  the journey is more important than the goal". With this fresh fragrance  you will experience exciting adventures.

name: rehlat
detail: Rehlat is the perfect scent for any occasion.

name: onyx-pearl-1
detail: Inspired by the intriguing visual imagery of Guy Bourdain  this flacon holds a suggestive and vibrant composition of natural fragrance using the finest raw materials.

name: rosa-damascena
detail: A fresh and spontaneous rose inspired by the concoctions of petals and crumpled leaves that our perfumer Amandine Clerc-Marie used to make in her family garden as a child. A rose that gives an impression of botanical purity and a slightly spicy floral signature.

name: gelsomino
detail: Gelsomino fragrance is a sweet  delicate  feminine single note scent. The jasmine plant originated in Persia where it was once used to make a scented oil. Arabs brought it to Italy around the 9th century  where it was used in medieval Florence hanging gardens. Tuscan brides used to wear a garland of jasmine flowers on their head for their wedding day. Jasmine symbolizes sensuality.

name: bijan
detail: An award-winning fragrance  Bijan was created for the woman with an inborn taste for perfection. Capturing the essence of elegance and style

name: rem-eau-de-parfum
detail: Built around an ever-present marine note (a signature of the REM brand) with a fresh twist of blossoming pink flowers  creating a sensual and warm background. A remarkable  refined and noble fragrance.

name: do-not-disturb-1
detail: This exclusive scent was created to capture the glamorous heyday of Hollywood  recalling scenes of Marilyn Monroe and the Rat Pack drinking cocktails at the Beverly Hills Hotel. Not your typical floral  a fragrance at once confident and alluring.

name: donna
detail: "The rose is the queen of all flowers. In Donna  I mixed Bulgarian roses and Rose de Mai with other precious and noble flowers to obtain the quintessence of femininity " Lorenzo Villoresi  Perfumer.

name: devastatingly-chic-1
detail: Devastatingly Chic is inspired by Mrs. Vreeland's love of fashion love of fashion and her unique  adventurous style. Credited with being the first fashion editor  she pushed the boundaries of fashion as a transformative experience empowering women's artistic and creative worlds.

name: sacrebleu-intense
detail: Spicy and ambery oriental  the intense version of the classic Sacrebleu floral has been infused with more spice and more seduction. A more complete execution of this famed floral.

name: noble-rose-of-afghanistan
detail: Noble Rose of Afghanistan is not your grandmother's rose fragrance. This is a spicy blend  for the female who is not waiting for permission to speak truth to power. It's fast becoming a favourite of young women finding their voice.

name: new-york-nights-1
detail: It is incandescent. It is luminescent. It is New York Nights  Bond No. 9's celebration of Manhattan's night skyline  ablaze with an explosion of colour. Human beings are creatures drawn to light. We are also drawn to seductive fragrances. Both come together in this festive fragrance.

name: flowerful-opulent-rose-1
detail: Flowerful Opulent Rose is a perfume inspired by abundant  beautiful  blooming floral bouquets. A voluptuous bouquet of enchanting roses.

name: wild-pears
detail: The sweetness of the pear is animated by the citrus  heightened by flowers  supported by woody notes  feminized by the generous gourmand and the sensual Musky notes.

name: floral-romantique
detail: Floral Romantique is a floral tribute: the soul of flowers with only a hint of exuberance. Delicately and finely composed by Thierry Wasser  this new elixir achieves the perfect balancing act  a beautiful harmony. In this scent  the “romantic” element guides the fragrance to heartfelt beauty and longing.

name: apres-londee
detail: The embodiment of delicacy and sensibility  Après l'Ondée paints  like a figurative perfume  the fragrant picture of a rural landscape suddenly bathed in sunshine after rain.

name: italiano-vivo-donna-1
detail: Blending timeless Italian elegance with bewitching innocence in this fragrance.

name: lair-du-temps-eau-de-toilette
detail: A legendary fragrance that embodies romance and harmony. A unique and original combination of contrasts. Freshness and delicacy combined with a sensual and feminine fragrance that leaves behind an incredibly alluring trail.

name: vanderbilt-1
detail: A timeless and refined scent  not unlike the woman who wears it.

name: al-abiq
detail: Like the petals of a flower unfolding their secrets and scents  Al Abiq starts with warm notes  then blooms to reveal a woody base which further enhances the mystery and complexity.

name: funeral-home
detail: Funeral Home is a blend of classic white flowers including lilies  carnations  gladiolus  chrysanthemums with stems and leaves  with a hint of mahogany and oriental carpet.

name: gone-with-the-smell-1
detail: Love is not a feeling. Nor an emotion. Or energy. Love is us. Me. And. You. Gone with the smell.

name: rose-america
detail: Let's close our eyes for a moment. There is a house in front of the sea. It is summer. The key is turned; there is silence and darkness. The chills open towards the light and the sun flickers. Upstairs  the first rooms begin to come to life. The windows open and suddenly an aroma surprises you. A pink breeze mingles with the clean smell of fresh sheets. It's the beginning of a long month of holidays and memory-making.

name: floro-1
detail: Floro  an enchanting elixir that pulls no punches  will win the hearts of men and women alike. The place of honour goes to the formidable secret weapons that each flower deploys to seduce or simply trap its prey. Charming.

name: kids-era-uma-vez-1
detail: Babysitting moments can turn into a very fun adventure just like in children's stories! Eudora Kids Era Uma Vez will make your moments with the little ones even more special.

name: f-vibes-for-man
detail: Fila F-Vibes for Man is a fragrance with hints of exotic notes mixed to create a wonderful symphony.

name: chic-retro-1
detail: Chic opens its wardrobe and invites you to discover the main styles and fashion icons that have marked an era  which has set unforgettable trends throughout history. This time  Chic Retrô with its geometric prints  lined eyes and hair bows worn by women who expressed the youthful spirit and feminine freedom that only has the charm of that era.

name: apple-love
detail: A fragrance love letter to NYC  the energy  sophistication and headiness of this iconic city  Apple Love is a signature= scent bursting with juicy yet chic accords.
ingredients: ['Red Apple', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Sugar Cane', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Osmanthus', 'Plum Blossom', 'Mandarin', 'Peach', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)']

name: be-delicious-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: DKNY Be Delicious Eau de Toilette is everything you love about Be Delicious only lighter  brighter and more refreshing.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Red Apple', 'Cucumber', 'Magnolia', 'Rose', 'Tuberose', 'Violet', 'Amber', 'Grapefruit', 'Sandalwood', 'Skin Accord', 'Woody Notes']

name: maritime-1
detail: A fresh  invigorating fragrance for the spirited explorer  Tommy Bahama Maritime blends aromatic botanicals with intriguing complexity for a scent that evokes warm trade winds over crystal clear waters. Fueled by an unhindered passion for discovery and adventure  the Maritime man's ultimate relaxation and fulfilment can be found through the exploration of the seas.
ingredients: ['Clary Sage', 'Water Lily', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Geranium', 'Lavender', 'Ambergris', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Jasmine', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Pink Pepper', 'Red Apple', 'Sandalwood', 'Violet Leaves']

name: imari-blossom-1
detail: Awaken your sensuality with Imari Blossom  a tantalising composition created from sparkling fruits and deep  majestic background chords.

name: ralph-love
detail: "Remember when you had a crush on someone whose idea of a date was a walk on the beach? Ralph Love has that same kind of easy  fun spirit " Ralph Lauren.

name: leaves
detail: A warm fragrance that is spiced  fruity and oh-so cosy (basically everything you love about fall).

name: eden-juicy-apple-01
detail: "I wanted to create something that would transport me back to high school in the USA. A scent that’s really youthful  playful  fresh  and sweet " Mona Kattan  co-Founder.

name: elixir-11
detail: Passionate about the concept of layering  or the art of layering fragrances  Huda and Mona Kattan wanted to offer every woman the opportunity to make her own perfume. Elixir|11 is a fragrance that stands out for its powerful trail.

name: imari-rouge
detail: Self-confidence is my strength. I go after what I want. More sensual than red  I express myself through a different colour because you will see  hear and feel me in rouge.

name: mademoiselle-jacadi-petite-libellule
detail: A fragrance as floral and fruity as a summer garden.

name: x-se-popper-pop
detail: It's that short but intense effect that liberates your mind and makes you shake your head with madness. Thirty seconds of psychedelic imagination  of ascents and descents towards unexpected colours and geometric patterns  far from the lucid and everyday experience.

name: apple-pie-1
detail: A subtle  single note cologne that recaptures all pleasant experiences and memories.

name: clean-apple-blossom
detail: This succulent scent was inspired by nature’s mouthwatering green apples and their fragrant spring blossoms that kiss the crisp air. ‎

name: apple-brandy-new-york
detail: A liquor of woods with a very distinctive personality.

name: 201-apple-driftwood
detail: The olfactory facet 201 is a captivating fragrance created around fruity notes of apple in combination with accords of jasmine petals and white flowers. The composition is fresh and crisp on a warm musky base with a light aromatic finish.

name: rose-apple
detail: Enveloping  sensual  and elegant.

name: vanille-pomme
detail: Let yourself be enchanted by this fragrance that transports you to the heart of a kitchen  where an apple and vanilla tart is slowly baking in the oven.

name: apple-blossom
detail: Experience The Library of Fragrance's Apple Blossom  a warm  delicate floral scent with just a hint of sweet apple. Close your eyes. Take a whiff and breathe in the irresistible aromas.

name: one-man-show
detail: Every man's life is a one-man show. One Man Show A modern fragrance gives more character to the man who wears it. Are you ready for this seductive fragrance?

name: cedre-noble-1
detail: Cèdre Noble is a noble  woody scent inspired by the majestic tree that exists in the forest. A seductive fragrance of rare elegance and understated luxury.

name: bois-royal-1
detail: On the road again... towards Lebanon. A walk through the cedar forests... a fragrance that vibrates through the vivacity and sparkle of the green and aromatic top notes  sublimated by enveloping herbaceous notes in the heart notes. The woody base notes bring a discreet elegance and mysterious intensity.

name: the-infidels-1
detail: If it were only a gleaming fantasy  gushing in the darkness  It would have dried up in the day. But it became a play with smiles  hesitation  and glances  which grew into a desire. The desire blossomed into a shivering flower of lost control  breaking a solemn promise  and doing apart. Cutting love in half.

name: teia
detail: The titan Theia (Teia) represents the most resplendent force in the universe. It gives birth to the sun  a source of life and luminous energy  capable of releasing its fragrances into the world and radiating joy  just like the extract contained in this precious bottle.

name: dasos-1
detail: In the Greek mythology of Titan  Dasos represents the forest and the spirit of nature it encloses. The mystery of this enchanted forest is encapsulated in a drop of magical perfume that will provoke intense and seductive emotions in those who have the temerity to venture into this aphrodisiac scent.

name: vittoriale-1
detail: The Vittoriale degli Italiani is one of the most evocative places in the world  almost a city within a city  a green and landscaped space on Lake Garda  created by the genius of the great writer Gabriele D'Annunzio. It is made up of many spaces: the park  the amphitheatre and many rooms inside the huge villa where relics  souvenirs  memorabilia and traces of his "extravagant" lifestyle are kept. The fragrance narrates these spaces where everything is unusual and mystical. A fragrance with a haunting sensuality.

name: wezen-harrods-exclusive
detail: An unforgettable scent inspired by the most mysterious star in the constellation of Canis Major.

name: amber-sahara
detail: Amber Sahara is beautifully made and carries an abundance of elegance.

name: oudh-al-boruzz-atheer-cambodia
detail: Oudh Al Boruzz Atheer Cambodia is a perfume that is as full of ancient mystique and opulence as it is of modern-day sophistication.

name: alexandria-ii
detail: Inspired by the ancient Arabian art of perfumery  Alexandria II is a scent steeped in history and rich culture.

name: palazzo
detail: The exquisite Italian palazzo reveals its grand facades. Its fountains sparkle with citrus light while its gardens blossom with romance. Rose  orange blossom  peony  and white flowers float in harmony as we enter a palace ornated with endless luxury. The fragrance is an ode to duality  where an oud velvet contrasts the textured musk of marble statues.

name: adhara-harrods-exclusive
detail: A succulent scent inspired by the most dazzling star in the universe.
ingredients: ['Oud (Cambodia)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Tuberose', 'Ambergris', 'Bitter Orange', 'Caramel', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Magnolia', 'Orchid', 'Patchouli']

name: aurica-1
detail: To celebrate the Chinese New Year of the Rat  Aurica is a pure  sweet and soft perfume. But don't be fooled  it's also full of intention and ambition. Its scent is long-lasting and will leave your skin tingling with anticipation.

name: velvet-oud-15
detail: Velvet Oud is a scent that evokes memories and introduces a new level of luxury to those who appreciate the extraordinary.

name: black-noir
detail: Black Noir is a fragrance of oriental mystique  its heart filled with a rare oud meticulously selected by Mancera.

name: kronos
detail: There is a darkness within Kronos and it is my favourite. Undoubtedly the most famous Titan in mythology  Kronos is the most powerful son of Uranus  the controller of time and its flow. Able to manipulate space and dominate the entire universe.

name: tughra
detail: A luxurious and mysterious scent inspired by the Ottoman culture. Exclusive to Beymen.

name: oud-masira
detail: A homage to Masira  a kitesurfing paradise and a top-class nightlife spot in front of Oman

name: coffee-break-golden-dallah-1
detail: Golden Dallah is dedicated to the Arabic coffee culture. As a matter of fact  Dallah is the name of the traditional Arabic coffee pot used for centuries to brew and serve a spicy  bitter coffee traditionally served during feasts like Eid al-Fitr.

name: themis-1
detail: Inspired by Greek mythology  from the creative vision of Paolo and Tiziana Terenzi  always able to combine tradition and innovative research  comes a new creation  Themis. Titaness of justice and balance  she was the emblem of unshakable solidity  just like the extraordinary persistence of this fragrance.

name: coffee-break-golden-moka
detail: Golden Moka is a truly tantalising explosion of rich coffee and enlivening citrus.

name: oud-cambodi-7
detail: With the authentic Oud Cambodi  you can create a luxurious aura of elegance that embodies a serene spirit.

name: lillipur
detail: A country where history  civilisation  and myths intertwine  Nepal places the traveller in cosmic time  perfect for exploring the soul and discovering one's innermost self. Lillipur is a spectacular agglomeration of temples. Standing out among them is the incredibly beautiful Golden Temple. Here  in every corner  huge braziers burn with incense to aid meditation. Lillipur is considered one of the most spiritual places on Earth.
ingredients: ['Carnation', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Tobacco Accord', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Cedarwood (Lebanon)', 'Amber', 'Benzoin', 'Cinnamon', 'Cyclamen', 'Galbanum', 'Sichuan Pepper', 'Thyme', 'Tonka Bean', 'Birch', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Star Anise', 'Wormwood']

name: royal-oud-1
detail: A dream perfume from the pages of the Arabian Nights  Royal Oud is a scent that dazzles all the senses with its evocation of the rosy Persian dawn. The mysterious sounds of the night give way to the exotic awakening of a new day redolent of all the scents of the gorgeous East.

name: giullare
detail: This fragrance is a tribute to humour and fun. With its essence  it invites us to balance the pleasant and playful aspects of potentially daring situations.

name: ferrari-cedar-essence-1
detail: Scuderia Ferrari Cedar Essence draws inspiration by the resinous Cedarwood from Lebanon and its slightly aromatic needles of vibrant blue color. It also exudes a scent of freedom when ocean sprays drop along the road where connoisseurs ride their Ferraris.

name: leon-1
detail: Leon was created to celebrate the artist Leon Battista Alberti. Leon represents stylistic elegance with a touch of mystery.

name: encke-1
detail: Encke is one of the most famous and brightest comets in the cosmos. Thanks to its trail of stardust  this comet is also well known for having generated two meteorite swarms visible in the northern hemisphere from June to July and then again in November. Encke is a creation of a regal character that can be appreciated by those who love to be simply unique and dazzling  wearing the trail of an exclusive comet!

name: versace-woman
detail: A perfect blend of fashion and fragrance  a magical instrument of seduction  an indispensable pleasure.

name: noble-potion-1
detail: Describing Mediterranean beauty through olfactory sensations  led me to seek the most tactile essences. Noble Potion embodies the smooth sensuality of the finest ingredients  making the wearer both attractive and mysterious. A true feminine aphrodisiac.

name: malatesta
detail: Malatesta is inspired by the essence of nobility and strength characteristic of the Malatesta family  one of the most important in Italian history. An elegant and seductive creation that encapsulates the spirit of royalty in a drop of perfume.

name: kenzo-jungle-pour-homme
detail: The desire for freedom  space and strong emotions resonates in Kenzo Jungle pour Homme.

name: rosso-pompei
detail: A persuasive and mysterious emotion envelops him completely in his arcane  making his charm as irresistible and unforgettable as the mythical atmosphere of Pompeii.

name: liquid-crystal
detail: Melted glass sensation  luxurious feeling on your skin. When the hot melted glass slowly but intensely changes in shape and suddenly freezes and solidifies for eternity.
