Practically forgotten in this country  with its slightly exotic appearance  rhubarb has a tart and tangy fragrance that blends harmoniously with the soothing and intensive aroma of healing sage.

name: lost-cause
detail: Chic and adventurous  Lost Cause evokes the restless spirit and cool confidence of wanderlust.

name: electric-rhubarb
detail: If you could bottle that feeling of laughing and sipping perfectly chilled Prosecco on a balmy summer's afternoon - this would be it. Bubbly  effervescent and a little bit unexpected  it's the perfect party guest of the fragrance world.

name: away-weekend-woman
detail: A sweet and summery scent to escape for a while.

name: 1902-pivoine-rhubarbe-1
detail: A delicate and romantic eau de toilette  Pivoine & Rhubarbe combines fruity notes with sharp accents.

name: le-parfum-dalice
detail: The brief was deceptively simple: create a fragrance with blackcurrant buds at its heart. More than 100 young perfumers from 20 countries around the world entered the competition  but the judges' decision was unanimous and  at the World Perfumery Congress in Deauville  Alice was awarded the prestigious prize. Marie Lise Bischoff  creator of the Nejma brand  fell in love with Alice's creation and decided that she wanted to produce it as an independent fragrance under the Nejma banner. Marie Lise was determined to raise awareness of this talented young perfumer and the fragrance not only bears Alice's name  but also her signature on the box.

name: series-5-sherbet-rhubarb
detail: Rhubarb in the Sherbet range is a memorable fragrance created to savour the freshness  that makes you want to try it. To taste it!

name: eau-de-rhubarbe-ecarlate
detail: "When you work with rhubarb stalks  you reproduce simple  age-old gestures  the sent bursts forth. I have always liked the duality of rhubarb. It is a two-fold duality  both visual and olfactory. Its green colour metamorphoses into red. From acidic and crisp  its scent becomes smooth and velvety "  Christine Nagel  Perfumer.

name: delicious-rhubarb-rose-eau-de-toilette
detail: A slice of crimson summer tart. Freshly picked roses on the pantry table. Scattered pastry crumbs and glossy ribbons of rhubarb stem  Treat your senses to an irresistibly sweet recipe with a citrus twist.

name: sensory
detail: This fragrance expresses a new world where you can rediscover your full potential.
ingredients: ['Moss', 'Rhubarb', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Patchouli', 'Peach', 'Pink Pepper', 'Raspberry', 'Rose', 'Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Iris / Orris', 'Musk']

name: helioflora
detail: Granita  called "granité" in French  also called "granita Siciliana" in Italian  is a refreshing semi-frozen dish typical of Sicily. It comes in an intermediate consistency between that of sherbet and crushed ice. Its current manufacture involves the partial freezing of a constantly stirred mixture of water  ice and fruit or other tasty ingredients...

name: tangy-rhubarb-2021
detail: The unmistakable tang of unruly rhubarb plucked from the overgrown garden. Its bright and striking stems fill the bustling kitchen. Rhubarb brings a characterful heart to this eccentric fragrance  complemented by zesty citruses and an elegant note of precious woods.

name: vida-loca-for-her
detail: Vida Loca is the ideal scent for women and girls who know how to enjoy life but never forget about the planet.

name: patchouli-indulgence-1
detail: Patchouli Indulgence evokes the silhouette of an unforgettable woman  like the enchantment of an exotic night. Its enigmatic character is linked to the hypnotic blend of aromatic spices  feminine flowers and woods.
ingredients: ['Patchouli', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Spicy Notes', 'Rose', 'Violet', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Pink Pepper', 'Sichuan Pepper']

name: like-father-like-son
detail: A refreshing yet warm scent to remember the special emotions experienced between a father and a son.

name: refined-woods
detail: This scent is built around iconic perfumery ingredients that transport you to exotic places. Inspired by David’s love of taking to the open road to explore different landscapes  cultures and cuisines  this warm and sensual scent is a celebration of travel and discovery  where the journey is the reward.

name: dark-matcha
detail: An unexpected note of spicy green tea with bergamot and fig  as refreshing as a cup of matcha.

name: cristal-and-gold-man-2023
detail: Celebrating 40 years of high perfumery  Amouage transcends time to showcase a piece of its glorious past  the first Amouage crystal bottle ever to exist: Cristal & Gold. The bottle treasures a precious perfume that transports its wearer back to the birth of the House of Amouage and to the cradle of perfumery: the majestic lands of the Sultanate of Oman.

name: musc-satin-1
detail: A gourmand composition  sweet and slightly tangy.

name: nymphaea
detail: An extraordinary olfactory trip exalting the beautiful lotus flower. A fresh  floral and fascinating experience. Following a lively floral heart  the notes in the base are sheer and seductive  sealing this beautiful creation.

name: cristal-and-gold-woman-2023
detail: Celebrating 40 years of high perfumery  Amouage transcends time to showcase a piece of its glorious past  the first Amouage crystal bottle ever to exist: Cristal & Gold. The bottle treasures a precious perfume that transports its wearer back to the birth of the House of Amouage and to the cradle of perfumery: the majestic lands of the Sultanate of Oman.

name: eclat-blanc-2021-1
detail: Both sparkling and warm  this elegant eau de toilette is a Parisian winter wonderland encapsulated in a bottle.

name: spicy-rose
detail: Spicy Rose expresses ultra femininity in all its splendour  a declaration of love at once fresh  spicy and generous.

name: mauboussin-pour-lui-in-red
detail: Underneath its scarlet red appearance  In Red reveals surprising and charismatic facets. Somewhere between vintage and avant-garde  it evokes the fantasy of the ideal man  the James Bond of modern times: the perfect duality between gentleman and “bad boy”!

name: overtake-320-2
detail: Inspired by the rush and focus experienced when overtaking on demanding corners!
ingredients: ['Tonka Bean', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Pepper', 'Vanilla', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Iris / Orris', 'Geranium', 'Salty', 'Bergamot', 'Cinnamon', 'Fenugreek', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Metallic Notes', 'Patchouli', 'Vetiver']

name: show-me-love-2022-1
detail: Show Me Love is a women's perfume with real star power  for a sophisticated blend of sensuality and gourmandise. With this bold and alluring perfume  waiting in the wings is not an option. This is your moment to pull back the curtain  step on stage and shine like a Broadway star.

name: villa-neroli-1
detail: Villa Néroli is a sunny and citrusy fragrance inspired by the island of Capri in Italy

name: hidden-corner-of-fontana-dei-baci
detail: This scent evokes the elegant and majestic Fontana dei Baci in Milan  one of the hidden gems of this beautiful city.

name: les-fleurs-de-lanvin-blue-orchid
detail: A daring scent with a soft and comforting sillage.

name: kyoto-2021-1
detail: The journey stops in Kyoto  the cradle of Ikebana. The dream becomes possible by taking up the codes of this secular floral art in a subtly balanced perfume.

name: bois-de-cypres
detail: "To create this perfume  I drew on the stunning Tuscan countryside as my inspiration  more specifically the cypress trees that stand proudly on the hills around Siena. Caressed by sunshine  they assert their strong personality whilst refreshing the surrounding countryside. I have always been fascinated by the sacred cypress tree. In Italy  they can often be found near churches and historic palaces " Alexandra Carlin  Perfumer.

name: tonka-blanc-1
detail: "Vegetables express a dimension of pleasure and comfort. I was inspired by naturopathic chef Jennifer Hart-Smith's exceptional cheesecake  in which cauliflower combines extraordinarily well with vanilla  coconut and tonka bean. The main challenge was to capture the aroma. Tonka Blanc is the first fragrance on the market to contain a natural plant extract and I am very proud of that " Alexandra Carlin  perfumer.

name: velvet-tonka
detail: "For Velvet Tonka  I wanted to pay homage to my Moroccan origins but also to the iconography linked to this region of the world  through its flavors and landscapes  like a gourmet breath coming straight from the Atlas mountains " David Benedek  Founder.

name: insignia
detail: This unique fragrance is inspired by the Garter star  which the Royal Navy gave to King George VI of the United Kingdom in 1923. An exceptional fragrance for exceptional people.

name: bloomastral-1
detail: An evocation of festive evenings on the French Riviera. A tribute to the most unique jasmine: the Galant de Nuit  which reveals its perfume only at nightfall.

name: maiden-orange-blossom
detail: A reinterpretation of a classic eau de toilette. The scent of orange blossom is vibrant and sparkling  transporting you to the shores of the Mediterranean.

name: eau-de-lierre-eau-de-toilette
detail: Ivy (Lierre) is a symbol of loyalty and attachment  but its scent cannot be extracted. Its green scent must be recreated and its trail reinforced. Eau de Lierre is a fresh and slightly marine accord  as herbaceous as the green sap running up a vine.

name: ivyme-1
detail: "In this perfume  I wanted to play with the green colour of ivy. It is an extremely stubborn and invasive plant. Hence the strength of the Ivyme perfume  this green harmonised by the pink essence and musks"  Alienor Massenet  Perfumer.

name: dream-angels-heavenly-1
detail: Capture the radiance. Live the dream. Love the romance of Dream Angels Heavenly fragrance. Luminous and sensual  Dream Angels Heavenly glows in luxurious warmth.

name: black-vines
detail: It smells intriguingly green  evoking images of dark  otherworldly vines that envelop me as I apply it. Followed by the most sinister and utterly intense spicy scent ever encountered  layered with black and green  the drydown evokes the feeling of how Maleficient appeared  wreathed in emerald fire at Sleeping Beauty's wedding feast.

name: lempicka-homme
detail: "I wanted to modernize Lempicka Homme by revisiting the iconic flavor of wood of liquorice. Playing with contrasts  the note combines an intense freshness while expressing a virile multi-faceted sensuality. Between strength and sweetness  the heart swings  causing new emotions to surface." - Annick Ménardo  Perfumer

name: police-to-be-the-illusionist-1
detail: The track of a pure sharp fragrance for men  built around a modern fresh fougere signature conferring self-confidence and a rugged masculine strength.

name: a-capella
detail: The day rises  the light of the sun that wakens me  and in the grand white bed  slowly  I spread my wings and raise my hand to you  the new day that calls.

name: nature-2
detail: The city sleeps  but nature never does. This fragrance is an olfactory glimpse of nature's flourishing flora in close proximity  cheek to cheek  with the human experience of city life as the sun rises on a new day.

name: eau-plurielle-1
detail: A unique eau de toilette with multiple uses. It is the delicate hyphen that perfumes the skin as well as the fabrics that are close to it such as clothes or linen. Its light mist evokes the scent of a fresh sheet lying on a bed of ivy and Turkish roses.

name: dream-angels-heavenly-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Live the dream  love the romance. Be forever luminous in the one and only scent that's been fit for an Angel for 13 years  redesigned with a heavenly new look. Spritz over pulse points for a touch of angelic scent anywhere  anytime.

name: jared-lang
detail: This fresh  modern fragrance has the perfect blend of woody and aromatic notes that make it effortlessly sexy. A warm  intoxicating scent that is truly addictive.

name: jordan-by-michael-1
detail: Combining talent and sophistication to a new level  Jordan by Michael represented the strength that Michael had both on the courts and in the boardroom.
ingredients: ['Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Woody Notes', 'Ivy', 'Oak', 'Sandalwood', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Cardamom', 'Jasmine', 'Mandarin', 'Nutmeg', 'Clary Sage', 'Black Pepper', 'Green Leaves']

name: melancholy-thistle-2023
detail: Bold and bright melancholy thistles guard a long-abandoned castle in the Scottish Highlands. Entwined with a green freshness  this woody aromatic scent is underpinned by coolwood to summon the ivy-covered stone walls inside a majestic relic.

name: friends-world-for-him
detail: Energetic  fresh and earthy. For the nature lover  he is caring and optimistic with strong emotional values. He is connected to his friends and the world around him. This aromatic tonic fragrance embodies masculinity  loyalty and an affinity with the environment.

name: lei-1
detail: The sophisticated bouquet is a veritable tribute to female beauty  an expression of grace and elegance.

name: bronze-goddess-leau-de-lumiere
detail: Let Bronze Goddess Lumière take you away. Embrace the warmth of a tropical paradise with this sensual fragrance that is as relaxing as it is enticing.

name: princess-eau-fraiche
detail: Princess Eau Fraîche achieves an even higher level of fierce femininity than the original scent with a seductive opening of bergamot adding radiant freshness to the iconic gourmand Princess.

name: attraction-awaken-for-her
detail: Hypnotising fruits beam with a radiant yet tempting dose of sensuality to help you reclaim your desire for lasting passion.

name: oui-juicy-couture-play-sparkling-rebel
detail: Make your own rules with Sparkling Rebel  a radiant and energetic fragrance from Oui Juicy Couture Play. Say oui (yes) to your boldness without complexes and always be true to who you are and what you believe in.
ingredients: ['Water Lily', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Praline', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Pear', 'Violet Leaves', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood']

name: mystic-geranium
detail: Mystic Geranium captures the essence of joy. Serene and idyllic  in harmony with nature  it is one of five scents in the Essence of Dreams collection  celebrating the power of dreams.

name: rose-de-grasse-rouge-2023
detail: Rose de Grasse Rouge captures the vitality of a red rose in full bloom.

name: mediterranean-honeysuckle-clementina-2023
detail: Escape to the Amalfi Coast with Mediterranean Honeysuckle Clementina. Radiant and luminous  this limited edition fragrance was inspired by the carefree spirit of the Amalfi Coast. A floral citrus fragrance that evokes the feelings of a summer escape  Clementina takes you to a place of pure energy and optimism-the kind of feeling you get when you arrive at your holiday destination and summer begins.

name: boss-alive-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: Boss Alive Intense is a captivating Eau de Parfum that celebrates the lust for life and the boldness of women everywhere. Created for individuals who dare to embrace the unexpected and explore new opportunities  this powerful scent acts as an inspiration to live life to the fullest  every day.

name: rose-in-wild-1
detail: A natural scent with an elegant trail.

name: bronze-goddess-nuit
detail: As the sun sets on a private island paradise  a sensational landscape of endless beaches is illuminated under the stars. With Estée Lauder Bronze Goddess Nuit  twilight is yours to enjoy.
ingredients: ['Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Pepper', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Lady Of The Night Flower', 'Bergamot', 'Tonka Bean', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Coconut', 'Salty']

name: cherry-in-japan-2022-1
detail: Escada invites girls to immerse themselves in dynamic  effervescent Tokyo and discover true cherry blossom mania. The city's bright neon lights signal the start of a breathtaking experience like no other  as the cherry blossoms rain down on them in the midst of a playful adventure.

name: attraction-the-game-for-her-1
detail: Make It Happen for Her  the most seductive and irresistible feminine fragrance. A unique scent that plays with tension. After all  it's a game!

name: dance-midnight-muse-2022-1
detail: Midnight Muse was inspired by Shakira's iconic dance moves. An intimate  brilliant and inspiring version that represents a confident  strong woman.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Pear', 'Vanilla', 'Cream (Chantilly)', 'Heliotrope', 'Bergamot', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Pink Pepper', 'Musk', 'Woody Ambery Note']

name: cafe-chantant
detail: Even ladies  regularly attending the Cafes had fun by imitating the gestures and clothing of those women who drove so crazy their men... the “Sciantose”. A full-Italian folk  which flavour delivers pleasure to everyone.

name: tonka-cola
detail: Tonka Cola is an encounter  a story that no one will find in books  but that only perfumery can write with the ink of fragrance. The fragrance will immediately immerse you  through the magic of high perfumery  in the memory of tasty delicacies. Soft and captivating  pop and elegant  Tonka Cola will catch you in the moment.

name: gio-antonelli-intenso-1
detail: Giovanna Antonelli  one of the greatest Brazilian actresses  is known for her contagious smile  relaxed attitude and elegance. This scent reflects her intense and powerful essence and is perfect for modern and happy women.

name: le-fabuleux
detail: Fabulous  tempting and sensational.

name: attraction-desire-for-him
detail: Attraction Desire for Him fans the flames of desire and allows you to go the extra mile to rekindle your most intimate cravings. Feel the power of true attraction from the very first moment with this indulgent and highly seductive fragrance.

name: lolita-lempicka-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: For women who really adore the Lolita universe! The perfumers accentuated the floral notes adding an oriental twist.

name: lost-cherry-1
detail: Tom Ford Lost Cherry is a full-blown journey into the once forbidden  a contrasting scent that reveals a tempting dichotomy of playful  candy-like gleam on the outside and luscious flesh on the inside.

name: vicebomb
detail: Vicebomb is the essence of twilight vice: intense and overwhelming.

name: fire-me-up-1
detail: Experience luscious ruby red pomegranate spiked with bold black cherry and the sensuality of amber feel the exhilaration!

name: roman-fruit-sellers-2022
detail: "I visited Rome in the oppressive July heat with all the other American tourists. One day I was walking through winding ancient streets and came upon the fiore de campo. For 150 years  it has been filled with vendors selling luscious Italian fruits all arranged in beautiful boxes. Colours  fragrances and sweet flavours are everywhere. This fume is that experience. I've never made something so fruity gourmand " David Seth Moltz  Perfumer.

name: wild-cherry-1
detail: Wild Cherry offers a bold  lush and deep nature and an intense and mystical sillage.

name: la-petite-robe-noire-ma-premiere-robe-2016-1
detail: For this limited edition  the artists Kuntzel+Deygas have drawn La Petite Robe Noire playing with the colours of her new lipstick. It is a delicious  mischievous  and irresistible fruity-floral Eau de Parfum embroidered of the most beautiful "black" notes of perfumery.

name: party-love-2023
detail: Inspired by euphoric moments of fun and fantasy  Party Love is a decadent eau de parfum infused with the energy of the dance floor  making it the perfect finishing touch to any party look.

name: the-blend
detail: A fragrance to inspire you to build your own stories. To appreciate the moments that matter with the intensity they deserve! Made for the man who appreciates elegance and sophistication  who cultivates simplicity without giving up exclusivity.

name: man
detail: Jequiti Man é was inspired by the attributes of a modern man with a balance between strength and sensitivity. A virtuous  authentic  and versatile man. A man who respects his values and true relationships.

name: vivre-jeito-leve
detail: A fresh citrus fragrance with a velvety floral body. A light way of living.

name: jolie-delicate
detail: Jolie Delicate celebrates the simple things in life  connection with nature  romanticism and the delicacy of a young woman.

name: nuit-dazar
detail: A vibrant fragrance inspired by the ancient Persian tradition of Yalda. The unique aroma surrounds you with its powerful warmth.

name: salvaje-urban-1
detail: It is true to its essence. It is irresistible because it is not conventional  its strength is perceived  it is rebellious and determined  it has conviction. Dominate the city.

name: compass-1
detail: Declare your spirit of tropical adventure with our Compass.

name: surreal-paradise
detail: Inspired by the feeling of biting into the mesmerising apple of paradise  this unforgettable scent will transport you to illustrious and vivid memories at every level of the fragrance experience.

name: giovanna-baby-blueberry-1
detail: Giovanna Baby Blueberry is an enchanting and delicate fragrance with engaging and sophisticated notes.

name: brille-mais
detail: A fragrance created especially for strong  determined and sophisticated women  who have a light of their own that radiates and illuminates with glamour and intensity all those around them.

name: fastrack-pulse-for-him
detail: This fragrance is as dynamic as your life  and as modern as your style. Whatever the occasion  go forth  and then further!

name: abraco-a-dois-feminino-1
detail: What does a hug smell like? L'Occitane au Brésil has captured all the softness of a hug in an inspiring and welcoming fragrance. Every hug has a little bit of Brazil in it.

name: vivre-paixao-vibrante
detail: The Vivre line is inspired by the light way of life of the Brazilian woman  bringing a moment of lightness  joy  and passion to her intense routine.

name: surreal-dreams
detail: Embark on a journey through your sweetest memories to your enchanting future with Surreal Dreams. It is the ideal perfume for those who wish to explore dreams and the desire to be loved.

name: eau-des-lys-1
detail: A laughing  joyful  playful perfume with a touch of candor. Eau des Lys is an ode femininity  sweet and delicate.

name: scarlet-lily-1
detail: Voluptuous  full blooms. Rich bouquets of scarlet flowers that capture the spirit of seduction.

name: my-lily-1
detail: My Lily is sophisticated and natural at the same time; a modern fragrance for women who exhale a unique elegance.

name: lys-toscana
detail: "The fresh shadow of the cobbled little streets leads me to this garden. Peaceful sculptures and candid flowers outline this scene conductive to inspiration. White petals carrying by the wind barely touch my face. Symbol of purity  with an unequalled softness  I see it. Its perfume intoxicates me. The Lily from Toscana. Romantic and enchanting." - Mélanie Leroux  Perfumer

name: tiger-lily
detail: What's up Tiger Lily? Demeter's version is sweet  bright medium-volume floral. These flowers are actually native to China and Japan. They flower in July and August; the bloom is orange color and spotted. It does not ripen seed but is propagated from the bulbs produced in the axils of the leaves which should yield flowering bulbs in three years from the time of planting-so if one wants Tiger Lilies  one must be patient.

name: un-lys
detail: A flower inscribed in the memory; a breath of lunar light  the white lily  with its unreal supple marble evokes an imaginary Middle Ages. Radiant  diaphanous  it stirs its solitude into a delicate landscape painted with the infinite patience of a fabulous Book of Hours. Tournaments  duels  battles are fought to possess or destroy it. The lily lights up gold and becomes the symbol of the Kings of France. Its earthly entities. Snow  blood  gold  give birth to a perfume: Un Lys.

name: lys-solaberg-1
detail: Midnight sun  a flow of cognac  a fjord in bloom. A plant canopy  pearly humidity.

name: lys-noir-1
detail: Lys Noir is a mysterious and desirable fragrance dedicated to elegant women with glamorous style and charm.

name: mon-lys-1
detail: Romantic  Mon Lys embodies elegance  refinement and the heights of sophistication. Royal  it is blessed with the gift of natural magnificence  crowned with immaculate petals.

name: perle-de-lys-noir-1
detail: Stirred by spicy notes  La Perle de Lys Noir develops its voluptuous trail through narcotic white flowers. This feminine white bouquet is magnetic before gently wrapping itself in a woody embrace.

name: giglio-di-firenze
detail: Caterina de Medici was an Italian noblewoman who was Queen of France in the 16th century. She had an extraordinary personality and charm. When she moved to France  she brought with her some Florentine perfumes. Giglio di Firenze (The Lily of Florence) was her favourite. It was a wonderful success.

name: lily-ambre
detail: Lily Ambre invites you to the enchanting garden of my childhood.

name: love-lily-1
detail: Lily brings fragrances that value the richness and classic tradition of perfumery  obtained through the extinct technique of fleur de lis enfleurage. Love Lily Eau de Parfum combines the sophistication of the lily with the exclusive great rose  a perfect alchemy that brings a unique and special rose obtained by the interaction of rose essential oils.

name: wild-lily
detail: A scent inspired by the Nyingchi Valley. In May  it's full of white wild lilies. The mountains  winds  streams  and rivers make you feel relaxed like a poetic floral fragrance.

name: lily-absolu
detail: Lily Absolu evokes richness and classic tradition of perfumery  obtained through the extinct enfleurage technique of the lily flower.

name: pur-blanca-hope
detail: This sparkling  radiant scent possesses an exquisite signature that encapsulates the essence of hope.

name: le-chevrefeuille-eau-de-toilette
detail: How dear are the memories of our childhood: there is a sweetness and innocence that belong to this age. The sun shines in the sky  we make floral crowns of honeysuckle. Camille Goutal still remembers carefully braiding them in the family garden. She has chosen to revisit this memory by creating a fresh  verdant  ethereal perfume.

name: honeysuckle-1
detail: In a creative collaboration with the master gardeners at the New York Botanical Garden and renowned perfumer Laurent Le Guernec  Caswell-Massey reimagined the authentic scent of the living honeysuckle that blooms at the New York Botanical Garden.

name: eau-fraiche-chevrefeuille
detail: Yves Rocher has reconstructed the powerful and harmonious freshness of the scent of honeysuckle in this natural and authentic perfume.

name: honeysuckle
detail: This is the scent of honeysuckle on a warm  summer day  experienced while driving down a country road about 45 miles/hour with the windows down.

name: caprifoglio
detail: Caprifoglio (Honeysuckle) A sweet and fresh perfume. The common name caprifolium has Latin roots from two terms: “capra” (goat) and “folium” (leaf)  the flower symbolises "a sweet nature" and  because of the plant's tendency to climb and twine around anything in its path  it was also considered the symbol of "lover's ties". Neither exists independently of the other.

name: kim-kardashian-1
detail: A fragrance as voluptuous  sensual and beautiful as Kim herself. TV star  entrepreneur  model  actress and trendsetter  Kim Kardashian has it all. Her fragrance  named after the captivating beauty and magnetic personality that inspired the fragrance  reflects the sensuality  femininity and allure of one of the world's most idolised women.

name: jasmine-honeysuckle
detail: Enlightening  revealing  and encapsulating.

name: mediterranean-honeysuckle
detail: "Everywhere I travel in the Mediterranean  there's a sense of timeless beauty and effortless style. The beautiful blue of the sea and the vibrant contrast of green leaves with the fragrant colourful flowers create the most unforgettable memories. The Mediterranean is a very magical place and a great source of inspiration in my life and my work " Aerin Lauder  Founder.

name: london-for-women-1
detail: This fragrance embodies the elegant  modern spirit of Burberry London. It embodies the cosmopolitan London lifestyle with independence and relaxed confidence. This multi-faceted fragrance with a sparkling top note and sensual dry down is the perfect accessory for the modern woman.

name: mignon-red
detail: Mignon Red is an exotic blend of delicious fruits and exquisite flowers.

name: honeysuckle-davana
detail: Honeysuckle & DavanaA cheerful floral fragrance. Hedgerows buzz with bees and insects. The sunny yellow and soft peach tones of untamed honeysuckle creep across the English countryside  brightening the day and perfuming the night.

name: sweet-orange-honeysuckle
detail: A crystal-clear waterfall in Lebanon. Birds flying around  surrounded by the sacred scent of cedar trees that sensuously combines with the animalistic aromas. The woody notes are shrouded by the intoxicating florals  wafting from the nearby orange trees. Unearthly beautiful.

name: diamond-2
detail: The diamond is of unequalled force. It turns the soul to crystal and imparts strength and opulence.

name: chevrefeuille
detail: A delicate and sparkling Eau de Toilette. Its subtle and harmonious freshness transports you to a sun-drenched garden in the softness of spring.

name: youre-in-i-never-read
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the original perfume Warhol used for a work of art in 1967. The original outrageous fragrance consisted of Coca-Cola bottles spray-painted silver and filled with a citrus perfume. This prompted a cease and desist letter from Coca-Cola  so the project was abandoned. Moving away from Coca-Cola bottles  the reintroduction of this blend is presented in six unique industrial matte silver bottles  each with a whimsical Andy Warhol quote.

name: palm-trees-please
detail: Experience paradise with this tantalising fragrance  you'll feel completely at ease as if lounging under a tropical palm tree oasis.

name: maurice-roucel
detail: An exquisite scent that expresses the essence of Vivinevo's sensual power.

name: cerruti-1881-silver
detail: Cerruti 1881 Silver is as stylish and sensual as ever and resolutely vibrant. It is a fragrance that you wear like a tuxedo in the middle of the day to conquer the intensity of the city!

name: joyeux-osmanthe
detail: The original idea was to create a modern  languid tuberose by mixing it with other flowers. Thus  a creamy bouquet of osmanthus is nestled in a textured woody base.

name: rochas-man-intense
detail: Authentic and unexpected  the Rochas Man Intense trusts his instincts and lives by his own rules. With this intense version  he is writing a new chapter in modern masculinity and revealing his many facets: charming  charismatic  seductive. A captivating character with a magnetic energy that fascinates and enthrals everyone who meets him.

name: youre-in-in-fifteen-minutes
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the original perfume Warhol used for a work of art in 1967. The original outrageous fragrance consisted of Coca-Cola bottles spray-painted silver and filled with a citrus perfume. This prompted a cease and desist letter from Coca-Cola  so the project was abandoned. Moving away from Coca-Cola bottles  the reintroduction of this blend is presented in six unique industrial matte silver bottles  each with a whimsical Andy Warhol quote.

name: musc-ravageur-punk-ltd-ed-2019-1
detail: With the launch of Musc Ravageur in 2000  Les Editions de Parfums Frédéric Malle created this convention-defying Limited Edition perfume; an opus of wild magnetism and opulent sensuality.

name: scuderia-ferrari-forte
detail: A fragrance dedicated to a natural winner  a man who loves competition  power and exclusivity. A man who is looking for high-performance results. He fully expresses the charisma of Ferrari and it's founder. Think like a winner and act like a winner. That way it will be much easier to achieve the goals set.

name: aurien-turquesa-1
detail: Aurien Turquoise sought inspiration from international fine jewellery and brought the beauty of the infinite blue of the sky together in an exuberant stone  turquoise  which through its intensely joyful colour  transports us to the beauties of the Middle East  its place of origin  bringing good luck to the wearer.

name: the-other-side-of-oud-1
detail: The perfect choice for men and women who are not afraid to be noticed  Atkinsons The Other Side of Oud is a bold  intriguing fragrance with clear echoes of the mystique of the Orient.

name: valkyrie-1
detail: "Valkyrie surprises with its freshness thanks to lime  a small Mexican citrus fruit  which makes this fragrance dynamic  but also thanks to basil and mint Ice. Its base notes are warm with notes of wood  sandalwood  and vanilla. Valkyrie is troubling and hard-hitting."

name: rfaro-casual-1
detail: All the charisma and more casual side of Rodrigo Faro in a perfume that translates the irreverent personality of the artist.

name: luminata-1
detail: We are inspired by women who radiate light  who are proud of who they are. They know how to bring happiness and inspire others. That is how this fragrance was born  by the unique light of women and the beauty of crystals.

name: or-damask
detail: How precious and perfect this fragrance is! The quintessence of femininity is an explosion of rose  the queen of flowers  releasing a profusion of old and new emotions. An elegant  passionate and creamy tribute to the magnificence of the rose. So perfect that it moves.

name: uncut-gem
detail: Uncompromising  bold  full of enigmatic charm. Based on the personal cologne of master perfumer Maurice Roucel  Uncut Gem is an unmistakably masculine fragrance  diamond-hard and absolutely fresh.

name: tocade-eau-de-toilette-2018-1
detail: A bold scent! In the Rochas tradition  Tocade is a joyful celebration of daring and happiness. An oriental-floral that introduced the concept of gourmand notes into Haute Parfumerie.

name: my-tuxedo-1
detail: For the first time  Uermi is inspired not by a textile but by a garment  so damn iconic to become a paradigm of elegance  class  and luxury but also adventure  transgression  and desire: the tuxedo. A woman’s imagination runs wild  superimposing images of the ideal gentleman to an irreverent James Bond. Imagination does not stop there and keeps composing flashes of timeless charm: a white shirt  a glass of Bourbon  an aromatic cigar.

name: a-blvd-called-sunset-1
detail: When the forces of nature known as the Santa Ana’s whip down the boulevard  the neon burns a little hotter and everyone walks a bit crooked. These winds are the perfect excuse for wildness. I joyride the strip all the way to the sea  radio blasting  diving into the sunset where Sunset kisses the Pacific. Or maybe I’ll stay in the city  hitting the sun-baked concrete in search of my next big break in this city of angels  fallen or otherwise.

name: jaipur-bouquet
detail: "India is a mysterious country full of wonders. Wealth and opulence. A profusion of flavours  flowers  fruits and woods. All these treasures I saw inspired me to create Jaïpur Bouquet". - Maurice Roucel  Perfumer

name: spicy-vibe
detail: Egeo Spicy Vibe brings the perfect combination of contrasting ingredients that complement each other  resulting in explosive and intense fragrances that provoke the senses.

name: youre-in-if-everybody-is
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the original perfume Warhol used for a work of art in 1967. The original outrageous fragrance consisted of Coca-Cola bottles painted silver and filled with a citrus perfume. This prompted a cease and desist letter from Coca-Cola  so the project was abandoned. Moving away from Coca-Cola bottles  the reintroduction of this blend is presented in six unique industrial matte silver bottles  each with a whimsical Andy Warhol quote.

name: youre-in-i-never-fall-apart
detail: This fragrance is inspired by the original perfume Warhol used for a work of art in 1967. The original outrageous fragrance consisted of Coca-Cola bottles spray-painted silver and filled with a citrus perfume. This prompted a cease and desist letter from Coca-Cola  so the project was abandoned. Moving away from Coca-Cola bottles  the reintroduction of this blend is presented in six unique industrial matte silver bottles  each with a whimsical Andy Warhol quote.

name: byzance-2019
detail: The dazzling combination of fruits at the beginning of this fragrance illuminates its extreme femininity  sculpted by an opulent floral heart. A luminosity and modernity are revealed through exquisite flowers  gently unveiling a seductive base of notes built on an infinite gourmand richness.

name: red-30
detail: Be the life of every party with Red.

name: africano
detail: A luxurious fragrance  Africano captures the essence of adventure and the wild beauty of Africa.
ingredients: ['Artemisia', 'Lavender', 'Amber', 'Basil', 'Cedarwood', 'Geranium', 'Mint', 'Clary Sage', 'Sandalwood', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Bergamot', 'Cinnamon', 'Green Notes', 'Lemon', 'Orange Blossom', 'Patchouli', 'Pineapple', 'Tropical Fruits', 'Violet', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Rose Damascena', 'Herbs ']

name: azzaro-pour-homme-edition-noire-2017
detail: Impeccable taste and the warmth of the sun  the hallmarks of Azzaro Pour Homme. This unique creation embodies its own with remarkable distinction and character. This Eau de Toilette takes its cue from the ultimate in men's formal attire  the black-tie dress code of the well-dressed English gentleman. Striking and mesmerising at the start  then entrancing as the Mediterranean trail penetrates the senses. This is the essence of male seduction.

name: mitico-1
detail: A fragrance that celebrates the inspirational legendary Lamborghini myth of perfection and overall quality.

name: club-6-voyage-1
detail: Club 6 Voyage takes you to the Caribbean without leaving your home! Made for elegant  powerful men who like to be present   Club 6 Voyage brings an unforgettable sensory experience: wherever you go  your presence is noticed!

name: tomboy
detail: Evoking an imaginary garden  the fragrance dazzles with a stunning contrast of hot and cold: an intense aromatic freshness contrasted by the potent warmth of balmy woods.

name: eloge-du-traitre-praise-of-a-traitor-1
detail: He fears neither God nor man. Some battles are worth a few strikes below the belt. Secretly  he tirelessly weaves his web of seduction  and his victims get caught with delight. Friends  lovers  whoever. one only betrays a loved one. True to himself and to his own desires  the traitor is cunning and crafty  but at least he does not lie to himself. This fragrance is a tribute to all the Judas of this world.

name: mercedes-benz-air
detail: The Land  Sea and Air trilogy represents a deeply significant return to the elements. Air brings out our visionary side: our innovation  our imagination  our soaring freedom. The trilogy is a tribute to layering: infinitely customisable  the trio can be worn separately  in harmonious balance  or in your own desired combination.

name: leather-artemisia-2017-1
detail: "When we visited Charleston in the middle of the English countryside  I didn't know what to expect but I fell in love with it. When I was there  I made a storyline in my head from morning to afternoon to evening so the five fragrances have a natural evolution. What I particularly loved about the Bloomsbury Set was the juxtaposition of domesticity and simplicity with this hugely intellectual environment "  Yann Vasnier  Perfumer.

name: catch-me-adventure
detail: This fragrance is for those who crave the excitement of new adventure  and the rush of the unknown and mysterious.
ingredients: ['Artemisia', 'Lavender', 'Geranium', 'Clary Sage', 'Woody Notes', 'Basil', 'Cinnamon', 'Floral Notes', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Cocktail', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Green Notes', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Teak Wood']

name: jazz-la-collection-1
detail: The original classic fragrance housed in a new flacon. Jazz  a vibrating and lively fragrance. A spontaneous and rhythmic scent.An aromatic woody harmony.
ingredients: ['Artemisia', 'Geranium', 'Patchouli', 'Clary Sage', 'Cardamom', 'Cinnamon', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coriander', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Jasmine', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Myrrh', 'Nutmeg', 'Oakmoss', 'Rose', 'Sandalwood']

name: aliage-alliage
detail: Exuberant. Engaging. Brimming with energy. Introduced in 1972  Aliage was an idea ahead of its time. It was called "the sports fragrance " a concept familiar to us now  but absolutely revolutionary at the time. Women were surprised and thrilled by this fresh  cool fragrance and its exuberant  energetic feeling.

name: energetic-fougere-1
detail: Inspired by the iconic travel suit  with fibers that move and breathe to maintain the shape  Energetic Fougere is a promise of a perfect silhouette. Like a fabric that never wrinkles  artemisia brings the unfailing aromatic freshness to the fougère structure. The base of this olfactory garment is enriched with creamy sandalwood to create a handsome look that stays smooth and chic.

name: bravo-2
detail: An ode to virtuosity  courage and power. Inspired by a journey to the origins of perfume  when it was created through smoke.

name: modoc-1
detail: Modoc evokes lost times: tweed suits  saddlery  a Victorian house in the English countryside. This magnetic fragrance is the result of combining ingredients of distinction and refinement.

name: leau-darmoise
detail: “How could I have known when I distractedly picked a leaf from a bush and rubbed it between my index finger and thumb  that mugwort would later speak to me from a perfume bottle?” - Serge Lutens

name: replay-jeans-original-man
detail: Replay Jeans Original Man is a refreshing fragrance that reflects the spirit of the Replay Man with a modern and refreshing twist.

name: hot-fragrances-grey
detail: A fragrance with a seductive  bewitching and unforgettable trail.

name: viking-pour-homme
detail: A fresh and strong sense for the sensual man.

name: admirabilis
detail: An emotion of serenity and beauty emerges from Fontfroide Abbey  an exceptional place  surprising and mysterious at the same time. This Cistercian abbey invites us on a journey through time  along its stone walls and vaults. In this place full of character  the sacred perfume of hot balsams and resins resounds.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Elemi', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Myrrh', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Cedarwood', 'Clove', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Bergamot', 'Green Notes', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Vetiver', 'Violet Leaves']

name: material-1
detail: Material is a paradox. Through materiality  it evokes immateriality  teaching us to look beyond appearances and to realise that what matters is often unseen. An experience similar to that of being in a forest and seeing in the suffocating shade a multitude of textures and multiple shades of wood  leaves and bark. All in one.

name: french-needle
detail: This scent is like walking on a path surrounded by thick  moist cypress trees. A mystical fragrance.
ingredients: ['Elemi', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Pine Needles', 'Cedarwood', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Hinoki Wood', 'Iris / Orris', 'Pink Pepper']

name: myrrh-oud-1
detail: A refined and passionate fragrance that highlights one of the most prized ingredients in perfumery.

name: vita-nova
detail: In a charming medieval Florence  a young writer and member of the Guild of Physicians and Apothecaries is waiting for a new dawn to start writing the first verses of his opera. A celebration of renewal and of his love for Beatrice. Black pepper  pink pepper  and cloves create a mysterious and intriguing atmosphere.

name: elemi-ambre-noir
detail: This perfume  made of oriental scents  has true mesmerising power and a majestic aura.

name: 121-un-crime-exotique
detail: Pierre Guillaume first explored the theme of chypre tea in 2005  with Hyperessence Matale 12  texturising it with citrus and leather accents. Twelve years later  he reworked this theme with Rework Un Crime Exotique  where the chypre structure is embellished with spicy and gourmand notes. The sin of gluttony in the land of the rising sun...

name: atomica-1
detail: There is an explosive energy that shapes the depths of the urban landscape  a cacophony of distortion and vertigo. The city lights  the concrete expanse  all a symphony of black and grey. Atomica  a disorienting scent that stings and soothes - inebriates and agitates. Here is the energy and flow of the metropolis  a daring challenge to push ourselves beyond our limits.

name: trompette-8
detail: Trompette 8 aims to describe with incense the many sounds of the registers of the Great Organ of Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris.

name: via-dellincenso
detail: Via dell'Incenso evokes past lives and echoes of old stories. The warmth of incense and the intense  captivating character of woods and resins take you on a journey through history and senses. A sensual and exotic fragrance.

name: mushussu-babylon
detail: In the Hanging Gardens of Babylon  one of the seven wonders of the world  Amytis of Media  wife of the great king  rediscovers her homeland. In this oriental paradise  Mušhušššu  the protective genius  envelops us in a trail of aromas carried by oud  the wood of the gods.

name: full-incense-1
detail: Frankincense blends seamlessly with sacred resins such as labdanum and elemi  in this intensely evocative blend. Refined notes of cedarwood and patchouli lead to the dry down of smoky  dry woods.elemi  Somalia incense  labdanum  sacred tree resins in harmony with cedarwood and patchouli leaves are an offering of woody  dry  warm and smoky notes.

name: sacreste-1
detail: "Sacreste comes from the study of another perfume that I have been trying to create for eight years. Two years ago  I received a test fragrance from Luca Maffei that was characterised by an incense note that I really like. We have been working on that note  finishing it and making it sensual until we arrived at the final project  which I absolutely love"  Roberto Drago.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Elemi', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Resins', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Musk', 'Ambermax (Woody ambery)', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Cardamom', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Saffron', 'Black Pepper']

name: star
detail: You are that bewitching fragrance that intoxicates my senses and captivates my soul. Like a crunchy  milky fig  you're both sweet and deliciously addictive. Like elegant and precious cedar wood  you are both powerful and captivating.

name: millesime-fougere-royale-1
detail: Fougère Royale reveals masculinity through a powerful burst of freshness. The scent of an urban man who likes to take care of himself.

name: millesime-bois-de-feu
detail: Bois de Feu evokes passions and is a pledge of impetuous and assumed masculinity.

name: cordoba-en-flor-ltd-ed-2021
detail: The sensuality of May flowers  rose and jasmine are wrapped in the more enigmatic facet of patchouli and an elegant musk accord  enhancing the allure and seduction of the perfume.

name: arlesienne-7
detail: Indulge in the sunny and feminine fragrance of Arlésienne that captures the spirit of the iconic women of Provence. This fragrance is a modern tribute to the colourful  scented ribbons worn by the Arlésienne of the past.

name: joop-homme-le-parfum
detail: Between defiant chic and explicit addiction  the aesthetics  philosophy and lifestyle of the dandy inspire the exquisite composition of Joop! Homme le Parfum  a mesmerising scent with an ultra-sensual signature. This fragrance celebrates an uncomplicated state of mind and the freedom of self-expression.

name: more-leather
detail: A deep  dark fragrance with a heady  animalic trail.

name: jasmin-satin
detail: "Jasmin Satin is a figurative exercise in intermingling two varieties of jasmine from India and Egypt. Like painters mixing colours  Mohamed and I blended our most fabulous memories of the Mediterranean to create this fragrance. The two jasmines have a very delicate  nocturnal freshness that comes alive with the touch of voluptuous gardenia and wood. For us  Jasmin Satin evokes that magical moment when the blue of the sea shimmers and shines  penetrating the shade of the great cedars in an explosion of scents " Karine Dubreil  perfumer.

name: le-wild-gardenia
detail: Brimming with the freshness of a field of vibrant wildflowers  Le Wild brings a unique floral experience with every puff. A combination of heady floral atmosphere and intense white flowers  Le Wild opens with a captivating burst of fresh  crisp gardenia leaves and sets the stage for the intoxicating heart.

name: gardenia-13
detail: "Gardenia is rich and regal. The fragrance enters a room and stands out from the crowd. You can instantly feel the creaminess of the petal and the distinctive floral note that evokes memories of beautiful Hawaiian summer days as well as hits of a winter night. Gardenia is so identifiable and distinguished in character and I wear it when I want to feel a sense of confidence and pride. Love Jo x

name: b9
detail: Like the location it commemorates  B9 is replete with elegance  polish  lasting power  seduction  and surprise. Bond Street is only two blocks long  a mere blip of NoHo nestled between bustling Broadway and the Bowery. This short stretch is wider and sunnier than the surrounding streets  and remains resolutely cobblestoned from New York's early days  an interplay of old  new  and emerging Downtown New York.

name: pera-malta
detail: Scents that have been bathed in the Mediterranean sun burst our in the crystalline sparkle of a hanging garden. Succulent golden pears hang patiently in the island orchard  ripe for the tasting.

name: kenzo-memori-nuit-tatami
detail: Night falls and the house is still. Outside  the sky is studded with stars  it is the hour of dreams. The smell of tatami mats fills the room with a comforting aroma. Nuit Tatami is the perfect fragrance for sweet dreams.

name: open-mind
detail: A green push of Lime and Hinoki ignites the nostrils from the first contact. This clean  ozone-laden departure slides into a wave of Lotus and Melon to soften the hesperid look of the Marine Crist and Gyokuro chlorophyll.

name: kenzo-memori-encens-lumiere
detail: A radiant interpretation of a cabin with mystical scents  that of the worn leather and silk of the kimonos  majestic dresses impregnated with sachets of incense that the geishas slip into the hollow of their sleeves to perfume themselves. Encens Lumière aptly combines the smoky notes of incense with the petal-like sweetness of freesia flowers and saffron.

name: duvet-blanc
detail: On a lazy weekend morning  take a moment to enjoy the soft breeze and sunshine coming in from open windows.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Aldehyde', 'Patchouli', 'Iris / Orris', 'Rose', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Pear', 'Ambrette Seed']

name: mademoiselle-azzaro-lintense
detail: More mischievous than ever  Mademoiselle Azzaro L'Intense embodies the fresh and daring charm of the Parisian and invites us to discover Paris at night! Live the effervescence of the Parisian festivals with this very addictive olfactory signature.

name: 004-gin-mandarine-musc
detail: Seated on the terrace  the time between two glances provides the perfect opportunity for a sip of Gin and Tonic. The bar is filling up and it’s looking like a long and lively night. Or a biting winter’s morning  your eyes resting on a deep blanket of snow in Méribel.

name: riviera
detail: Between essence and attitude. The feeling of being unique. An appealing cocktail of traditional elegance and unpredictability.

name: bentley-beyond-magnetic-amber
detail: This delectable scent takes us on an olfactory voyage into a land of fascinating contrasts inspired by the treasure of exotic Panama: white amber.

name: regatta-intense-1
detail: The time has finally come to escape from obligations and enjoy the moment.

name: eglantine
detail: "The wild rose is a small  fragile and fleeting flower. Its delicate petals fade quickly. During the creation process  I had in mind the idea of a wild garden  evoking walks in the forest  stumbling upon this shy flower along the way"  Karine Dubreuil  perfumer.

name: dont-look-back
detail: Don't Look Back was designed for people who seek continuous changes in the here and now.

name: millesime-ambroisie
detail: With a beautiful balance between sweetness and spiciness  this precious nectar of the gods generously coats the skin. A balanced and rounded scent for an authentic and generous man.

name: fanfarone-italiano
detail: Fanfarone Italiano is a fragrance that embodies rebellious carelessness  frivolity and inexhaustible energy. It recalls the Italian Dolce Vita  but also the duality of the country  both joyful and dramatic. A powerful and striking fragrance that invites you on an olfactory journey into the complex universe of Italy and its coffee culture.

name: individual-blue-sunset-1
detail: Romantic walk on the beach? Hot date for two? Individual Blue Sunset perfectly complements these intoxicating moments - it's a masculine fragrance inspired by the warmth of summer evenings.

name: barceloneta-11
detail:
Where the city opens up to the sea and the hustle and bustle of the streets full of tourists and locals is silenced as it merges with the warm sand of the beach licked by the waves.
The light of the Mediterranean dazzles us while a refreshing sea breeze  salty and humid  meets the smell of skin warmed by the sun and the reverberation of the sand  generating a contrast of freshness and warmth. Sand and salt.
The perfume is built around a refreshing aqueous accord in which I have worked on the marine facets  with special emphasis on the salty notes characteristic of the Mediterranean Sea and with detail and care in the note of seaweed. We have placed this chord in contrast to a chord of skin warmed by the sun  which we can see shining through the sunscreen creams and oils that are wrapped in the mineral  warm and soft notes of the fine sand of the beach that gives us a great sensation of warmth.

name: exotic-waters-1
detail: A wonderful trip to paradise with fresh marine chords and tropical fruits.

name: accordo-marino
detail: A dip in the blue  waves breaking on the rocks. Accordo Marino evokes memories of happy summers spent by the sea.

name: eau-fraiche-citrus-marino-1
detail: Imagine diving into the blue water in the Mediterranean  where the water is bluer than blue. Behind you is the intense green of labdanum and juniper fields waving in the breeze  and before you is the orange trail of the setting sun.

name: vanille-marine
detail: Vanille Marine is a light and evocative scent that can be best described as a four-movement symphony on the theme of vanilla.

name: sea-bliss
detail: Sea Bliss invites you to escape the everyday! An authentic Eau de Toilette without embellishment  a testament to the freedom of seduction.

name: brise-marine
detail: Brise Marine is a magical alchemy of floral woody spices  inspired by the turquoise sea and sea breezes.

name: 3-agua-fougere-1
detail: 3 Agua Fougère evokes the freshness of the Atlantic ocean. Endless beaches and pine forests  perfectly combining sea breeze with the unmistakable aroma of woods found in this area. South of Lisbon  Comporta village and the Troia peninsula boast beaches of golden sand backed by dunes planted with fragrant pines.

name: indigo-blue
detail: Indigo Blue a masculine scent inspired by the love of the ocean.

name: n7-aqua-dea-marine
detail: Enjoy a day full of delicate floral magic. N°7 Aqua Dea Marine has the power of a thousand petals whose gorgeous scent will bring out your femininity and natural charm.

name: urban-ice-1
detail: A fresh and soft fragrance that leaves a lasting impression.

name: rose-wood
detail: An ode to the Rose  evoking the very thrill of the undiscovered. Imparted with the emanation of Rose. The essence of this fragrance will hypnotize you sumptuously.

name: ombre-rose-loriginal-1
detail: A simple  subtle and timeless fragrance that crosses the ages seamlessly. A fragrance that will make you forget all others.
ingredients: ['Palisander Rosewood', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Vanilla', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Honey', 'Peach']

name: ombre-rose-edition-dexception-2021
detail: A simple  subtle and timeless scent that smoothly passes through ages. A fragrance to make you forget all others!
ingredients: ['Palisander Rosewood', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Vanilla', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Honey', 'Peach']

name: white-musk-50
detail: Soft  captivating  tender  and sophisticated. Musk is an animalic scent used since ancient times as one of the most important (and highly prized) basic ingredients in the preparation of perfumes. White Musk is a perfume that blends timeless elegance and sensuality  providing a long-lasting alluring effect.

name: energy-fusion-for-her
detail: This sparkling floral fragrance opens with energizing notes  conveying joy  and exhilarating sensations which gives the fragrance a nice and delicate hook. The heart reveals the softness of a sophisticated bouquet  bringing a shimmering facet. The drydown is creamy and refined with a hint of warmth creating a sensual harmony.

name: amber-rosewood
detail: A carnal and sweet scent  with an unmistakable oriental tone.

name: swim-sx
detail: A musky salt aquatic and sensual... He kept his code name that sums it up so well. SWIM / SX (for SPORT SEXY) evokes a sensual after-sun and tells us about a man or a woman after a sea bath: its salty and desirable skin.

name: oud-rosewood
detail: "The powerful and contrasting woods of Oud Rosewood give it a strong  immediately evocative signature. It comes from the family of fragrances that arouse thrilling sensations  it is imbued with a deep sensuality that is both soft and powerful. Its trail is as intense as it is mysterious " François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: shefon-1
detail: If there was anything more comforting than the embrace of your lover; if there was anything more refreshing than the smell of season's first raindrops hitting the sun-scorched earth  and if there was anything more beautiful than the holy sight of the pink skies saying goodbye to the setting sun  it has got to be “SHEFON”. This scent will take you through the day in a happy state of mind and make beautiful experiences pretty and more long-lasting than ever.
ingredients: ['Palisander Rosewood', 'Rose', 'Patchouli', 'Rosemary', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Green Notes', 'Lemon', 'Musk', 'Spicy Notes', 'Tamarind']

name: diva-charisma-1
detail: Possessing the noble bearing of a queen  she is eager to unleash her true self and embrace the whole world. This irresistible fragrance is perfect for showing elegance  self-confidence and grace. Suitable for all temperamental women who know how to live and enjoy life.

name: gardenia-10
detail: Gardenia fragrance is a fresh  sweet  single floral scent with hints of green. The gardenia flower symbolizes grace  elegance and charm.

name: urban-rose
detail: Awaken your senses to the colour of life that surrounds you with Urban Rose. The quick movements of the urban bustle hum an anthem of energetic vibrations. Surround yourself with vibrance and embrace your trail-blazing spirit.

name: rare-pearls-intense
detail: Timeless. Romantic. Rare. This potent  luminous blend of shimmering white flowers and creamy woods takes elegance and romance to new heights.

name: rose-petales
detail: The delicacy of a thousand-petal rose sublimated by the elegance of the iris and the depth of the rosewood.

name: belle-epoque-1
detail: Belle Epoque is like a fragrant garden of noble flowers.

name: mercedes-benz-rose-1
detail: Think rose. A fragrance passionately devoted to her sensuality and daring. To herirresistible allure and delicate elegance. To her sweet and romantic nature. A tender  luxurious garden of bewitching flowers  sparkling with freshness and sensuality. A flash of optimism  a splash of rose. Like a captivating bouquet of bursting sensations.

name: muguet-2020
detail: Guerlain perpetuates the tradition of Muguet  a luxurious rendezvous that celebrates the arrival of spring. This limited and numbered edition that pays tribute to lily-of-the-valley's little good-luck charm bell.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: eau-fraiche-muguet
detail: Yves Rocher recomposes the spring freshness of the lily valley with this simple and authentic fragrance.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: lily-of-the-valley-42
detail: Legend says that the fragrance of the Lily of the Valley draws the nightingale from hedge and bush  and leads him to choose his mate in the recesses of the glade. Maybe the lovely scent of this delicate flower can do the same for you.

name: muguet-porcelaine-1
detail: “There's so much subtlety in lily-of-the-valley that I've often dreamed of sublimating it. I dived right into its fragrance in order to reproduce the beauty and supply voluptuous quality of this flower which is fragile as porcelain.” Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: muguet
detail: The fragrance calls for a getaway in a wonderful garden  on the first days of spring.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: les-bouquets-dorlane-autour-du-muguet
detail: Autour du Muguet pays homage to natural beauty  femininity and elegance. It perfectly accentuates your natural charm and relaxed sophistication.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: lily-of-the-valley-jeanlen
detail: Lily of the Valley reminds you of what the warm sun feels like on your bare skin  while a gentle summer breeze wafts the scent of a freshly mown meadow towards you. Close your eyes and feel that moment of happiness.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: le-muguet-de-rosine-2018-1
detail: This Le Muguet de Rosine is a replica of a garden filled with Lily of the Valley within the gardens of Martimont. It hides at the foot of the walls  between rose bushes and behind rhododendrons. A completely natural  yet incredibly refined perfume.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: lily-of-the-valley-fresh-citrus
detail: Lily of the Valley & Fresh Citrus is a cosmic fragrance  providing you with an immediate source of positive energy. This aromatic cocktail will awaken your senses and invigorate your body. You will become absolutely addicted to this magnetic scent.

name: pur-muguet-1
detail: Pur Muguet is delicate and slightly powdery  a composition described as a piece of nature worn like invisible jewellery.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: 4711-lily-of-the-valley
detail:
Lily of the valley announces the awakening of spring  when the first flowers bloom everywhere. Fresh and floral but soft at the same time  this fragrance plays with light  floral nuances. An elegant harmony of refreshing transparency and enveloping texture. A fragrance that gently unfolds on the skin like a 
soft lurker.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: lily-of-the-valley-3
detail: Lily of the Valley is a delicate  white  flower which grows in abundance in the English countryside  but only for a limited time during the months of May and June. This infrequent flower is at the heart of this beautifully modern version of this classic  floral scent.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: muguet-coquet-1
detail: This fresh fragrance will transport you to an immaculate garden filled with thousands of white bells. Happiness in a bottle!

name: acqua-di-parma-lily-of-the-valley
detail: Lily of the valley  a radiant spring flower. It is the first to bloom with its corollas in clusters in spring and to absorb the gentle rays of the sun  radiating a fragrant trail that envelops you in a sense of joyful rebirth. This sun-filled fragrance enhances the appeal of this delicate and highly perfumed flower.

name: lily-of-the-valley-8
detail: A sweet  fresh and graceful floral. It is considered by some experts to be one of the finest lily of the valley fragrances. A classic perfume with a very striking modernity. On some skins it develops a grassy hay-like quality  on others it is strikingly ‘white'  peppery and very elegant.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: virgin-lily-of-the-valley
detail: The tingle of citrus  the beauty of the lily and the softness of musks are present all at once. A lily floating in the air  in all its white purity.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Orange Blossom', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Belladonna', 'Palisander Rosewood']

name: muguet-2018
detail: Guerlain celebrates the arrival of Spring with a numbered  limited-edition fragrance  blending tradition and innovation that perpetuates the charm and delicacy of a bouquet sprinkled with wonderful green notes evoking the springtime dew.
wc: Floral Fresher Lily of the Valley

name: lavanda-nobile
detail: Standing tall in the middle of the crowd  leaning on a cane and holding a lavender flower in his hand  Aurélien threw himself into his arms and hugged him energetically. Aurélien threw himself into his arms and hugged him energetically. Then she took the lavender flower from his hand and smelled it passionately.

name: camina-provence
detail: Camina is the Occitan word for a walk in Provence. In Provence  you can breathe in the scent of lavender  the trunks of centuries-old olive trees  walks through the pine forests. Provence is full of absolute tranquillity  the song of cicadas and the babbling of fountains. Happiness.

name: lavande
detail: Lavande  typical flower of Provence  which inspired the greatest painters.

name: deauville-pour-homme-1
detail: Confident. Sophisticated. Overflowing. Deauville pour Homme is for those who love French sophistication. Deauville. Overflowing with coastal essences.

name: vera-wang-embrace-french-lavender-tuberose-1
detail: Vera Wang Embrace : French Lavender & Tuberose is inspired by intimacy  celebrating moments in time to be cherished and embraced. Like its namesake gesture  the ingredient-based fragrance collection is a modern vision inspired by intimacy and emotion. Vera Wang Embrace brings to life the inspirational image of romance that represents Vera Wang's heritage.

name: lavande-romaine
detail: At harvest time  evenings are filled with its aroma  and the sunset is coloured by the newly cut flowers strewn over the fields. The humble alembics installed near the reservoirs glow with red flames into the night.

name: lavande-vetiver-1
detail: Breathe in the fresh and stimulating scents of the Provençal lavender fields! Lavande & Vétiveris an invigorating and aromatic Eau de Toilette comprising natural essences emblematic of the Provençal region.
ingredients: ['Vetiver', 'Bergamot', 'Lavandin', 'Cedarwood', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Bitter Orange', 'Iris / Orris', 'Musk', 'Clary Sage', 'Tarragon', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Lavender (Provence)']

name: js-magnetic-power-navy-blue
detail: JS Magnetic Power Navy Blue is a fresh scent with a magnetic trail that revives the senses without losing any of its insolence.

name: pour-un-homme-leau
detail: A fresh  sparkling scent  loyal to Caron Pour Un Homme.

name: lavande-de-provence
detail: The pure and natural fragrance of lavender from the south of France.

name: lavandes-trianon
detail: "This fragrance is a fresh gourmand. It suggests a refreshing sensuality  like skin in the sun". Blended by Olivier Gillotin and Shyamala Maisondieu

name: beau-de-jour-eau-de-parfum
detail: Beau de Jour presents the perfectly groomed gentleman who considers every detail. He exhibits the best version of himself to the world  but beneath the surface is something deeper  refreshing  and sublime in all its layers.

name: amber-lavender
detail: Amber  the exotic scent of the Orient and one of the perfume world's most legendary ingredients  is combined with the comfort of French lavender and myrrh. This clean aromatic note evokes the subtle  spicy warmth of twilight.

name: lavanda-chloe
detail: A fragrance of shadow and light born from Quentin Bisch's desire to capture the childhood vision of his mother walking from the warmth of the garden to the cool shade of the house  a sprig of lavender in her arms. The perfumer revisits this note with a very modern twist  while enhancing all the facets of Provençal lavender  from aromatic freshness to sun-kissed fullness.

name: lavande-eau-de-cologne
detail: Brightened by the radiant freshness of citrus fruits  the Lavender Eau de Cologne has a light  breezy scent  underlined by a woody  musky base with a captivating trail. This vibrant Cologne is a celebration of summer that captures the sunshine and brightness of Haute-Provence.

name: lets-imagine
detail: This fragrance is for the artistic man who envisions the world like nothing we've ever imagined.

name: floratta-amor-de-lavanda
detail: Floratta Flor de Lavanda : a sophisticated and fascinating fragrance  perfect for spontaneous women.

name: blue-seduction-sparkling-aqua-for-women
detail: For her  a confident woman of nuance  the Blue Seduction Sparkling Aqua for Women fragrance is a breath of fresh air  shimmering and fully feminine. She is spontaneous and sensual  and the combined elegance of charisma of her presence is utterly unique.

name: here-to-shine-1
detail: It’s time to “shine”  ladies! Here to Shine is a sensual fragrance that leaves a lasting impression at all times and gives its wearer self-confidence and courage.

name: glam-rouge-1
detail: Glam Rouge was inspired by one of Naomi's most coveted make-up looks her daring red glitter lips at the VMAs which became a breath-taking fashion 'moment' that instantly went global. She possesses a timeless glamour and confident presence every woman aspires to. She's that inspirational.

name: smoke-and-mirrors-1
detail: You never forget the scent of the first man in your life  the scent of the pipe that Chantal's father sometimes smoked and is still in her memory.

name: wonderful-intense
detail: Immerse yourself in the wonderful world of Wonderful Intense  the glittering eau de parfum with enchanting notes. Solar  floral  intense  it envelops your days with delicious and joyful notes.

name: black-label-women-eau-legere
detail: Black Label Women Eau Légère brings freshness to the elegant business world embodied by the original. The wearer's careful and confident style is at once accentuated and refreshed. Despite all the energy and powerful accords  this fragrance also manages to retain its modern  simple elegance.

name: rose-blush-2021
detail: Delicate rose petals suspended in a delectable jelly. The charm of these blushing pink petals inspires a prised preserve.

name: purple-leather
detail: For Alexandra  the memorable smell of an old leather jacket  the homage to Prince  and the unforgettable song "Purple Rain"  give birth to Purple Leather.

name: selva-enigmatica-limited-edition-2023-2
detail: Delve into the depth of the jungle. Discover the brilliance of a refreshing watery accord that is illuminated by a powerful aromatic heart  while an exquisite combination of exotic and sensual woods brings personality and sophistication to the perfume.

name: boharas
detail: The wind of sand comes knocking on the wooden door of the Selman stud farm. Nestled in the heart of the most beautiful stable of the Kingdom of Morocco  BôHaras is inspired by this majestic place  full of elegance.

name: tokyo
detail: “I love travelling to Tokyo. I've been going there for over twenty years and I'm continually fascinated by the place  the people  the food  the style  the language the finesse  and attention to detail. What I am trying to evoke with this fragrance is that very special feeling of early morning in the city " Nick Steward  Founder.

name: rose-griotte
detail: Rose Griotte is a fresh floral fragrance with light juicy and fruity inflections. Despite its freshness and lightness  the fragrance has a delicious  long-lasting trail.

name: cannabis-patchouli-1
detail: "In Dries world  antagonistic elements are combined to create surprise. This fragrance is like a light and dark olfactive pattern of fresh green leaves of clary sage aromatics rubbing against the woody leaves of patchouli ” Nicolas Bonneville  Perfumer.

name: combava-cedrat
detail: A thrilling scent  full of sparkling and stimulating accords.

name: kujten-1
detail: Kujten x Roos & Roos is the story of an encounter between two brands created by women who wanted to write together a new chapter in their story. The story of Kujten in perfume! Its sillage is as contemporary  warm and seducing as its namesake.

name: friendship-magenta-1
detail: Best friends forever Having just one friend is very special. Thanks to this bond  there is someone who understands you without words. You both think alike and complement each other in many ways. You simply feel that you belong together.

name: ege-gaio
detail: Ege is the Turkish name for the sea which was derived from the Greek name ΑΙGAIO. Having both names together  Nishane pays tribute to the shared skies and culture of Turkish and Greek people who are the neighbouring residents of the Aegean coastline.

name: iceberg-twice-rosa-femme-1
detail: This scent is a refined energy bomb for an active and self-determined life.

name: nina-nature-1
detail: Nina Nature is a clean and vegan scent that immerses you in nature. Enjoy a green new world.

name: be-wonderfully-you
detail: Dedicated to the young  brave  and independent women who are proud of who they are and not afraid to show it the world  Be Wonderfully You is the celebration of their uniqueness  unpredictability  and strength.

name: myrrhe-musc
detail: A magnetic fragrance  in which the fruity and woody trail of myrrh is dressed in the creamy softness of musks.

name: amo-ferragamo-oriental-wood-2022-1
detail: A surreal scent for the balanced  confident woman.

name: noura-floret
detail: Envelope yourself in this beautiful fragrance  skillfully crafted to enhance your vivacity.

name: hielo-antartico-ltd-ed-2021
detail: The citrus and acid intensity of the grapefruit turns our watery accord into a refreshing Antarctic Ice accord. The aromatic and spicy notes add masculinity and are wrapped in the character of exotic woods and resins such as sandalwood and patchouli.

name: giordani-gold-good-as-gold
detail: A bold feminine perfume with luminous floral notes interlaced with warm spicy notes to magnify your glow.

name: princess-style
detail: “A mad desire to live  to see  to feel  to seduce  for oneself. I wanted a vibrant  limitless  unconstrained fragrance that irresistibly draws you into the movement of life. An immediate perfume  which makes you smile  makes you want to  imposes itself as a style in itself  as soon as you put it on " Marina de Bourbon.

name: purple-suede
detail: Purple Suede transports you to the sunburnt lavender fields of Tasmania  where fragrant purple stems crack in the fierce heat of the midday sun. Seductive  animalic  elegant.

name: invite-only-amber-23-1
detail: “I have always found amber to be one of the most sexy  intense and addictive notes in fragrance. From the minute I smelled my first amber perfume  I knew that I wanted create a scent of my own with this enticing ingredient! The combination is rich  provocative and sumptuous. In all honesty  this juice is literally sexiness in a bottle " Mona Kattan  co-Founder.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Honey', 'Cherry (black)', 'Benzoin', 'Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Citrus Leaves', 'Rose Damascena', 'Rose Centifolia', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Hazelnut', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Chocolate', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: iceberg-twice-platinum-femme-eau-de-toilette
detail: Twice Platinum is a synonym of femininity  clean opulence and cool luxury. Addictive and sensual  like a platinum-coloured tattoo on the skin  it leaves an unforgettable trail behind.

name: feels-like-summer-women-2022-1
detail: Roving with the van through the golden-yellow desert of Tabernas  past prickly pears in full bloom until you reach the dreamy sunsets on the Costa del Sol. Feels Like Summer tempts you away from city life to the long-awaited summer of 2022. It will have you longing for the next adventurous road trip  for moments of real friendship and the company of breath-taking nature. Are you ready for the summer of your life?

name: iceberg-twice-gold-homme-eau-de-toilette
detail: Twice Gold is a cool luxury scent for the man who wants to live his life intensely and create golden memories.

name: iceberg-twice-nero-homme-1
detail: This fragrance is a statement for every man who leads a dynamic and exciting life.

name: mar-profundo-limited-edition-2024
detail:
Immerse yourself in the deep sea with the powerful top note of bergamot and black pepper. The masculine heart is refreshed with a seductive marine and lavender accord to highlight the
personality of the patchouli and labdanum base. An exotic and very seductive perfume to feel the unique force of the sea.

name: iceberg-change-the-flow
detail: Change the Flow is a bold and unexpected creation born from the fusion of spicy freshness and woody sensuality. An extraordinarily fresh  vivid and enveloping fragrance that celebrates the flow of change  for those who love to live life to the fullest.

name: te-quiero-verde
detail: Connect with the purity and balance of nature through the harmony of this aromatic and refreshing fragrance formulated with natural essential oils.

name: noura-iris
detail: This is a white and bright fragrance with a smooth and lingering dry down.

name: oud-elixir
detail: Sensual and mysterious  Oud Elixir can be worn alone or layered with any perfume signature to enrich its sillage with an unforgettable powerful spell.

name: guess-effect-1
detail: A scent blended for the man who lives life to the fullest.

name: dusk
detail: Grounding and serene  Dusk gently mingles the woodiness of sandalwood and nectar accords to usher in the perfect evening ritual.

name: lush-fleur-1
detail: Inspired by a flower’s delicate petals whose sheer and luminous scent captivates the senses.

name: cloud-pink
detail: Empowering and optimistic  the Ariana Grande Cloud Pink fragrance is inspired by a confidence that reveals both beauty and strength  no matter the storm.

name: mcm-eau-de-parfum
detail: The spirited scent of wanderlust in a boundary-pushing unisex fragrance.

name: bombshell-oud
detail: Sensual and intriguing  Bombshell Oud has the boldness of an award-winning Bombshell fragrance with the Gulf’s signature scent  oud  at the heart of it.

name: ck-one-summer-2021-1
detail: An explosion of colourful freshness. A pure and vibrant juice for the summer of 2021.

name: zaad-arctic
detail: O Boticário went to Iceland to venture into the amazing landscapes of the Arctic in search of inspiration. Zaad Arctic invites you to travel and experience the freedom of the unexpected.

name: test-2
detail: This collector's edition of MCM Eau de Parfum features the original graffiti work of celebrated artist Sambypen  transforming it into a symbol of spontaneous self-expression.

name: diva-rouge
detail: Diva Rouge was created for all women who live their lives with fun and joy  always bringing a touch of irreverence and drama  always embracing the unexpected against the monotony of the mundane.

name: decades-80s-couture
