detail: "It amazes me that I have been famous for sixty years. When I started everything was changing  and just like music  art and clothes  perfume changed too. These fragrances represent those decades for me. There was electricity in the air and life smelled of excitement " Cher.

name: very-sexy-orchid-eau-de-parfum
detail: An opulent  exotic orchid in a moonlit wood. Deep  dark and decadent: Very Sexy Orchid. Give in to desire.

name: vanilla-skin
detail: Vanilla Skin is a multidimensional take on an intoxicating sensual gourmand.

name: nobody-nowhere
detail: When the sky and the sea blend into one  we are lost in absolute silence. Deep in our souls  everyone is an island  with a true reflection of ourselves. That's the place where nobody can be disturbed. I'm alone  but I'm not lonely.

name: decades-60s-couture
detail: “I'm astonished that I have been famous for sixty years. When I started everything was changing  and just like music  art  and clothing  perfume also changed. These scents represent those Decades for me. There was electricity in the air and life smelled like excitement ” Cher.

name: oui-juicy-couture-play-sweet-diva
detail: Put on some glitter and step into the spotlight with Sweet Diva  an utterly addictive scent from the Oui Juicy Couture Play collection. Say oui (yes) to your magnetic personality and be over the top whenever  wherever because you are your own diva!

name: life-energy
detail: Life Energy is as intoxicating as sunlight  invigorating and energising. On contact with the skin  its fragrance awakens the emotions we wish to feel  with a radiant energy like that of a sunbath.

name: decades-90s-couture
detail: "It amazes me that I have been famous for sixty years. When I started everything was changing  and just like music  art and clothes  perfume changed too. These fragrances represent those decades for me. There was electricity in the air and life smelled of excitement " Cher.

name: guess-uomo-acqua
detail: As free and confident as the original Guess Uomo. This illuminating fragrance offers a bold expression of freshness through its olfactory ode to the Mediterranean.

name: tantrum
detail: Speak your truth and break expectations. Tantrum is an explosively green cocktail that demands to be heard.

name: panama-fefe
detail: In the 1900s  in Naples  to describe a neatly dressed person  always fashionable  they called him "Fefé". Strolling along the Via Chiaia  with his panama hat and walking stick  he liked to show off his elegance and refinement.

name: cedar-3
detail: Cedar is one of the oldest ingredients used in perfumery  with a woody  distributive scent that really can't be broken down much further. This fragrance uses natural Virginia cedar to create a soft and eminently wearable composition.

name: cedar
detail: Cedar is one of the oldest ingredients used in perfumery  with a woody  distributive scent that really can't be broken down much further. This fragrance uses natural Virginia cedar to create a soft and eminently wearable composition.

name: super-cedar-1
detail: A modern scent reduced to the essential. The powerful woody notes of cedar inject energy  add warmth and lend verticality to the fragrance. Reminiscent of pencil shavings  it evokes a sense of nostalgia for school days and simpler times.

name: fahrenheit-cologne
detail: "Fahrenheit Cologne has a unique elegance  one that is suggested. It's a composition that plays on the mastery and merging of opposites. A Fahrenheit that has been pared down  but retains its unsettling spirit " François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: cedarwood-absolute
detail: Inspired by unforgettable nights that will be a part of your memory.

name: un-bois-1
detail: A modern  dry and woody desert.

name: traversee-cedre-difrane
detail: "The snowflakes rhythmically paced the long march that awaited me until the Atlas Mountains Cedar forests. Camped for the night in a limestone cave in the Ifrane valley  the horses of the caravan brought me the warmth I needed to rest. They exuded a powerful smell of leather  amber  and musk from the cargo they were carrying " Maître de Claude  Perfumer  18th century.

name: ac-j-approchais-un-mystere
detail: If you are like A.C.  you are one of the Vertiginous: a strong temperament with a dramatic expression. J'approchais un Mystère evokes an intense and magnetic personality.

name: malbec-club-intenso
detail: Malbec Club Intense evokes the best of Malbec  formulated with noble and pure ingredients that this man deserves.

name: malbec-play
detail: Full of personality  Malbec Play was created especially for teens  bringing a fresh  irreverent  and attitude-filled power that is the face of the new generation.

name: nativa-spa-matcha-1
detail: How about feeling the freshness of a fragrance that leaves you with renewed energy?
ingredients: ['Matcha Tea', 'Bergamot', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Lemongrass', 'Yuzu', 'Lime (Persian)', 'Cardamom', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Pear', 'Rose', 'Lavender (Provence)', 'Artemisia', 'Musk', 'Clary Sage', 'Sandalwood', 'Vanilla', 'Leaves']

name: ana-hickmann-elegance-1
detail: Ana Hickmann Elegance is the epitome of elegance and femininity for the modern woman.

name: nativa-spa-quinoa
detail: In addition to perfuming the body  Nativa Spa Quinoa splash also helps to moisturise the skin throughout the day.
ingredients: ['Vanilla', 'Peony', 'Lavender', 'Tonka Bean', 'Freesia', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Milk', 'White Flowers', 'Bergamot', 'Maltol (Praline)', 'Sandalwood', 'Star Anise', 'Tangerine', 'Heliotropine (Heliotrope)', 'Lime (Persian)']

name: bois-premier
detail: In a deep forest  vetiver intermingles its roots in green and wet roads. The flowers of immortelle mark the bewitched wood of their dark spicy volutes.

name: cedar-2
detail: Cedar is an elegant and luxurious fragrance inspired by the sensuality of cedar wood.

name: declaration-eau-de-toilette
detail: A fragrance for saying the things that matter. An emotional fragrance leaving a woody  spiced trail enlivened with a note of freshness.

name: wood-lands
detail: If the aesthetics of the forest had a scent  it would be Wood Lands. Close your eyes and listen to how the wind plays with the leaves  how the branches rustle under your feet and breathe in the fresh forest air.

name: leau-dissey-pour-homme-woodwood
detail: A splendid stroll through the forest with L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Wood&Wood. Strength  power  assured masculinity the intense version goes all out on woody notes.

name: patchouli-homme
detail: Patchouli Homme is a masculine version of the legendary patchouli. Combining strength and deep sensitivity  it conveys impressions of faraway places and seductive ease.

name: patchouli-1
detail: The scent of pristine  primordial nature  the gentle breath of the woods and the Indonesian jungle. An unmistakable  free-spirited  evocative scent.

name: for-her-patchouli-musc-1
detail: The intention was to create a scent with an identity strong enough to surprise and seduce. A scent that cannot be defined or ignored and yet intrigues. Patchouli Musc is a naturally seductive and intoxicatingly warm scent.

name: patchouli-5
detail: Patchouli is British bohemian. Decadent  intense  intriguing. It’s long nights at the Café de Paris in the 1890s. It’s rowdy Fitzrovia in the 1950s. It’s your secret weapon today. Murdock Patchouli is complex  rich and velvety. You  with a little added mystery.

name: patchouli-riviera-1
detail: Freedom  the courage to discretely overcome any obstacle  and the exciting sensation you can enjoy during a boat ride in the Mediterranean Sea: all these emotions are triggered by a sensual  woody scent.

name: javanese-patchouli-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A dewy and zesty opening reveals a new tonality swaying between dark and balmy  hot and cool  while the heart has an enigmatic texture with a resinous warmth. Together  each refined ingredient defines a deeper  more concentrated olfactive character with exceptional purity and vigour.

name: un-patchouli-1
detail: A magnetic balm.

name: feu-patchouli
detail: Powerful woods muted with hints of magnificent spices explode like a sonorous brass ensemble. This rich  dense and intense perfume is as mysterious as it is intoxicating.

name: patchoulissime-pure
detail: Rich  bold  intense  instantly addictive. Capture the spirit of the Los Angeles lifestyle in Keiko's Patchoulissime Pure. A celebration of the eccentric.

name: patchouli-imperial
detail: "This intense composition transports you to the mysterious Far East. It is dark and bewitching  like entering the fragrant back room of an apothecary in Asia. Wrapped in mystical smoke  the scent of patchouli blends with wood and spicy coriander " François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: carine
detail: “Carine is a portrait-perfume  a sensual and disconcerting olfactory reflection. It is my most intimate journey  laying myself bare. Opening the door to my emotions  my memories  my thoughts  my dreams  and my fantasies ” Carine Roitfeld.

name: malbec-absoluto-1
detail: Symbol of strength and sophistication  this fragrance is inspired by the man's evolution. It celebrates the man who makes special choices and achieves his goals.
ingredients: ['Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Amber', 'Violet Leaves', 'Oakmoss', 'Dried Fruits', 'Red Wine', 'Cedarwood (Virginia)', 'Animalic Notes', 'Benzoin', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Leather', 'Lemon', 'Lime', 'Mandarin', 'Musk', 'Black Pepper', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Cedar leaf']

name: miami-seduction-blue-for-men-1
detail: A new interpretation of the famous fragrance seduces from the first notes. The composition is revealed by a fruity cocktail with a refreshing sea accord  reinforced with an elegant train of woody-musky notes that gives the fragrance a truly masculine character.

name: bella-tropicale
detail: Bella Tropicale is inspired by a lush tropical garden with rich florals  vibrant greenery and warm sunshine from which the most elegant Oscar de la Renta woman emerges.

name: autumn
detail: A sensual and vivacious fragrance to blend with your vibe.

name: pineapple
detail: This Library of Fragrance perfume is the full  fresh and juicy heart of the pineapple  so bursting with flavour and fragrance that you will swear it was squeezed from the ripe fruit itself only moments earlier.

name: fiorucci-rock-with-style-2012-1
detail: Fiorucci's Rock With Style  starts with a sparkling top  followed by a feminine heart of fragrant flowers. The drydown is wrapped in warm woods and sensual musks. An intoxicating delicacy.

name: pineapple-1
detail: Coming from South America  as a symbol of welcome and hospitality  the Pineapple came to Sicily and become a strong symbol of the island's decorative arts and architecture.

name: yourmoment-men-2019
detail: YourMoment Men celebrates the moments that delight the heart  and make us grateful for the small things that happen every day.

name: kings-wood
detail: Kings Wood is unique  different  and distinctive. It is a real statement of confidence.

name: coconut-pineapple
detail: Splash generously or spritz lightly with Coconut Pineapple body mist to transport you to a tropical paradise.

name: incandessence-lotus-1
detail: Exude your radiance with this floral green with the scent of water lotus at its heart. An ethereal and sophisticated fragrance.

name: jluxe-1
detail: Dressed to kill  looking fierce  and turning heads when she enters a room   JLuxe is inspired by Jennifer’s love of fashion  luxury  and animal print!

name: kahala-pina-colada
detail: Kahala Piña Colada by Demeter Fragrance Library is a delicious blend of coconut cream  fresh pineapple and light rum  all combined to create the perfect sweetness and richness.

name: unue
detail: Unue is the scent of "firsts". We all have first times; our first love  our first olfactory memory  our first perfume. Unue pays tribute to Selfridges' department store  an English institution  the first department store to highlight the creations of Jeroboam.

name: aqua-sapphire
detail: Aqua Sapphire is inspired by the tempestuous and seductive nature of the sea. It is an enticing fragrance with an optimistic personality.

name: exotic-love-1
detail: An irresistible fragrance with refreshing notes of peach and pineapple followed by a sensual touch of jasmine.

name: 88-pineapples-lite-1
detail: 88 Pineapples is a delicious blend of pineapples and woods with a sea salt accent. A light  fresh and easy to wear fragrance. Your portable perfume to lift your spirits.

name: possession-wilgermain
detail: "This attractive composition evokes the speed and sophistication of today’s New York. A human silhouette dashing through the cityscape  a trail of a perfume filled with an urbane  civilised feeling. The ultimate expression of effortless chic " Rodrigo Flores-Roux  Perfumer.

name: oud-abramad-1
detail: The palace gates close at dusk. An elegant silhouette walks slowly through the silent garden. Is it Abramad? He disappears. He looks up. The seven windows of the palace are wide open like great black eyes. In the dark silence  someone is standing  facing the desert.

name: dunhill-century-blue
detail: Who is it best for? Well  it's an aroma highlighted by a bouquet of citrus scented tones that will bring a light and stimulating perfumed sensation. Examining it closer once applied  you will notice a lingering quality of floral and earthy hints that hide the essence of uplifting  bright and soft feelings. Give it a try!

name: dunhill-agar-wood
detail: Inspired by a region famous for its sophisticated olfactory rituals  this rich fragrance is a poignant homage to centuries of Middle Eastern perfumery tradition.

name: iconprivate-07
detail: Icon/Private 07 is an authentic sensual woody fragrance  full of adventure and freedom  that reveals the inner charisma of the man who wears it.

name: puccini-black-pearl
detail: Mysterious  elegant and graceful  Puccini Black Pearl is a statement of femininity.

name: time-to-live
detail: This fragrance gives you the courage to be yourself. To be your own icon. To seize the time to revive. To be confident.

name: acqua-vetiver-1
detail: An intense and revitalising fragrance for the body  which combines bright fruity notes with an unprecedented accord of spicy and fresh touches.

name: bentley-for-men-azure-1
detail: The perfumer has created a stimulating and exciting fragrance for today's discerning man. This powerfully expressive fragrance appeals to sporty  smart and the style conscious man.

name: iris-ebene
detail: A contrasting composition where the iris reveals its dark and sensual side. A soft  textured skin slowly unfolds  leaving an addictive trail  as comfortable as a cashmere jumper.

name: tilia-cordata-1
detail: Floral and refined  Tilia Cordata combines sweet and warm heart notes with a deeper woody bases. Structured around the delicate scent of the Linden flower  the fragrance is complimented by a luxurious bouquet.

name: fable-1
detail: Inspired by Androcles and the Lion  a fable with a moral of kindness.

name: tennis-club
detail: This unique scent evokes the lively spirit of a Mediterranean tennis club. Fresh  elegant  invigorating.

name: agua-fresca-verbena-mujer-2023
detail: Agua Fresca Verbena Mujer is a celebration of summer  of a simple life  of people  the land and the sea. It's a return to our origins. A limited edition fragrance created with natural  vegan ingredients  gentle and respectful of your skin. Wild  bright  amazing. As simple as that.

name: orange-bergamot-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Naranja orbs light winding calls light fragrant lanterns. A joyful throng of revellers celebrate under the arcs of vibrant bitter orange trees. Sparkling petitgrain linger verdant in the percussive Flamenco-punctuated air. Eliven your soul with energising  luminous intensity.

name: nerolia-bianca-1
detail: A unique interpretation of freshness and delicacy. The story of a perfumer  an olfactory journey into essences and absolutes. "A nap in the shade of an orange tree  in a delicious blend of peels and petals". - Thierry Wasser  Perfumer

name: eau-fraiche-1
detail: From its creation  this fresh chypre with citrus notes has become a classic for women looking for elegance  freshness and well-being. Like a breath of air emerging from the bottle.

name: zeste-de-vigne
detail: Close your eyes and imagine you are in the vineyards of Les Sources de Caudalie … Where  at every moment of the day in summer  the colours change the light stretches out and nature envelopes the atmosphere.

name: bergamote-calabria-1
detail: Stroll through the Calabrian bergamot orchards. Gather the sun-soaked fruits. Acqua Allegoria Bergamote Calabria is a vibrant and sunny essence.

name: escale-a-portofino
detail: The ship glides forward and enters the harbour of Portofino. We are in a part of Italy that is still picturesque and majestic  with a beautiful  tranquil and unspoilt landscape. Portofino  a small and exquisite fishing port  symbolises the magnificence of the Riviera with a soothing tranquillity.

name: profound-orange-wood
detail: As spring slips into summer  the colours  smells and tastes intensify. We are in a Sicilian orange grove with trees laden with flowers and fragrant fruit. Just reach out and pick up a leaf  which  when rubbed between your fingers  adds the fresh green element to the heavenly scent.

name: le-matin-des-possibles-1
detail: When the light rises and awakes all our senses  to have the feeling that the world belongs to us. Let yourself be carried away by the fresh and luminous fragrance of Matin des Possibles.

name: selva-do-brazil-1
detail: Our perfumers have recreated the Selva  the rainforest  by evoking a dry  inimitable green note.

name: escentric-05
detail: “With Escentric 05 I wanted to create a different kind of summer fragrance. Instead of the usual aqueous notes  I was inspired by walking up from the sea on a hot afternoon through dry aromatic Mediterranean herbs and trees ” Geza Schoen  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Juniper Berries', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Bergamot', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Orange', 'Basil', 'Fig', 'Rosemary', 'Laurel', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Cypress', 'Freesia', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lentisk', 'Musk']

name: hooked
detail: As the name suggests  this fragrance is highly addictive. It is a celebration of feminine courage and our connection to the planet. As eucalyptus dances with wild will  it is a scent of abandon  freedom and appreciation.

name: gingerlise
detail: Alexandra considers each of her formulas as a blank canvas. She chooses her ingredients as a centre disposes of its colours. "I imagined a blue-green landscape with identically coloured ingredients: a meeting of heaven and earth. "I put my ingredients in large and generous solid areas  draw out the fragrance until the transparency and the material becomes light  powerful and tender " Alexandra Carlin  Perfumer.

name: scent-of-a-dream
detail: “I created a scent that would ignite this key to attraction in a more sophisticated way than I had done. I built something that was a spark for love  light  positivity  and sex on the wearer and the people around you ” Charlotte Tilbury.
ingredients: ['Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Peach', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Jasmine', 'Tuberose', 'Violet', 'Bergamot', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin', 'Saffron', 'Black Pepper', 'Fir', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Patchouli']

name: sweet-praline
detail: Some would say: "Another praline!" Yes  but beware. This praline is like no other. It's not a confectioner's praline  it's a perfumer's praline! A praline to be eaten... or devoured!

name: hedoin-molecule
detail: Hedoin is the olfactory version of love. A name that has become iconic. A unisex fragrance that creates its own story and invites you to do the same.

name: white-neroli
detail: It is an ode to cologne and neroli. Radiant as a ray of white light  early in the morning  gently warmed by the sun. More than a cologne  it is also an ode to childhood and tenderness.

name: deauville
detail: Immerse yourself in the timeless beauty and irresistible charm of Deauville  a perfume that captures the elegance and lightness of a French summer day.

name: tempting-bergamot
detail: When the light of dawn filters through the blinds  it caresses the body of a half-awake person  between dream and reality. Tempting Bergamot is an extraordinary score capable of awakening desire.

name: walaa-1
detail: Walaa encapsulates the uplifting heights of happiness when deep love engulfs you.

name: own-your-zone-strike-strk
detail: Built through science for a sports state of mind for life  and created with the male footballer in mind  Strike / Stk is a dynamic scent. Strike with the power of sport in your life.

name: water-therapy
detail: Water Therapy is inspired by the concept of blue medicine  the belief that water positively influences our mental health with its relaxing and anti-stress benefits. This functional fragrance uses olfactory technology to replicate the sensory sensation of being in or near water  formulated with a blend of calming  marine-inspired aromatic notes. Spray to relax and refill your glass.

name: mirsaal-of-trust
detail: Mirsaal Of Trust – A harmonious blend of fine notes for the refined and sophisticated gentleman.

name: scandal-pour-homme
detail: The king of the ring makes an entrance  crowned with an already legendary sex appeal! Boxing gloves in hand  this eau de toilette is about to knock everyone out with its scandalously energising sillage.

name: bois-imperial-by-quentin-bisch-1
detail: “I created this fragrance around a precious and extraordinary wood : Akigalawood. Adorned with fresh spices  it is a great woody note made of contrasts  between patchouli and Thai basil ” Quentin Bisch  perfumer.

name: grapefruit-pink-pepper-1
detail: A vibrant effervescent scent.

name: gucci-guilty-elixir-pour-homme
detail: Created to inspire a deeper connection to authenticity  Guilty Elixir pour Homme celebrates the Gucci Guilty signature by intensifying its most precious ingredients into a timelessly contemporary juice.

name: original-1
detail: Egeo Original  a comfortable and ideal cologne for you to have fun in your day today. And having fun is enjoying all the possibilities  experimenting and conquering.

name: eau-de-prep-tommy
detail: "Eau de Prep fragrances celebrate the classic  iconic Tommy scent but with a new preppy twist. This scent is the finishing touch to all of the looks I designed for my Spring/Summer world collection " Tommy Hilfiger.
ingredients: ['Grapefruit', 'Georgywood (Cedarwood note)', 'Green Watery Accord', 'Passion Fruit', 'Clary Sage', 'Amber', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lavender', 'Moss', 'Suede', 'Tonic Water', 'White Pepper', 'Geranium (Egypt)']

name: suprae
detail: A mysterious and attractive unisex fragrance that exudes and exalts voluptuousness leaving an intense fusing signature.
ingredients: ['Georgywood (Cedarwood note)', 'Akigalawood (Patchouli note)', 'Musk', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Belambre (Woody ambery)']

name: 214-musk-cedro-1
detail: An elegant blend of cedar with spicy nuances of Lao cinnamon in contrast to the enveloping notes of musk. This meeting of intense notes reveals a striking woody fragrance.

name: very-sexy-now-wild-palm-1
detail: Dark woods  lush palms  bare shoulders  sexy glow  salty hair  humid air  night blooms  body heat  hot topics. Fall in jungle love. Make your escape!

name: old-spice-wolfthorn-1
detail: The buckthorn is a woman's best friend  because it makes her daydream of peaceful mornings on a terrace and  at night  of dangerous romances with perfect strangers who only speak foreign languages. That is why buckthorn is also a man's best friend  because even if he is a stranger who only speaks a foreign language  his attractive scent will overcome all barriers of communication.

name: monocle-scent-one-hinoki
detail: A fragrance inspired by the perfect stillness and slightly chilly spring morning spent soaking in a bathtub at the Tawaraya in Kyoto. It combines the memory of moss and trees in the open air with the crisp notes of the hinoki bathtub.

name: nostos
detail: Nostos in Greek means the return. Here  perfume is the vehicle of the return to which one aspires in vain. Like an intense and deep incense that would have burned for three thousand years  the perfume celebrates the Homeric epic of that most beautiful of heroes  whose anger and its unpredictable consequences made the Trojan War: Achilles.

name: classique-pride-collector-2023
detail: A fragrance celebrating freedom in all the colours of the rainbow? Get used to it! That’s right  Jean Paul Gaultier is once again proud to celebrate our differences with this limited edition of Pride. The proud bottle marching at the front of the parade  Classique flaunts their chrome torso in a t-shirt tagged with the 1994 Spring-Summer Street Art print matching that of their beloved partner. In their wake  freshness on the skin and love in spades  an eau de toilette for everyone that brings joy to the senses. A whole community in celebration.

name: ambre-chromatique-1
detail: Founder Thibaud Crivelli  faithful to his approach  was once again inspired by a personal event  a moment during which he experienced a powerful  surprising and intense shock to the senses. He has taken inspiration from a trek through multicolored jungles in search of benzoin resin to create Ambre Chromatique.

name: ganymede-extrait
detail: Ganymede Extrait evokes a world so loaded with aromatic scents that it becomes combustible. Its sky gleams with mandarin and holy fumaroles of incense and myrrh. It’s a planet with warm dunes and spicy and caramelised everlasting flowers. A precious extrait with a dizzying trail.

name: gucci-guilty-elixir-pour-femme
detail: Created to inspire a deeper connection to authenticity  Guilty Elixir pour Femme celebrates the Gucci Guilty signature by intensifying its most precious ingredients into a timelessly contemporary juice.

name: bad-boy-collector-gold-fantasy-2022-1
detail:
Bad Boy represents the ultimate modern man with a fragrance that is as textured as it is brilliant  playing on contrasting facets of contemporary masculinity. Warm and dark classic key notes were unconventionally treated with a luminous freshness to create a perfect twist that captures man’s eternally rebellious nature. For this limited release  the emblematic Bad Boy
lightning bolt bottle is entirely doused in perfectly polished gold.

name: fleur-narcotique-extrait
detail: Fleur Narcotique Extrait expresses its most sophisticated and intense personality with an overdose of blooming ingredients for an everlasting effect on the skin.

name: divine-22
detail: Divine celebrates a unique version of femininity: plural  sensual  free  and more necessary than ever. Outrageously chic. Audaciously daring. Divinely feminine. “Be yourself! But not like that!” Since the beginning of time  society has been telling women how to behave and be a woman. Glorifying every aspect of femininity  and embracing the richness of being different  the Gaultier Divine women are freeing themselves from the clichés of gender and celebrating their uniqueness. Sexies  rebellious  human  divines  these living  breathing goddesses seamlessly combine uniqueness and otherness in a single corset. That’s the effect of this utterly inimitable  sunny eau de parfum once it gets in contact with the skin. Surprising  addictive  captivating  simply divine.

name: kenzo-homme-eau-de-parfum-2022-1
detail: A sensual interpretation of leather warmed by sunlight and brightened by spicy facets  in a bottle inspired by a katana-cut bamboo shoot.

name: guidance-1
detail: An ivory tower wreathed in shreds of clouds  dewy mists and beads of incense draw the outlines of a dreamful haven. A princess leads you into a lush garden. A fountain gleams in the centre  its marble edge covered in scarlet roses. Who are you  she asks  and you feel seen.

name: le-male-pride-collector-2023
detail: A fragrance celebrating freedom in all the colours of the rainbow? Get used to it! That’s right  Jean Paul Gaultier is once again proud to celebrate our differences with this limited edition of Pride. The proud bottle marching at the front of the parade  Le Male flaunts his chrome torso in a t-shirt tagged with the 1994 Spring-Summer Street Art print matching that of his beloved partner. In his wake  freshness on the skin and love in spades  an eau de toilette for everyone that brings joy to the senses. A whole community in celebration.

name: le-male-elixir
detail: Forget everything you thought you knew about Le Male(s). Imagine a stormy sea. A ship in distress. On board  an army of sexy-looking sailors. Among them  a tattooed silhouette takes the lead. Captain of the salty seas  bearer of a lush-looking skin. Over his flamboyant chest  his intense perfume exudes sex appeal to the point of addiction. A copper-coloured skin burns those who dare to touch it as the light of the setting sun sinks in. Whether in land or sea  no one can resist his charm. Blazing with virility  he strolls in an ambered-coloured sailor’s blouse letting a flaming gold torso reveal his muscular build. Its incandescent skin releases a woody aromatic amber fragrance.  A torrid intensity  coming from the freshness of a deliciously  pungent mint and a subtle tonka bean. Its smell ignites the senses  delicately stirred by a vibrant dialogue between lavender’s sensual accents  and a sweet vanilla benzoin. Free as the open sea  its juice awakens the skin. Nothing can escape its warm drops and its animal scent. Le Male Elixir: a potion of pleasure  an addiction for the senses.

name: fleur-narcotique-musc-2022
detail: Fleur Narcotique is Ex Nihilo's interpretation of the new Rive Droite's woman  sophisticated and seductive. The musk coats an overdose of substantive ingredients revealing new softened and voluptuous nuances on the skin. Its sillage becomes deliciously intoxicating.

name: le-beau-paradise-garden
detail: Step into a mesmerising Paradise Garden. Le Beau Paradise Garden entwines its green fig with coconut water  suffused with powerful sandalwood. An irresistible fresh juice.

name: la-belle-paradise-garden
detail: This eau de parfum awakens the senses like an aphrodisiac nectar. The charm is bewitching. At the heart of this exotic juice: a blue lotus flower shrouded in a mysterious and deep veil. Powdery iris confers a feminine elegance in all delicacy  while comforting vanilla brings a gourmet and sensual touch  leaving no one insensitive to its magnetism.

name: purpose-1
detail: A brisk citrus note washes over you like a draft of glacial air. A deep breath fills your lungs with a fierce and smoky scent. Yet this is roads’ end  where the sun is always high  and rays of powerful notes spear through your leathery cloak of doubts  to kindle a mist of previous accords  shimmering like a swarm of fireflies.

name: guess-1981-los-angeles-for-men
detail: Channeling the modern Guess man and the dualities of LA  Guess 1981 Los Angeles Men is a fresh  masculine fragrance with a complex and sexy energy. The textural top notes deliver an aromatic effect  boosted by bracing cool spicy and herbaceous heart notes. The warm  woody background adds an exciting contrast  completing this unforgettable composition.

name: afropolis-1
detail: Afropolis is inspired by the influential cultural identity and energetic global impact of contemporary Africa and its dynamic cities.

name: mr-burberry-indigo
detail: A man of contrasts. Classic yet contemporary. Sophisticated and sensual. Stylish with a rebellious attitude. Authentic and British. He makes an impromptu escape from the city. Seeking freedom. Refreshed and invigorated. A contrast to his busy London life.

name: figolo
detail: Figolo is fascinating - a guy with an aura  charming and dominant at the same time. In this charismatic perfume portrait  fresh mint and sensual floral notes meet powerful patchouli and fine tobacco. A character fragrance with sex appeal and cool nonchalance that is second to none.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Spearmint', 'Cypriol / Nagarmota', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Aldehyde', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Leather', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Tobacco Leaf']

name: original-penguin-premium-blend
detail: An icy and fresh fragrance with a long-lasting trail. Uniquely refined and undeniably addictive.

name: bench-for-him-1
detail: Masculine  cool refined  and stylish. Bench for Him is a verdant and lively cologne for a man on the move.

name: eau-de-passion-franck-olivier-men
detail: This masculine fragrance is characterised by aromatic and woody notes. The heart of this fragrance is composed of a varied bouquet of powerful and captivating notes that make it hard to tear yourself away from it. The end result is simply sublime and gives this fragrance a powerful and mysterious scent.

name: flora-notis-floral-green-scent
detail: The comfortable refreshing feeling of Flora Notis Floral Green Scent is like a moment of a holiday enjoying yourself with close friends in a garden of flowers and swaying trees. Even if you wear it out with a lover or a friend  it will make you feel refreshed every time.

name: sedley-1
detail: A citrus pairing creates an unparalleled fresh opening that is addictive and inviting. Spearmint breathes life and vitality into the fragrance  while rosemary seduces the wearer with its aromatic presence. This energetic composition ends with powerful  refined woods that ground the composition and create its iconic structure.

name: jaguar-for-men-evolution
detail: Jaguar for Men Evolution is designed to lead the lifestyle of a sophisticated and yet urban gentleman. Dedicated to the new generation  a fragrance that embodies masculine virility and contemporary elegance  while revitalizing the mind and body with its force of dynamic. An invigorating expression of a new generation.

name: brittany-breeze-1
detail: Atlantic winds off the coast of Brittany  the sea breeze fills the sails of a clipper  heading for the horizon.

name: herba-fresca-1
detail: Herba Fresca is like a barefoot summer's walk in the early morning in a dew-damped garden  where the first fragrances of grass rising from the soil  blending with the scent of herbs  fruit trees and wildflowers.

name: eau-capitale
detail: For Diptyque  only chypre  the legendary accord with a thousand facets  could pay worthy tribute to Paris  the city of a thousand faces. An Eiffel Tower  roses  flowing calligraphy  a peacock with its tail fanned  volutes  lines intertwined. To illustrate Eau Capitale  Diptyque drew inspiration from Parisian architecture and iconic Art Nouveau buildings.

name: mode-zero
detail: Fashion cannot make you sexy. Experience makes you sexy. Imagination makes people sexy. You have to train yourself  you have to study and you have to live your life.

name: empower-you
detail: Woody notes and incense mingle with freshly picked citrus fruits to create a powerful sensuality.

name: legend-pour-homme-eau-de-parfum
detail: Legend Pour Homme Eau de Parfum is made for a charismatic and confident man. A more concentrated interpretation with an assertive character.
ingredients: ['Magnolia', 'Geranium', 'Leather', 'Violet Leaves', 'Lavender', 'Apple', 'Jasmine', 'Rose', 'Evernyl (Moss)', 'Pomarose (Apple Rosy note)', 'Bergamot', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Litsea Cubeba', 'Moss', 'Sandalwood', 'Tonka Bean', 'Pineapple leaves']

name: zlatan-sport
detail: Zlatan Sport lends a fresh and invigorating scent to men of all ages who want to remain fresh and smell great regardless of the challenges they face throughout their day. A perfect fragrance to top off the daily routine.
ingredients: ['Marine', 'Moss', 'Cocktail', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Woody Notes', 'Cardamom', 'Floral Notes', 'Ginger', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Star Anise', 'Water Fruits', 'Green Apple', 'Peppermint']

name: toy-2-bubble-gum-1
detail: Moschino Toy 2 Bubble Gum relieves the spirit from negative thoughts  envelops the body and stimulates the mind. For the pink addicted only!

name: zlatan-sport-pour-femme-1
detail: Zlatan Sport pour Femme lends a fresh and invigorating scent for the sporty girl with an attitude who wants to remain fresh and smell great throughout her day.

name: african-colors
detail: For a colourful style  rely on African Colors  a floral explosion that mixes warmth and sensuality in a spicy trail.

name: eros-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: "I imagined a heroic and passionate man  almost a Greek god. The fragrance is composed of notes that express sensuality and power  extreme strength " Donatella Versace.

name: explorer-3
detail: Montblanc and the Explorer share common values  such as the desire to go higher and higher in excellence. Climb summits  challenge conventions or explore the limits of the four corners of the globe.

name: explorer-ultra-blue
detail: Explorer Ultra Blue is an irresistible invitation to embrace the explorer's adventurous spirit and embark on an epic olfactory journey.

name: scent-of-kiss-1
detail: Kisses can be friendly  passionate  affectionate; a brush of the lips  or deep. Armand Basi has captured the scent of a kiss of love  the kind that opens the doors of paradise and hell at the same time.

name: zlatan-sport-fwd-1
detail: Zlatan Sport FWD evokes the feeling of moving confidently in the right direction with a successful mindset  ready for all the day’s challenges.

name: police-to-be-exotic-jungle-for-man-1
detail: Wonderfully pure botanical motifs emerge from the overall design  evoking a wild green Eden. The equatorial rainforest now enters the city to create an original urban zoological landscape.

name: kenzo-homme-fresh-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Our iconic perfume Kenzo Homme Eau de Parfum comes in a wearable version  Kenzo Homme Fresh Eau de Parfum. It's a must-have to take with you everywhere you go  and to scent yourself at any time of the day. Spray on the fragrance and immediately enjoy a wave of freshness.
ingredients: ['Marine', 'Cedarwood', 'Vetiver', 'Mint', 'Pine Needles', 'Fennel Seeds', 'Bergamot', 'Cinnamon', 'Lemon', 'Amber', 'Carnation', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Fir Balsam', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lily', 'Musk', 'Nutmeg', 'Oakmoss', 'Peach', 'Rose', 'Sandalwood']

name: zlatan-sport-pro-1
detail: Zlatan Sport Pro is a bold and powerful scent that suits any man who sees life as an adventure.

name: eau-de-lacoste-l1212-jeremyville-pour-homme-1
detail: Eau de Lacoste L.12.12 captures the playful spirit of the brand  to evoke the very spirit of the iconic polo shirt  unforgettably cool  inventive  elegant  and yet stylish. Like the confidence  a man feels when he dons a classic Lacoste L.12.12 polo shirt. Lacoste x Jeremyville offers a fun  colourful take on Lacoste’s tennis roots.

name: eros-flame-pour-homme-1
detail: "The spark of true love is the dream that each of us pursues. True love captures the soul  body  and mind and never lets you go. It takes your breath away because  without your beloved  you no longer feel complete. True love consumes everything in an eternal flame of passion " Donatella Versace.

name: eros-parfum-1
detail: "Eros  as the Greek god of love  is passionate  heroic and romantic. I chose his ingredients to convey a unique sense of sensuality  confidence and inner strength " Donatella Versace.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Mandarin', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Lemon', 'Litsea Cubeba', 'Clary Sage', 'Geranium (Egypt)', 'Elemi', 'Black Pepper', 'Benzoin', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Vanilla', 'Pomarose (Apple Rosy note)', 'Vetiver (Haiti)']

name: soir-dorient-wild-gold-2019
detail: Sisley makes its Soir d'Orient fragrance more coveted than ever in this limited edition  which wraps the bottle in a golden crocodile print and is sprayed with a vintage-inspired pump. Loaded with mystery and femininity  its iconic fragrance has infinite facets thanks to a dynamic blend of fruits  spices and flowers.

name: absolute-santal-by-elite-gentleman
detail: For the man who seeks those finer things that are sophisticated and timeless.

name: sensus-him-absolute-santal-1
detail: This fragrance celebrates the victories in life  as well as the experience that accompanies them.

name: santal-superfluide
detail: "I have wanted to work with sandalwood  which offers powdery  balsamic and slightly animalic facets  for years. I have always had a very emotional reaction to its warm  velvety scent. Sprayed on hot spots such as the wrists  inner elbows or knees  Sandalwood Superfluid leaves behind a woody and strongly addictive trail"  Arnaud Poulain  Olfactory Director.

name: white-sandalwood-1
detail: This heavenly sophisticated scent stands out because of its unique blend of exotic spices and rich wood. It evokes the fragrance of sizzling scent oil flowing down the balmy leaves of a sacred tree. It's an opulent and sensual fragrance for those not afraid to expose their love of wide-open spaces that epitomise the Australian dream.

name: amber-sandalwood
detail: Charismatic  spellbinding  and captivating.

name: orange-x-santal-by-natalie-gracia-cetto
detail: Bright and joyful  natural bitter orange and natural sandalwood transport you to the Italian coast.

name: 214-violeta-sandalo
detail: 214 Violeta & Sândalo is the perfect gathering of the strength of Violet notes with the intensity of woody notes  combined with the soft and velvety touch of the Cuir Velours Chord   which refers to the most delicate facet of the leather. This surprising encounter gave birth to an authentic fragrance like his own skin.

name: santal-blush
detail: The confidence of distinctive ingredients leaves its mark of true luxe via the clean freshness in this fragrance.

name: sandalo-australia
detail: Sandalo Australia is a sweet and warm fragrance. A creamy sandalwood  enriched with sensual amber facets  provides a reassuring and welcoming sensation.

name: santal-33
detail: Santal 33 is an open fire; a soft drift of smoke; where sensuality rises after the light has gone. A perfume that touches the sensual universality  that would intoxicate a man as much as a woman.

name: sensus-her-absolute-santal-1
detail: A sensual fragrance with an intoxicating trail.

name: unico-masculino
detail: A unique intense fragrance. A true work of art.

name: coach-dreams
detail: Coach Dreams. Live your dreams. A fragrance with accents of freedom and adventure: a road trip across America.

name: una-infinito
detail: Inspired by the infinite beauty of the galaxy  Una Infinito combines explosive bright notes with a gourmand accord. Perfect for special occasions.

name: valentino-uomo-born-in-roma
detail: Uomo Born in Roma is a modern aromatic vetiver fragrance.  Aromatic and smoky notes give the classic Valentino couture signature  which is shaken by a cool vibrating facet to give the fragrance an unmistakable edge.

name: moncler-sunrise-pour-homme
detail: Moncler Sunrise pour Homme is a tribute to the majesty of nature  to exploration and heightened senses  capturing the simple yet thrilling emotion of the breaking dawn in the heart of the mountain range.

name: a-fleur-de-peche
detail: À Fleur de Pêche is a tribute to the famous orchards of Versailles.

name: ferragamo-spicy-leather-1
detail: Ferragamo Spicy Leather is a statement blend for today’s daring  confident and grounded men  pragmatic yet incredibly passionate  inspired by their inclusive spirit and driven by their inner strength.

name: valentino-uomo-born-in-roma-intense
detail: An outstanding tribute to Rome and its sunsets  Born In Roma Intense aims to exalt its magnificent personality  celebrating an evening in the eternal city. The scent of this Born In Roma fragrance amplifies the addictive Born In Roma pushing powerful vanilla infusion.

name: illusione-for-him
detail: Away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life  lies a sunny Italian villa. Gentle breezes warm the air  water ripples in a nearby pool. In the distance you can hear the gentle buzzing of cicadas. In this setting  all the senses are heightened  creating an intoxicating sense of calm. For an instant  time stands still and the line between dream and reality blurs.

name: ferragamo
detail: Ferragamo. A fragrance for him. A statement blend that expresses the confident and courageous soul of a modern man who journeys through life with passion and inevitable sophistication.

name: armani-code-absolu-gold-1
detail: Armani Code Absolu Gold is a fragrance that conveys modern fullness and creates a beautiful balance between fresh notes and the deepest  most powerful ingredients that embody masculine charm.

name: coach-love-2023
detail: A warm and playful depiction of love through the lens of individuality  Coach Love is a celebration of love in all its different forms and expressions.

name: ferragamo-bright-leather
detail: Ferragamo Bright Leather is an essential scent for the confident contemporary man who always expresses his individuality  taking part in changing times.

name: illusione-bois-nu-for-him-2021
detail: An intense solar accord enhanced by sparkling citrus notes.

name: ferragamo-intense-leather-1
detail: Spotlights on. He’s in control. His act  his rules. He is determined and focused. He moves his steps going beyond the stage boundaries  playing out of the script  following an inner voice. He is the character and his energy fills the theatre. Standing ovation.
ingredients: ['Leather', 'Mandarin', 'Iris / Orris', 'Apple', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Pink Pepper', 'Clary Sage']

name: armani-code-eau-de-parfum
detail: Armani Code Eau de Parfum conveys a mood of elegant seduction. Inspired by the man who attracts with an innate magnetism  who seduces without provocation and who marries authenticity with ease of being.

name: cuore-di-pepe-nero-1
detail: Cuore di Pepe Nero or “Heart of Black Pepper” is the result of an extensive quest for the perfect fragrance. The essence is as sensual and mysterious as it is energising and refreshing.

name: amber-poivre
detail: Mark your presence with the new Amber Poivre from Ajmal's A Series. A deep dive into a timeless tale of the Orient to liberate your senses.

name: vetiver-e-poivre-1
detail: Immediate spicy notes are at the heart of this perfume. Tempered with soft resinous aromas and classic green hints.

name: mon-poivre-1
detail: A spicy and virile fragrance  Mon Poivre exhales a scent of adventure in its wake.

name: poivre-23
detail: Poivre 23 translates as Pepper 23 and is Le Labo's pepper statement. Why pepper? (And we're talking about real bourbon pepper  the Rolls Royce of peppers). Because it is the spice of all spices  widely used in perfumery  and we wanted pepper to finally get what it deserves  prominence. And only for London.

name: thistle-black-pepper-1
detail: Thistle & Black Pepper is a conspicuously masculine fragrance that will give you a feeling of self-confidence.

name: re-charge-black-pepper-eau-de-parfum
detail: Terracotta-hued sculptured buttes juxtaposed by deep limestone karsts. The inky waterways of Pangalanes canal encircled by a carnelian sunset shading baobab trees. Russet sands whirl with vigour over spicy desert earth. Unleash your wild side with epic abandon.

name: re-charge-black-pepper-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: The off-road trek from mountainous Masaola to a savannah grass canyon. A spice-spiked breeze kicks heated earth. Loose rubble tumbles into deep gorges  shot through with streams. Conquer the adventure with our iconic fragrance.

name: cosmic-pepper
detail: A floating space opera made of magnetic and thrilling accords.
ingredients: ['Black Pepper', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Tangerine', 'Amber', 'Lemon', 'Tonka Bean', 'Pink Pepper', 'Clary Sage', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Rose Damascena']

name: utopia-ii-pour-homme-1
detail: Utopia II Pour Homme is a unique fragrance consisting of fresh woody and fruity notes brought together to appeal to the unconventional  neo-modern man seeking greater eccentricity in his fragrance.

name: black-8
detail: Black by Superdry. An aromatic heart sweetened by juicy citrus notes and rich ripe fruits complemented by a deep rich woody base in the base combined with balsamic  smoky and leathery notes.

name: provence-meadow
detail: Provence Meadow is a soft green scent  informed by the Herbs of Provence. While we normally think of Herbs of Provence in their dried form for cooking  in typical Demeter fashion  we use fresh  living herbs to achieve this unique result.

name: denim-azure
detail: Active. Adventurous. Bold. Denim Azure is a contemporary interpretation of the Denim Original variant. Fresher and more aromatic.

name: terra-bella-1
detail: "I sculpted this composition to provide contrasts  evoking a landscape of orange trees warmed by the sun and the rippling water of the canals of the Alhambra. The soul of this creation resides in the South and exudes a delicate scent of orange blossom  sprinkled with myrtle and cypress"  François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: eau-aromatique
detail: Succumb to this explosive and energising fragrance that blends warm aromas of tonka bean and aromatic notes of sage. The association between the crispness of sage and the fiery sensuality of tonka bean makes Eau Aromatique a delicious and daring fragrance.

name: vinaigre-de-toilette-edition-mediterranee-2021-1
detail: The iconic Vinagre de Toilette is reinvented for the summer with an infusion of plants from the Mediterranean basin to refresh and soothe the senses.

name: gentleman-urbane
detail: The Urbane Gentleman by day is the powerful businessman  by night he leads the social scene. He brings elegance to every occasion and his versatility is rooted deep in his lifestyle.

name: lavender-thyme-1
detail: This calming fragrance captures the warmth and beauty of the countryside of Provence in France and is reminiscent of violet-colored fields of lavender under brilliant sunrays. The Mediterranean composition of relaxing lavender and spicy  warming thyme softly calms the frenzied senses.

name: iii-lheure-vertueuse-1
detail: Cartier's III L'Heure Vertueuse is a collection of olfactory moments capturing pure emotion of a stroll through a magic garden to breathe the enchanting perfumes of miraculous plants. It is a unique moment  an aromatic caress of the fresh  gentle green notes.

name: exil
detail: Jardins D'Écrivains embodies the "Pléiade" with a triptych of poems whose olfactory adaptation expresses the intensity of cedar. Excellence inspires a precious sillage. Exile by Saint-John Perse. An emanation of deeply rooted elements. "I will inhabit my name"

name: kings-salute
detail: Grossmith continues the tradition of celebrating royal events by introducing King’s Salute  launched at Fortnum & Mason on the coronation day of HM King Charles III  on 6th May 2023. The scent evokes the King’s love for his Highgrove Garden  where lavender and thyme are found in abundance.

name: purple-haze-19-69-1
detail: The Purple Haze fragrance embraces the hippie movement and counterculture  just like John and Yoko's 1969 Amsterdam and Montreal inns.
ingredients: ['Thyme', 'Cannabis Accord', 'Black Pepper', 'Cypress', 'Laurel', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Palmarosa', 'Violet Leaves', 'Bergamot', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Dry Woods', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Vanilla']

name: colosseum
detail: A captivating story  a unique breeze of aromatic freshness brushing the ambery roots of Italian history.

name: agua-brava-1
detail: Zesty yet warm; brisk with a robust blend. The values  emotions  and traditions this fragrance evokes have created a world of their own. Agua Brava is not just a simple fragrance  but with an identity of its own.

name: loewe-solo-vulcan
detail: Vulcan evokes the powerful  fiery eruption of a volcano and echoes the fleeting potency of the rockrose’s fragrant blooms.

name: fiore-di-cotone
detail: The smell of freshly hung laundry  the clearness of a cloudless sky. A neat and clean perfume.

name: shards-of-cedar-red-thyme
detail: "Warm  sharp  and sophisticated  this scent is full of exciting aromatic notes that weave confidently one into the other. With just one spritz  I'm reminded of "that" moment when someone walks past you wearing the most beautiful cologne  so intoxicating that you stop and turn your head " Jo Malone.

name: untitled-leau
detail: Untitled l'Eau has an uncommon elegance and freshness  the Margiela way!

name: pani-walewska-classic
detail: Pani Walewska Classic is a perfume that conceals the entire quintessence of femininity.

name: must-de-cartier-eau-de-toilette
detail: A unique alchemy  reverberating with the mysteries of a feminine seduction. The scents of the Orient will follow you as you make your entrance. A fragrance with an emblematic name...

name: dhajala-1
detail: An exotic combination of rare and sumptuous elements harmoniously blended to create a perfume that is both elegant and seductive. Delicate citrus blossoms give a fresh floral introduction to spicy and intriguing heart notes  all designed on a woody  seductive and mysterious base.

name: eau-de-hongrie
detail: Eau de Hongrie is a 14th-century composition of soft citrus and floral notes on a warm background of resins. Authentic  timeless and elegantly sober  it never fails to charm.

name: joy-forever-eau-de-parfum
detail: "In creating the Joy Forever fragrance  I was inspired by the Jean Patou woman. A woman who effortlessly combines a relaxed casual style with a natural and refined elegance. This duality was my starting point to build a floral bouquet with the vibrant heart of this mythical accord." - Thomas Fontaine  perfumer

name: eau-de-vert-boheme
detail: There is something particularly uplifting and enriching about experiencing an exquisite moment of repose and reflection meandering along the paths of a perfectly landscaped garden. The opulence and transcendent beauty of magnificent green gardens inspired Vert Bohème  a seductive green symphony.

name: rv-pure-woman-1
detail: RV Pure Woman is a fragrance inspired by the power of attraction of a strong woman. Energetic  vital  and strong femininity that is coherent with the important values of being a woman.

name: lightscape-1
detail: Lightscape explores the interplay between bold freshness and delicate refinement. A unique fragrance  versatile enough to wear all year round  it transitions seamlessly from day to night.

name: oudh-al-misk
detail: A sunny  joyful scent with a strong ambery trail.

name: clash-celluloid-galbanum-1
detail: The association of Celluloid and Galbanum is by essence contradictory. Originating from the opposite realms of technology and nature  plastic and resin converge in creating a whole new scent.

name: vert-boheme
detail: There is something especially uplifting and enriching to experience an exquisite moment of repose and reflection by meandering down the paths of a perfectly designed garden. The opulence and transcendent beauty of magnificent green gardens inspired Vert Bohème  a seductive green symphony.

name: bella-28
detail: Embrace the essence of elegance with our enchanting perfume  your soul will be captivated by its harmonious symphony.

name: beach-hut-man
detail: “Beach Hut Man tells the story of an iridescent aromatic idyll that unfolds in the fragrant wild garden of a beach hut  where the sweeping sand dunes meet the sea ” says Chong. “It liberates the senses and unleashes emotion as it explores the intoxicating sublime of the shoreline during the mesmerising moments of sunset.”

name: aire-loewe
detail: The elegance and sophistication of Loewe’s signature feminine fragrance. A distinctive  contemporary aroma for Loewe’s oldest existing fragrance  a symbol of freedom and unadulterated hedonism.

name: untitled
detail: Untitled is grounded on an entire philosophy  a new way of looking at luxury. It's a kind of alternative to the classical luxury or some kind of ostentatious luxury.

name: florian
detail: This unique scent pays homage to Florian  the outstanding Burma ruby held by Gritti dynasty for the last three centuries. Its extraordinary purity and full-bodied  deep burgundy shade inspired the perfumer’s research of the Orient with its outstanding way of life  rich coloors  and intoxicating smells.

name: petroleum-1
detail: A symbol of wealth and prosperity  Petroleum is an unexpected essence  once referred to as ‘Black Gold'  it is rich  dark  and mysterious… a miraculous gift from the depths of our Earth. Pétroleum is a potion  a rare elixir that will lead to exalted ecstasy and pure euphoria.

name: intricate-1
detail: A perfume at its purest  made to make the wearer shine with confidence when dealing with the intricacies of the daily social whirl. A sublime statement of uncompromising intent.

name: civet-1
detail: Zoologist Civet pays homage to the age-old ingredient  civet  as well as chypre perfumes of bygone days – perfumes that refused to be intimidated by raw  alluring  animalistic musks. A bewildering  sophisticated scent with the promise of a sultry nighttime rendezvous.
ingredients: ['Civet', 'Oakmoss', 'Black Pepper', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coffee', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Leather', 'Musk', 'Resins', 'Vanilla', 'Vetiver', 'Woody Notes', 'Balsamic Notes', 'Bergamot', 'Carnation', 'Frangipani', 'Heliotrope', 'Hyacinth', 'Lemon', 'Linden Blossom', 'Orange', 'Spicy Notes', 'Tarragon', 'Tuberose', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: bel-ami
detail: The name Bel Ami refers to the character in Guy de Maupassant's novel of the same name  an eminently seductive dandy. A romantic intrigue  almost a detective novel. Classical and elegant style. Remarkable and assertive writing. A real leather  sensual and distinguished.

name: sela-parfum
detail: A beast of a perfume!

name: egnaro
detail: Memories of cruising the Mediterranean Coast on a hot summer day in 1992. From Valencia to Palermo  stopping at Barcelona  Marseille Genova and Napoli. Idyllic childhood memories etched in my memory and the sea was my only witness. Hours and hours standing on deck  relishing the fragrances the breeze brought to me.

name: hot-always-1
detail: Inspired by those private  secluded places; romantic  out-of-the-way restaurants and discreet hotels  this passionately male fragrance is perfect for the sensuous kind of guy who leads with his heart and soul  and never plays by the rules.

name: sacred-scarab
detail: Just as the Egyptians entrusted sacred mummies to tombs for the journey to the afterlife  a scarab burying its treasure marks the dawn of a new life. Zoologist Sacred Scarab captures the mystique of Kyphi incense  a blend of precious accords. This divine fragrance  once laced with wine and burned in ancestral rituals  today guides the spirit towards discovery and rebirth.

name: tyrannosaurus-rex-2018-1
detail: A limited edition of a fantastical cretaceous apocalyptic scent.

name: nuit-de-cellophane
detail: "When  under its cellophane  Haute Couture was just an idea. Do you know the scent of osmanthus? The flower is white or tinged with orange. From the tight clusters of its petals comes a scent of jasmine mixed with mandarin. On hot summer days  it provides a breath of fresh air". Serge Lutens.

name: aromatics-elixir-eau-de-parfum
detail: An intriguing non-conformist fragrance which performs the role of a perfume  but goes beyond; touching the senses and spirit in subtle  pleasing ways. This scent appeals to the individualist in every woman. Starting off with toning and astringent qualities that also give a sense of calm.

name: tyrannosaurus-rex-1
detail: A fantastical cretaceous apocalyptic scent.

name: cuir-curcuma-1
detail: Native to Kerala  turmeric has been used for Affinessence's latest perfume. A milky note enhances the precious turmeric root  bringing an explosion of the deliciously spicy aromas of turmeric latte  a drink that has been drunk for thousands of years in India and is also known as golden milk.

name: hyper-oud
detail: An inner voyage cloaked in mysterious accords  compelled by a luminous oud  an aromatic  woody armour with surprisingly frosty tinges  merged with the nectarous depth of vanilla and the spicy spark of turmeric and ginger to conjure emotions in the making. A fearless energy that carries us forward.

name: neroli-plein-sud
detail: With Néroli Plein Sud  the freshness of neroli takes off for a dizzying horizon of spices and woods to rediscover its Moroccan origins and spirit. Inspired by the southern voyages undertaken by Antoine de Saint Exupéry  the renowned explorer and author of The Little Prince  it's a breathtaking olfactory journey between earth and sky.

name: full-speed-300-kmh-electric
detail: Accelerate your adrenaline with 300 Km/H Electric. Supercharged in seconds  made to last for hours with energised turmeric  lavender  and vetiver.

name: volpe-next
detail: Strong and energizing  Volpe Next is for the men who believe that nothing is impossible.

name: madurai-1
detail: A memory of India  steeped in the rich and airy fragrance of jasmine Sambac and the creamier scent of sandalwood  is what guided the composition of Madurai. A fragrance that stirs the senses with vibrant notes of citrus and turmeric  like a colourful market stall.

name: turmeric-1
detail: Turmeric has been used as a bright yellow dye  and in cooking for hundreds of years  mostly to add colour to sauces and curries. More recently  it is touted for its health benefits. But only Demeter is focused on the lovely scent profile Turmeric provides.

name: turmeric
detail: Turmeric has been used as a bright yellow dye  and in cooking for hundreds of years  mostly to add colour to sauces and curries. More recently  it is touted for its health benefits. But only The Library of Fragrance is focused on the lovely scent profile turmeric provides.

name: dodo-jackfruit-edition
detail: The sun sparkled across rippling waves  its morning dance upon the Indian Ocean rousing the dodos from their carefree slumber. Stumbling drunkenly across the forest floor they feasted on overripe fruit where it lay  dropped for them by the lush island paradise that nurtured them. Soothed by the comforting florals  you’ll soon surrender too.

name: star-sense-sensual
detail: Discover the enchanting allure of Star Sense Sensual  a captivating and warm fragrance that transports your senses to a world of spices and allure.
ingredients: ['Ginger', 'Lavender', 'Curcuma (Turmeric)', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Peppermint', 'Angelica', 'Chamomile', 'Ginseng', 'Juniper Berries', 'Orange', 'Arnica', 'Black Elder', 'Honeysuckle', 'Hops', 'Lemon Balm', 'Nettle', 'Patchouli', "St. John'S Wort", 'Yarrow', 'Calendula', 'Herbs ', 'Witch Hazel']

name: pure-breeze
detail: Pure Breeze  from our eco-friendly collection  will give you the freshness you need. Every time you use it  you smile and the planet smiles.

name: gant-2023
detail: A timeless fougère signature with the finest ingredients inspired by our birthplace on the American East Coast.

name: jasmin-et-cigarette-jasmine-and-cigarette
detail: It is the era of Harcourt Studios when Greta Garbo and Marlene Dietrich magnetised men with a Hollywood look in the eye  smoking a cigarette in a smoky black-and-white ambiance. Jasmin et Cigarette is also the slight jasmine smell of a woman's skin when she exposes her freshness to the dark seduction of night. A hazy atmosphere.The reminder of a fantasy  of an inedible trail she leaves on a dress at the break of day or in the intimate memory of the man who made love to her.

name: rain-flower-jasmine
detail: Indulge in the captivating scent of Rain Flower Jasmine  a delicate and feminine fragrance that harmoniously blends floral and citrus notes.
ingredients: ['Jasmine', 'Black Elder', 'Curcuma (Turmeric)', 'Ginger', 'Honeysuckle', 'Calendula', "St. John'S Wort", 'Yarrow', 'Witch Hazel', 'Arnica', 'Chamomile', 'Lavender', 'Mandarin', 'Nettle', 'Ginseng', 'Juniper Berries', 'Lemon Zest', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Lemon Petitgrain (Leaves)', 'Peppermint']

name: vetiver-gris-1
detail: Vetiver Gris is the missing link between beautiful  classic  rigorous perfumery and a more whimsical modernism. A perfume of today that knows exactly where it comes from.

name: aquavibe-melancia
detail: This cheerful and refreshing scent will awaken your femininity and well-being.

name: intimacy-instinct
detail: A refreshing scent with a magnetic trail for the adventurous man.

name: 5th-avenue-nyc-pulse
detail: Dedicated to NYC and the magical mood it infuses in all who walk her streets. A spritz of this sparkling and luscious fragrance immediately mesmerises  leaving an unforgettable lasting impression.

name: natura-homem-tato-1
detail: A fragrance to awaken the senses and reveal the power and sensitivity of every man.

name: of-passing-clouds
detail: Lay beneath an open sky  cloud gazing with a slow exhale. Watching as shapes float across the blue. Up here one movement changes the course of everything.

name: halloween-man-hero
detail: Adrenaline turned into a fragrance. Halloween Man Hero is fresh  full of strength and vitality. It perfectly expresses the rebellious and dynamic spirit of our hero.
ingredients: ['Ginger', 'Marine', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon', 'Apple Sorbet', 'Amber Xtreme (Woody Ambery)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Lavender', 'Moss', 'Clary Sage', 'Water Lily']

name: black-suede-real
detail: Reveal your irresistible confidence and bold personality with this seductive and elegant scent.

name: azzaro-sport-eau-de-toilette
detail: Dedicated to modern men who are always on the move  this fragrance exudes a racy  invigorating and comforting freshness that energises body and mind.

name: cerruti-1881-silver-night
detail: Ignited by its magnetic seduction  Silver Night 1881 draws the elegance of the original Silver into a whole new intensity  the ultimate essence of sensuality and seduction. A fragrance for a man with character.

name: match-point-cologne-1
detail: Take action with Match Point Cologne and let yourself be carried away by its exhilarating freshness.

name: valentino-uomo-born-in-roma-rockstud-noir-2023
detail: A bold fragrance inspired by the Rockstud Noir colour  combining the intensity of sage with the sensuality of an ambergris accord.

name: valentino-uomo-born-in-roma-coral-fantasy
detail: The golden hour is the olfactory inspiration for this fragrance  when the city of Rome vibrates with the force of renewed energy. This golden hour invites everyone to reinvent themselves  express their personality and give free rein to their dreams  desires and fantasies. A world of fantasy awaits you at Roma Coral Fantasy.

name: full-speed-pulse
detail: An energetic  vibrating scent inspired by music.

name: cool-water-odyssey-parfum
detail: In an increasingly alienating world  Davidoff Cool Water Odyssey Parfum reminds us that true elegance stems from our ability to reconnect with nature and with ourselves. This empowering experience enables us to harness our inner power and become the true heroes of our own lives.

name: easy-way-of-life
detail:
Passing old car wrecks and decrepit diners  any man travelling along Route 66 is left to his own devices on the seemingly endless road. Nostalgia is in the air. Confident in its 
own allure  the fragrance exudes a balance of strength and coolness  masculinity and independence.

name: sun-sea-salt-genista-2021-2
detail: This fragrance combines fresh mineral and marine notes with intense floral accords to create a sunny  floral fragrance. An addictive and powerfully seductive fragrance that harmoniously symbolises the warmth of summer and the clear blue of the sea.

name: fantasquatic
detail: Deep and mysterious  with an intense minerality  a wave of marine freshness transforms and comes to life when it meets the surprising contrast of the woody notes of amber.

name: match-point-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A borderline addictive fragrance that embodies he who wears it. Confident and self-assured  his strength lies in his ability to recognise opportunities and turn them into accomplishments.

name: sang-bleu-1
detail: Sang Bleu is a fragrance with frank sensuality for a connoisseur; a bold and seductive perfume for the princes of the blood  who cultivate their difference.

name: aventus-absolu-2023
detail: A bold scent that exudes confidence and sophistication.

name: kenzo-memori-poudre-matcha
detail: The tea ceremony. A ritual that gestures a child knows by heart. Under the regular beating of the small bamboo whisk  foam forms  and the green matcha powder colours the hot water. Comforting  toasty smells flood the room. Far outside the rain is slowly receding.

name: coach-open-road-1
detail: A scent inspired by friendship  adventure  and the optimism of a road trip along the American West Coast.

name: 4711-lilac-eau-de-cologne
detail: Lilac heralds spring and awakens positive memories of a garden in bloom. A sensual fragrance that gives the wearer an elegant charisma and enhances her feminine style.

name: here-to-stay-eau-de-parfum
detail: The perfect scent for all strong and self-confident women out there.

name: follow-your-soul-women-1
detail: She stands up for what she needs and wants  exuding confidence and charm. Nothing is left to chance because she truly trusts her intuition. Follow Your Soul Women represents the particular skill of being able to follow your inner voice.

name: rose-nue-1
detail: Rose Nue  the rose you wish to pluck. It comes from Crimea  in the sixteenth century  and already its pale pink colour reflects the emotion caused by the naked skin. The English at the time called it Maiden's Blush.

name: eloge-du-vert-1
detail: Elogue du Vert's note is very green! Indeed  the green in this fragrance emerges from this moss rose when its petals are crushed between our fingers. A resolutely bold  assured perfume. A magnificent eulogy to green perfumes!

name: beige-vintage-rose-1
detail: Beige Vintage Rose by Le Snob  inspired by the modern 70s.

name: mon-amie-la-rose
detail: At ease in her time  she is a natural woman in search of authenticity and Mon Amie La Rose is her perfume  a clear and gentle fragrance  ideal for spring and summer.

name: red-lipstick-rose-1
detail: It is a pure red rose. The essence of seduction in the 80s.

name: ballerina-n5-1
detail: Ballerina Nº5 was inspired by the lovely rose bush in Marie-Hélène Rogeon's garden. Ballerina Nº5 is beautiful and seductive  with the harmonious notes in her captivating dance.

name: kenzo-memori-coeur-azuki-1
detail: Tea time  the delicious smell of azuki beans gently candied in sugar. Soon  the child will enjoy mochis with their tangy blackcurrant heart. Sticky with sugar  his little fingers gently brush against his palate  delighting him with a taste that will last forever. Cœur Azuki is a sophisticated gourmand creation.

name: peau-de-nuit-infinie-1
detail: "Peau de Nuit Infinie is a journey to an unknown  infinite universe  a fragrance that takes you to a place you have never been  from the depth of darkness to dusky twilight " Philippe Starck.

name: mauboussin-promise-me-intense
detail: The promise of sacred love  as powerful as an oath  that you will only love me with a passionate and eternal ardour. The power of a promise. A promise of intense love.

name: velvet-coffee
detail: This scent evokes a soft  warm coffee that releases its bitter scent to reveal a delicate gourmand  milky and voluptuous aroma.

name: boss-the-scent-magnetic-1
detail: Boss The Scent Magnetic is an invitation to experience the power of attraction and seduction like never before.

name: commitment-florale-eau-de-toilette
detail: Commitment Florale Eau de Toilette entices its wearer into a delicate sea of flowers – allowing her to blossom. A vibrant  feminine fragrance that immediately commands attention and envelops the wearer in romantic  floral notes. A fragrance for all women whose hearts speak the language of flowers  and for whom a bouquet of flowers is sure to bring a smile.

name: 4711-remix-cologne-edition-2022
detail: Be crazy  be silly  be different  be whatever  be you! Because life is too short to be anything but happy. Life is as colourful and as varied as you make it. You determine just how wild  crazy  and sparkling your journey will be.

name: cachemire-noir
detail: "Its characteristic sign is its extremely rich trail  thanks to the round and creamy side of sandalwood  and its woody and ambery notes. The labdanum gives this perfume an almost fruity aspect. In the end  it offers the same supple and enveloping sensation as a beautiful fabric". Delphine Lebeau-Krowiak  Perfumer.

name: commitment-florale-eau-de-parfum
detail: Commitment Florale entices its wearer into a delicate sea of flowers – allowing her to blossom. A vibrant  feminine fragrance that immediately commands attention and envelops the wearer in romantic  intense floral notes. A fragrance for all women whose hearts speak the language of flowers  and for whom a bouquet of flowers is sure to bring a smile.

name: salty-amber-2022
detail: An exhilarating swim at high tide.

name: ballerina-n4-1
detail: Dressed with white feathers  she is living near an enchanted lake and she is the ideal woman  desirable and untouchable. She is the absolute beauty.

name: feels-like-summer-women-2020
detail: After the long winter months  you will want to put on your summer dress and dance with abandon across the nearest flower meadow. Feels Like Summer Women captures the sweet flair of the warm season that will envelope its wearer with the most beautiful essences of fresh flowers.

name: aura-loewe-pink-magnolia
detail: Inspired by the glow of a muse  of her aura. The golden color symbolizes courage and passion; the light of every woman.

name: 7-loewe-plata-classic
detail: 7 Loewe Plata is a fragrance inspired by the 7 values that characterize the 7 Loewe man: a man of contrasts that seeks to learn and apprehend every day. A rational person  who nevertheless does not lose sight of his instinct and lets himself go. Eager to live new experiences  close and down to earth  cultured and conceptual.

name: paulas-ibiza-1
detail: "Paula's Ibiza captures the sense of letting go and ecstatic abandon into a fragrance. Yes  a fragrance: something volatile and fickle  just like a breeze. I like this transitory feeling: it reminds me of the sun-kissed summers I spent in Ibiza as a teenager." - Jonathan Anderson  Creative Director

name: agua-de-loewe-miami
detail: An interpretation of the spirit of Miami  its Art deco district full of light and colours  its elementary geometry  and its ornamental abundance.

name: jardines-de-sabatini
detail: Jardines de Sabatini eau de parfum by Loewe focuses on a powerful and meticulously modern blend that invigorates the senses with a unique harmony of raw compositions.

name: 7-loewe-cobalt-1
detail: 7 Loewe Cobalt is a sophisticated and intense fragrance inspired by the far reaches of outer space. A sense of timeless mystery.

name: loewe-001-special-edition-man-2019
detail: Loewe 001 is a distinctive and elegant special edition fragrance for the refined Loewe man.

name: solo-loewe-ella-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Solo Loewe Ella is a fragrance that gets back to the purity of the original concept. Unique  full of contrasts  for the free and confident woman. Solo Loewe Ella is a unique  innovative  and mysterious composition.

name: solo-loewe-origami-classic-1
detail: Inspired by the folds  the geometric shapes and the interplay of volumes of the age-old Japanese art of Origami  we introduce the Loewe Solo Origami fragrance.

name: aire-loewe-fantasia
detail: The most sparkling interpretation within the Aire Loewe family. An eau de toilette with character and body  lightness and transparency.

name: loewe-aire-anthesis
detail: Loewe Aire Anthesis is inspired by the fresh and pure air all around us: elemental  uplifting and life-giving. It features the unique Loewe accord  a raw and authentic  ambery scent based on the rockrose  a delicate yet hardy wildflower native to Spain.

name: aire-loewe-fantasia-classic
detail: The most sparkling interpretation of the Aire Loewe family. An eau de toilette with character and body  lightness and transparency.

name: loewe-solo-atlas
detail: An olfactory journey inspired by the contrasts of the Atlas mountains  spanning desert and sea.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Pink Pepper', 'Vetiver (Haiti)', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Mandarin', 'Neroli', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Marine', 'Lentisk', 'Musk', 'Peony', 'Petitgrain', 'Everlasting Flower']

name: loewe-001-special-edition-woman-2019
detail: Loewe 001 is a distinctive and pure special edition perfume for the elegant Loewe woman.

name: templo-de-debod-1
detail: Mysterious and exotic  Templo de Debod is a fragrance inspired by the Ancient Egyptian relics preserved in the Cuartel de la Montaña Park in Madrid.

name: solo-loewe-mercurio-classic
detail: Discover Loewe Solo Mercurio  a deep and mysterious fragrance in which the contrast between its chords stands out more than ever. A design based on perfectly balanced opposing chords that make the scent consistent and long-lasting.

name: loewe-paulas-ibiza-eclectic-1
detail: The joy of freedom and partying is captured in a fragrance. Open-hearted and hedonistic.

name: esencia-loewe-elixir
detail: Singular and robust  Esencia Elixir blends woody notes with herbs and smoky leather for a captivating impression.

name: paseando-por-la-calle-mayor
detail: Loewe's Paseando por la Calle Mayor Eau de Parfum is a tribute to all the shops that are located in this area of Madrid and that are part of the living history of its community. The mixture of tradition and modernity has allowed them to adapt to the passage of time as this case represents  hand made by Spanish leather craftsmen.

name: agua-de-loewe-442
detail: Loewe Water 44.2 represents everything natural  transparent  and pure  taking the first step towards clean waters of the world  an objective to support the preservation of water  taking care of our oceans and seas.

name: de-la-mano-por-la-rosaleda
detail: De la Mano por la Rosaleda is an explosion for the senses  unfolded in all its magnitude through scents of soft rose and warm musk. Presented in a beautiful golden bottle designed by Spanish jewellery designer Rocío Porres  it is a real treasure to behold.

name: solo-loewe-ella-eau-de-parfum-classic
detail: Solo Loewe Ella is a fragrance that returns to the purity of the original concept. Unique  full of contrasts  for the free and self-confident woman. Solo Loewe Ella is a unique  innovative and mysterious composition.

name: loewe-solo-ella-eau-de-toilette
detail: "Loewe Solo Ella Eau de Toilette is an extraordinary scent with a sublime tail and an unexpected tropical accord. The architecture of opposite accords in equilibrium makes the fragrance bold and yet delicate  sparkling and yet soft. It is the state of balance in a bottle " Nuria Cruelles  Lowe's in-house Perfumer.

name: esencia-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: A unique fragrance with a spicy  wild scent with a note of lavender.

name: aura-loewe-white-magnolia
detail: An contemporary and elegant fragrance with the magnolia flower at the center of its composition. A fragrance of enveloping notes

name: solo-loewe-mercurio-1
detail: Discover Loewe Solo Mercurio  a deep and mysterious fragrance in which the contrast between its chords stands out more than ever. A design based on perfectly balanced opposing chords that make the scent consistent and long-lasting.

name: loewe-earth
detail: Earth is inspired by the elements that connect nature  propelling life above and below the ground  from the atmospheric to the tangible  the visible to the invisible  unifying inner and outer worlds.
