name: vetiver-ecarlate-1
detail: "The realisation of a childhood dream: to create a new vegetable facet. Working with vegetables means going back to the origins of perfumery and  indeed  of oneself. In Vétiver Écarlate  the contrast between the green freshness of the tomato leaf and the woody base works wonders"  Quentin Bisch  Perfumer.

name: alien-eau-extraordinaire
detail: Splendidly radiant  the solar goddess emanates absolute serenity. Through her Eau Extraordinaire  she enhances the sensuality of women with incandescent freshness.

name: arbo-intenso
detail: Arbo Intense is a fragrance that connects you with nature everywhere in a powerful way.

name: incredible-30877
detail: With this fragrance  you can embrace perfection  personify the finest in design and serve as an inspiration.
ingredients: ['Lavender', 'Nutmeg', 'Patchouli', 'Mint', 'Rosemary', 'Clary Sage', 'Black Pepper', 'Grapefruit', 'Green Notes', 'Lemon', 'Lime', 'Plum', 'Ambergris', 'Cedarwood', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Sandalwood', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla']

name: the-wedding-silk-santal-36-2023
detail: Designed as an ode to everlasting love  Mona and Hassan created The Wedding Collection to wear on their special day. Aptly named after the silk gown Mona wore and the velvet suit Hassan wore on their wedding day  The Wedding Silk Santal | 36 and The Wedding Velvet Santal | 35 were inspired by and are bound by the strength of creamy sandalwood. Timeless when worn alone yet amplified when layered together  these juices are made to be shared and celebrate love in all its forms.

name: 703-tonka-bean-moka-1
detail: Olfactive facet 703 is a unique  warm and sensual fragrance. This smooth yet complex arrangement finds its heart in sweet gourmand with aspects of vanilla and caramel. Delicate notes of citrus and lavender gently rest on a base of warm musk.

name: eau-des-merveilles-eau-de-parfum
detail: From the surprise to the magic and from the magic to the spell  the Eau des Merveilles does what it wants on a cloud of fantasy. Novel with numerous facets built around an amber-like  woody chord that resonates to the main notes.

name: rose-of-no-mans-land
detail: Rose of No Man's Land is the nickname given by soldiers to the nurses who saved thousands of lives during the First World War. The fragrance is a tribute to selflessness and compassion.

name: tonka-by-jeremy-scott
detail: Kokeshi. Definition: Traditional Japanese Doll. Wooden of the 19th century  originally from northern Japan and delivering a message. Tonka is an ode to strength.

name: peach
detail: Do I dare to eat a peach? Sure  let it drip all over. That’s the great pleasure of juicy ripeness. And the scent: heavenly! And perfectly captured  juicy and fresh  but still light and invigorating.

name: harrods-ruby-naga
detail: Made in collaboration with Harrods  Ruby Naga is a tribute to the luxury and sophistication of the Knightsbridge store. The scent is inspired by the divine serpent creatures known for their incredible strength and outstanding beauty. They reside in magnificent jeweled palaces and serve as protectors and guardians of treasure.

name: new-blue-1
detail: With New Blue  the scent of departure is in the air. New opportunities are on the horizon. Immerse yourself in an exciting new world with this dynamic  strong and deep fragrance.

name: raspberry-oud
detail: This perfume was designed for someone who loves adventure  loves details  is optimistic  designed for someone who does not know the impossible.

name: pomelo-riviera
detail: Overlooking the jewelled azure sea  sits a beautiful villa and a secluded garden. An abundance of citrus trees laden with fruits and fragrant flowers creates a vivid portrait of a paradise found. A gentle sea breeze brings refreshment and a crystalline scent  tinged with salt  sun and the promise of memorable moments.

name: wonderland-peony
detail: We don't like to play favourites  but we love peonies. And this sweet floral is full of them. Sophisticated  but not bland.

name: jimmy-choo-rose-passion-1
detail: Rose Passion is a joyous ode to the vivacious allure of the free-spirited modern woman living and loving life on her own terms.

name: cardamom-moss
detail: The passing hours of a day at a shoreline in summer start before sunrise  crisp and subdued. Gradually as it grows warmer   we slip into a swirl of spices. The cool to the warm. Like sand-covered toes  a scent you can sink yourself into.

name: oud-vanille
detail: Oud Vanillé is acombination of two key ingredients  two accords that echo one another  united by some of their facets: oud wood  with its woody  animal notes and its evocative power  and vanillin  with its powdery  sweet  olfactory and highly addictive notes.

name: lime-di-sicilia-sicilian-lime-1
detail: Rich aromatic lime wood  combined with flowers and oils from the scented lime tree. A classic Sicilian scent: Lime di Sicilia is fresh and young yet complex  suitable for men and women.

name: porsche-design-pure
detail: Both in life and with his fragrance  the Porsche Design man attaches great importance to purism and exclusivity  design and innovation. Porsche Design Pure combines pared-down  functional design with a timeless fragrance creation made from innovative ingredients. An eau de toilette that in its entirety represents masculine purism and exclusivity.

name: laundry-1
detail: Feminine  contemporary  free-spirited. Laundry by Shelli Segal  creating glamorous appeal with timeless style - effortlessly chic.

name: musc-imperial
detail: Emotions and places are sometimes inseparable. The evening approaches. Revived by the powerful rays of the sun and the Mediterranean breeze  the city comes to life. The encounter must take place at the top. Excitement is inevitable. The party will be epic.

name: sunflowers-honeydaze
detail: Designed to evoke happy memories  HoneyDaze tickles the senses with a joyful blend that captures the radiant essence of sun-filled days.

name: what-about-me
detail: The inspiration for the very intimate and powerful fragrance What About Me? is neither the past nor the future  but rather the one thing that truly matters: your own life right now  the preciousness of the moment  and the awareness of transience.

name: osmanthus-7
detail: End summer dusks  birds at flight  shortening days when Osmanthus blooms.

name: burberry-baby-burberry-baby-touch
detail: Burberry Baby is a soft and delicate fragrance created especially for babies. The fragrance is soft and soothing  with a delightful blend of fresh floral scents.

name: iris-de-gris-1
detail: "The realisation of a childhood dream: to create a new vegetable facet. Working with vegetables means going back to the origin of perfumery and  indeed  of oneself. I love the raw greenness of the peas in Iris de Gris " Quentin Bisch  Perfumer.

name: 5th-avenue-nyc-vibe-2020-1
detail: Inspired by the sophistication and energy that defines New York City. Fresh and bright with a pulsating bohemian chic.

name: tomorrow-1
detail: Romance at dusk . A whispered dream that embraces you with warmth and sensuality.

name: boss-bottled-night-1
detail: The Boss man is primed to succeed - competitive  driven and ambitious. His daily preparation rituals are integral to his personal quest for success and Boss Bottled has become an established part of his daily armour. Boss Bottled Night is destined to become the secret weapon in the Boss man's armoury of seduction  instilling him with the same compelling presence that underpins his success by the day.

name: mandarine-cardamom-1
detail: The pleasant  tangy aroma of exotic accords is harmoniously combined to create an energetically inspiring composition.

name: orange-bergamot-eau-de-toilette
detail: A courtyard of orange trees in dappled shade. Lively citrus airs dancing the flamenco at dawn. Azure blue skies above. Awaken your spirits with our modern classic  plucked from the naranja grove.

name: boszporusz
detail: Boszporusz captures the flavor of Marmara Sea both with sea notes spiced with spices. Flowery notes add the final touch to this fresh and sparkling fragrance. Inhale and enjoy this wonderful scent.

name: tabac-rose-1
detail: Tabac Rose is a dense and powerful elixir that pays homage to the most famous of all flowers used in perfumery. Tabac Rose is a fragrance that expresses textures  highlighting the oriental and mysterious sensuality represented in layers of pink  purple and plum tones. Opulent and addictive  the sweet voluptuousness is prolonged by deep  mystical base notes.

name: violetta-nobile-1
detail: Violetta Nobile is the symbol of spring. A fresh and light fragrance with a prevailing floral note that lingers on the skin for a long time.

name: vetyver-bergamot-1
detail: This relaxing fragrance was inspired by the freshness and purity after a rain shower in the Asian tropics  from where the earthy sweet grass vetiver has its origin. Intertwined with refreshing bergamot  it reflects the awe-inspiring power and beauty of Mother Nature  which harmonizes body and spirit.

name: beeswax
detail: The intoxicating aroma of wax  honey and flower pollen is an irresistible call to the good life.

name: wild-herbs-and-tonka-bean-eau-fraiche
detail: A sophisticated scent for the elegant man who appreciates the finer things in life.

name: lavande-1
detail: All the spirit of Provence in bright  invigorating notes of lavender.

name: bvlgari-pour-homme-eau-de-parfum
detail: Bvlgari pour Homme Eau de Parfum is a harmonious and refined fragrance embodying the perfect balance between the great outdoors and home comfort.

name: pink-grapefruit-2
detail: Add a little zing to your life with this refreshing and bright eau de toilette.

name: abscond
detail: Reveal your masculinity  strength  and the courage hidden deep inside you with Abscond. A fragrance brimming with masculinity.

name: pink-lemonade
detail: Demeter's Pink Lemonade Pick-Me-Up cologne spray captures perfectly that lemony burst of crispness and coolness whenever and wherever you crave it.

name: alchemists-iris-1
detail: Bring luxury wherever you go with Alchemists Iris. Get ready to smell delicate with this masterpiece by Natalie Cetto.

name: coffee-break-golden-green
detail: Available exclusively online  this intriguing scent is part of the Coffee Break collection: a unique tribute to the ancient coffee trade. Golden Green centres on the purity of un-roasted raw green coffee beans  for a truly energising aroma.

name: patchouli-de-minuit-2019
detail: Patchouli de Minuit is subtle  yet intense with surprising nuances. Simply stunning.

name: arsene-lupin-voyou
detail: Created by perfumer Jean-Paul Guerlain who no doubt identifies with Arsène Lupin  a great seducer of women  but also a man of the shadows  like perfumers for the most part are or prefer to be.

name: fleur-de-peony
detail: “I have always loved peonies. These beautiful flowers add a celebratory touch to any occasion. We used the pale pink peony on my wedding day for both the ceremony and magical dinner. The flower holds many special memories for me that I will never forget.” Aerin Lauder.

name: violette-in-love-1
detail: Violette in Love is a fresh  modern and shimmering fragrance. A beautiful interpretation of violets.

name: fiery-pink-pepper-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: The imposing peaks of Piton de La Fournaise stand proud as a fiery frame. A kick of effervescent spices pepper the searing hot air. Leather redolent osmanthus blooms boldly accent vivid fuchsia facades. Escape to a land of soul-stirring vistas.

name: vetiver-5
detail: "For me  being a perfumer is like being a cook or a painter. Taking ingredients and making your own recipe  your own creation. I was about 16 years old when I first smelled vetiver  and it has been one of my favourite raw materials ever since " Caroline Sabas  perfumer.

name: moon-sigh-1
detail: The body tingles. The eyes  wide open. We enter a dreamlike world of fleeting shadows while mellow sounds caress our senses. This is a fragrance that makes you wanter on the rim between illusion and reality. Moon Sigh is like a flood of emotions exhaled as a deep sigh into the night sky. Solemn and beautifully melancholic like the full moon at night.

name: vanille-galante-1
detail: "An invitation to rediscover another vanilla  unusual  complex and paradoxical  like a fragile plant after a long winter  waiting to bloom again  all the more unexpectedly. The fragrance of a strange flower  light as a trade wind  floating under our nostrils with hints of spices  cognac and smoky wood  somewhere between petals and cigars  leather and cocoa". Jean-Claude Ellena  perfumer.

name: rose-infernale
detail: Exhilarating  pure  sensual and self-confident  Rose Infernale is both elegant and bewitching. This futuristic  incandescent and Oriental floral blend is smoky  captivating and voluptuously piquant  exuding the luxury of cashmere and the appeal of bronze shimmered crimson.

name: yuzu-man
detail: Yuzu Man is an ode to the emblematic citrus fruit from Japan  enhancing its fresh and sparkling notes. A true invitation to travel.

name: moonlight-patchouli
detail: An ode to patchouli  an iconic ingredient in the world of fragrances. An exceptional perfume created between light and shadow. A moment of mystery  a shared perfume created to echo the poetic vision of the moon illuminating the night with its halo.

name: fiery-pink-pepper-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A humid dusk on the descent of Cirque de Salazie. Jewelled birds of paradise flaunt across warm air. The scent of crushed sweet spices drift over colourful rooftops. Entice curiosity with aromatic adventure.

name: escentric-01-1
detail: "I wanted to create something unconventional  not too perfumistic  something for my friends who said they didn't like fragrances " Geza Schoen  perfumer.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Pink Pepper', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Lime', 'Aldehyde', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lentisk', 'Muscone (Musk)']

name: sugar-plum-1
detail: "While visions of sugar plums danced in their heads"  de Clement Clark Moore  "A Visit from St. Nicholas"  también conocida como "Twas the Night Before Christmas" (1823).

name: imperial-jasmine
detail: A majestic English garden where the south-facing stone wall is clothed in a blanket of delicate white jasmine. Bathed in shimmering moonlight  they mysteriously release their sweet scent into the cool summer air. They are carefully gathered in the evening as their petals burst with intoxicating aroma to create one of Yardley's most distinctive and powerful fragrances.

name: iris-rose
detail: Iris Rose expresses the very essence of E.Coudray  exclusively and with absolute femininity. The key to entering this precious  sweet and tender world of luxurious fantasy and delight is the infinite delicacy with which is dedicated to beauty since 1822.

name: sel-de-vetiver
detail: Sel de Vétiver expresses the spontaneity  changeability  and softness of nature that is both unexpected and fresh. In the same way as a poem written by Baudelaire  this fragrance evokes “wet suns”  the mysteries of nature  rare flowers emitting luxurious scents.

name: black-orchid-eau-de-parfum
detail: A luxurious and sensual fragrance  Black Orchid  with its rich dark accords and seductive potion of black orchids and spices  is both modern and timeless.

name: fresh-citrus-and-vetiver-eau-fraiche
detail: An energising  unforgettable scent for the confident man.

name: rosabotanica-1
detail: Rosabotanica by Balenciaga is a symphony of scents  fresh and bright  with a spicy and luminous character. It is a decidedly modern  feminine and sexy fragrance  designed to be worn like a second skin. The Rosabotanica woman exudes a natural radiance  an aura that captures the attention and captivates those around her.

name: cedar-grapefruit-1
detail: An invigorating scent to refresh the body and the soul.

name: yuzu-marmalade-1
detail: Our travels to the Republic of South Korea exposed us to this traditional Korean treat. The gift of a homemade batch inspired us to make this fragrance.

name: ambergris
detail: True ambergris is a whale by-product and currently worth over $5 000 per pound. Our Ambergris is synthetic  but still maintains much of that animalistic musk  so unique to the original. Warm  earthy and spicy.

name: tabarome-millesime
detail: With the essence of success in every drop  Tabarome Millésime is a fragrance for men who aspire to be leaders. In the aristocratic British tradition of fine brandy and high quality cigars  this blend is an avant-garde take on a classic favourite. The name Tabarome honours the hint of the finest tobacco aroma that gives this fragrance its English club luxury.

name: oud-nejma-4
detail: The fourth daughter of Nejma  Four offers all the freshness of an opening that is both floral and fruity. Its heart is a gentle symphony of fragrant flowers that stretch slowly out with a more woody base notes that gravitate majestically around the Oud.

name: embruns-dylang-2021
detail: "This fragrance trail transports you to the sumptuous beaches of the Comoro Islands  combining luminous  spicy-floral ylang-ylang and a salty  iodine-tinged facet that makes you dream of elsewhere " Thierry Wasser  Perfumer.

name: vetiverve
detail: An exciting fragrance  a lively symphony where all the notes blend harmoniously.

name: oud-imperial-extrait-1
detail: Experience Oud Imperial in its purest form. Subtle touches differentiate the extrait from its eau de parfum and bring forth an unmatched intensity and depth  making the original scent richer  more opulent and utterly captivating.

name: la-violette
detail: For some  it’s the soothing smell of the candies that their grandmother used to give them when they were children. For others  it’s a sweet  gentle flower. For Camille Goutal  it’s also the name of her grandfather’s home in Aveyron and the smell of his candy shop. A childhood memory that  enhanced with a touch of rose  reveals an elegant  delicious violet.

name: patchouli-absolu
detail: The ultimate modern patchouli: a hypnotic depth with facets of dark mystery.Tom Ford reinvents one of his most beloved perfumery ingredients  patchouli  in a visionary fragrance of alluring depth.

name: gardenia-cardamom
detail: The sweet scent of freshly-cut white flowers inspired our perfumer to create this elegant bouquet. The perfect balance of both beauty and warmth.

name: signature-generation-for-him-1
detail: Celebrate the special bond between father and child with Signature Generation for Him  the scent to inspire the next generation.

name: divine-oud-1
detail: The rich golden light of the setting sun filters through the brocade curtains  illuminating the palazzo's secret room. It is filled with hidden treasures  precious artifacts and curiosities from the world over. Among these riches  a sextet of dark flasks bearing a golden monogram.

name: note-de-yuzu
detail: A collaboration between Maison Kitsuné and Heeley Pafums - an eclectic mix of electronic pop  fashion and a multi-cultural blend of English  French and Japanese notes - resulting in an irresistible  unisex scent.

name: velvet-amber-sun-1
detail: Celebrating the rich Arabic heritage of Sicily  the potent amber accord of this scent is illuminated with a striking blend of gold-hued ingredients. This modern interpretation of the precious amber accord is a tribute to Oriental perfumery.

name: iris-fetiche-1
detail: A fragrance as chic and radiant as the Avon woman  this handcrafted creation was crafted with feminine intuition. A unique narrative that balances emotions of joy  eloquence and spontaneity  Iris Fétiche inspires new world femininity with its exceptional floral richness.

name: booze-baccy-by-ricki-hall
detail: "I was thinking about what men were like when I was a kid  strong blokes who didn’t apologise for being masculine. I wanted to bring that back: the smell of being an adult in the 70s and 80s  booze  cigarettes  leather  aftershave  pub. It’s a bit of time travel ” Ricki Hall.

name: armand-basi-in-red-blooming-passion-1
detail: A carnal scent with the same exuberant sensuality as a red flower that has just bloomed. A super lingering fragrance for young women that cannot be forgotten.

name: luminous-violet-1
detail: The thrill of a sunset over the sea  somewhere between memory and desire  in a sunny fragrance with unmistakable sweetness.

name: bien-etre-eau-de-lavande-sauvage
detail: Bien-être invites you to discover all the benefits of its Wild Lavender Eau de Cologne with its invigorating and floral freshness.

name: eclat-de-rose
detail: Éclat de Rose boasts the Moroccan Rose Centifolia: the delicate flowers are hand-picked during the early hours of the morning and then rapidly processed. Velvety rose accords are complemented by notes in the  signature that reveals elegant facets.

name: roses-de-chloe
detail: Roses by Chloé is an invitation to tenderness. The rose immediately gives off an incredible freshness and the juice  in a tender pink tone  expresses itself delicately.

name: voodoo-flowers
detail: Lord knows  I'm a Voodoo Child. Voodoo Flowers draws its power from the blue rock of the late 60's and early 70's and catapults them into the hear and now. This fragrance is strong in character  leaving a distinctive impression  and demands to be worn just as confidently.

name: leau-kenzo-florale-1
detail: A scent bursting with colours  for a floral encounter with the skin.

name: rare-flowers-night-orchid-1
detail: Let yourself be enchanted by this luxurious and opulent perfume. Like a rare flower  you are precious.

name: light-blue-summer-vibes-pour-homme-2023
detail: Light Blue Summer Vibes pour Homme captures the fresh energy of Italian holidays through an invigorating blend of Mediterranean citrus and woody notes.

name: ambre-et-vanille-vanille-cannelle-1
detail: A delicious menu to be savoured on the skin  rich in fragrant surprises  from the chilled cocktail to the scorching desert. Feminine  sophisticated and sparkling... an infinite delicate world dedicated to beauty.

name: cutie-pear
detail: A light  elegant and sophisticated scent  Cutie Pear combines notes of fruit  tea and milk in a contemporary tribute to sweet family ties and precious feelings of togetherness.

name: idylle-eau-de-toilette
detail: In this combination of chypre sensuality and the intimate facet of white musks with a bouquet of flowers  symbolising a declaration of love  Thierry Wasser expresses the sensual and romantic idea of idyll.

name: aoud-violet-1
detail: Aoud Violet is a fresh and timelessly elegant scent.

name: musc-imperial-1
detail: Musc Imperial has been designed for a certain state of mind  or a great occasion.

name: mandarino-di-amalfi
detail: Mandarino Di Amalfi captures the calm idyll of the whitewashed villas dotting the cliff sides of Amalfi. Citrus fruits waft their aroma with a tonic-like effect  and the evening comes in with a warm breeze of night-blooming flowers.
ingredients: ['Mandarin', 'Vetiver', 'Jasmine', 'Bergamot', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon', 'Neroli', 'Orange', 'Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Civet', 'Musk', 'Basil', 'Coriander', 'Orange Blossom', 'Petitgrain', 'Clary Sage', 'Shiso Leaves', 'Tarragon', 'Black Pepper', 'Spearmint', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Jasmine (Sambac)']

name: vetiver-13
detail: This plant from the Orient  cultivated especially in India where they weave the roots into aromatic mats  which when walked over  perfume the area has a dry  woody  fresh and fresh scent which has been a classic men's fragrance for decades.

name: leau-kenzo-boisee
detail: L'Eau Kenzo Boisée is a scent full of colours for a woody encounter with the skin.

name: shining-moon
detail: A perfume that captures a moment  an emotion  an image  all wrapped by the light of a shining moon.

name: al-waseem-1
detail: Al Waseem is an intriguing and complex blend of fragrance notes  which will keep them guessing about the man beneath the scent.
ingredients: ['Cedarwood', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Cumin', 'Hyacinth', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Pepper']

name: paradis-nuit
detail: Open a door  follow the light and let yourself be guided through the night. An invitation to sensual  reassuring skin-to-skin contact.

name: scoosh-code
detail: Scoosh Code is a unique masculine fragrance for natural-born leaders with a dynamic and captivating personality.

name: gotas-de-color-entre-lineas-2023
detail: In 2023  Agatha Ruiz de la Prada surprises us again with a limited edition of its freshest perfume: Gotas de Color  inspired by some of her runway looks: optimistic and striking designs  full of colours and striped prints. This scent invites you to enter the particular and daring universe of Agatha Ruiz de la Prada  and to see the world with different eyes  between coloured lines. Positive energy  optimism and vitality characterise the top notes of this fragrance  with hints of lemon  blood orange and apple. A floral heart with notes of orange blossom  freesia and ginger give this fragrance delicacy  sweetness and femininity. Between the lines we discover woody notes of sandalwood and cedar  combined with moss and mix that provide intensity and persistence to the fragrance.

name: sunrise-vetiver-men
detail: A concentration reminiscent of the colour of the sun reflected in water in its thousand and one variations. A fresh fragrance with elevated accents creates a shock wave.

name: rum-tonic
detail: Rum Tonic is synthesised with natural citrus notes of fresh lime to uplift the mood and offer overall well-being. Modern and dynamic  Rum Tonic works on its own or as half of a couple  creating a unique sensory experience tailored specifically to an individual or a couple.

name: tonka-musk-1
detail: A warm  enveloping and sensual fragrance  Tonka Musk was born from an intriguing and unexpected blend  like love. It arrives when you least expect it.

name: sun-ripened-raspberry
detail: Reminiscent of a sweet  sunny day spent berry picking.

name: oud-nejma-3
detail: The third daughter of Nejma. Three is a melody that is composed around floral accords  combining the floral notes with a woody note giving it a richer more modern structure. Three expresses all the exuberance of the orient without ever compromising it.

name: vanille-fatale-1
detail: Vanille Fatale is a force of nature personified. A seductive tempest that grips you like a rush of blood to the head. The impossible becomes real  too good to be true  her - or his - relentless control fixed  refined but raw  polished but primal.
ingredients: ['Vanilla (Madagascar)', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Mahogany', 'Barley', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Coffee', 'Frangipani', 'Hyacinth', 'Jasmine', 'Leather', 'Myrrh', 'Narcissus', 'Oakmoss', 'Rose', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Bergamot', 'Coriander', 'Mandarin', 'Musk', 'Papaya', 'Pink Pepper', 'Saffron', 'Suede', 'Leaves']

name: amber-iris-1
detail: An amber wrapped in powdery notes; dark yet soft. A powerplay of ingredients  a scent of juxtapositions.

name: pure-pastel-peach-1
detail: Blossoming bouquets  juicy fruits  joie de vivre and fun: that's why we love summer. Betty Barclay pure pastel peach exudes this joy and has an irresistible fruity peach scent  complemented by generous floral notes.

name: mandarine-baies-roses
detail: Lively  spontaneous and elegant  Mandarine & Baies Roses is imbued with a joyful playfulness that is as mischievous as it is delicate.

name: rosamunda-1
detail: Laboratorio Olfattivo has taken up the challenge of dealing with one of the noblest flowers of the kingdom of nature: the rose. Revealing a hidden facet of its aroma  reshaping the contours of its petals  bringing to light a new aspect  without ever betraying its legendary scent  especially to the fans of the rose to make it different from all those already used in perfumery. This was the creative effort that kept the perfumer busy for two years and that that led to the creation of the first pink Laboratorio Olfattivo: Rosamunda.

name: mellifera-1
detail: It evokes an imaginary beehive.

name: zegna-acqua-di-bergamotto-1
detail: Contemplating the most beautiful Mother Nature has to offer during the first buds of spring  Zegna's Acqua di Bergamotto evokes the scent of the sea breeze and the lush flora of Italy's southern coast. - Trudi Loren

name: blue-santal-1
detail: Comme des Garçons' Blue Santal is a fusion of iced  cooling Australian sandalwood accompanied with warm pine notes and sharp juniper berries. The result is a cool blue invasion; unexpected and artfully blended to reveal refreshingly warm layers.

name: creation-e-eau-de-parfum-pour-homme-enigma-1
detail: “The mystery of the name drove me to create a fragrance that seems to be all things to all people  but itself is certain and assured  whilst creating ambiguity in others.” – Roja Dove

name: cedro-di-taormina
detail: Earth and fire  air and water. A harmonious fragrance where the clear essence of cedarwood  warm and intense  blends with the deep strength of the volcanic rock. A generous scent which liberates the vivid power of a landscape where all elements are mixed together.

name: imperio
detail: Imperio takes you into the Mediterranean and on a journey throughout Sardegna  off the coast of Italy  with fresh marine breezes.

name: 1902-citron-caviar
detail: A sparkling cologne with citrus top notes dominated by fresh lemon. The fragrance then settles into a delicate bouquet sublimated by orange blossom. The trail is reassuring thanks to a base of precious woods.

name: montabaco-verano
detail: Montabaco Verano captures the essence of Latin America with tobacco and leather accords. A dash of citruses brings a touch of vitality and adds spring to your step.
ingredients: ['Tobacco Leaf', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Grapefruit', 'Magnolia', 'Ambergris', 'Bergamot', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Sandalwood', 'Cardamom', 'Juniper Berries', 'Orange Blossom', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Clary Sage', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Moss', 'Rose', 'Suede', 'Tonka Bean', 'Violet', 'Tea']

name: gentleman-suave
detail: The distinguished man stands silently on the quayside  gazing out to sea. His naturally stately bearing and refined elegance are a true testament to Yardley's contemporary fragrance.

name: 3-neroli-iris-white-musk
detail: 3 Neroli Iris White Musk stands out for its elegance  sensuality and intense notes while dressing the female skin. It also establisheses itself as an attractive male scent which is comfortable and elegant for men who wear a unisex perfume that is close to perfection.

name: queen-of-ylang
detail: Queen of Ylang was inspired by Indonesia  which has been named “paradise on earth”. The sensual orchids that grow have a scent that is the fragrance of queens.

name: neroli-intense
detail: Néroli Intense shows Patricia's passion for the orange flower. She heavily uses the note by mastering the different olfactory properties of its essence and its absolute.

name: super-gorgeous
detail: "Female confidence comes in so many incredible forms. We created Super Gorgeous! to celebrate the strong  fearless women that inspire me every day " Michael Kors.
ingredients: ['Sandalwood (New Caledonia)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Cedarwood (Atlas)', 'Myrrh', 'Amber', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Orange Blossom', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Tonka Bean', 'Tuberose', 'Ylang-ylang']

name: ambre-gris-2
detail: Ambre Gris is an opulent fragrance with a sensual trail which will make heads turn.

name: vetiver-2014-carven
detail: Vétiver carries in its genes a timeless modernity that has allowed it to cross the decades without showing its age. The vivacious fragrance  perfectly balanced and subtly woody  was the first in a long series of eponymous fragrances  none of which has been equalled.

name: musc-25
detail: Why LA you ask? Because genderless angels have to be tempted into the smell of life. Musc 25 is angelic and so intensely luminous that you will need to wear shades to approach it. Yet  its core is sombre and devilishly dark  with animalic notes that are sensual  sexual and decadent. Enjoy the ride of LA 25  oops  we meant Musc 25.

name: rosa-nobile-1
detail: Passionate  gentle  full of love  tenderness. Joyful and dreamy. An inner wealth of feelings that women can appreciate in their favourite flower. The rose has always epitomised by a femininity that strives to unveil itself. The flower encloses a gentle yet strong sensibility; the poetics of emotions.

name: voyage-italian-summer-fig
detail: Discover The Body Shop's fragrance from the Voyage Collection  Italian Summer Fig Eau De Toilette. Close your eyes and let yourself be carried away on a trip to the sunny coast of Puglia in Italy  where the smell of fresh figs fills the air.

name: quelques-fleurs-loriginal-extrait
detail: This perfume is a recreation of the original  created by the perfumer Bienaime in 1912  Quelques Fleurs was the first true multi-floral bouquet ever created. More than 250 different raw materials and over 15 000 flowers are needed to create a single ounce of Parfum.
ingredients: ['Ylang-ylang', 'Carnation', 'Jasmine', 'Lemon', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Orange Blossom', 'Tonka Bean', 'Tuberose', 'Violet', 'Broom', 'Iris / Orris', 'Clove', 'Bergamot', 'Cedarwood', 'Civet', 'Galbanum', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Sandalwood', 'Tarragon']

name: musc-pallida-essence-de-parfum-1
detail: Like a second skin  the sensation of an unguent  the musks enhance the iris  bringing it suppleness. The very quintessence of a balm  a magic spell of liquid gold to embroider with the fingertips  it escapes into the fullness of the evening.

name: heal-your-mind-1
detail: With its aquatic notes  Heal Your Mind transports you to a universe of tranquillity and spirituality. Addictive and ambivalent  this multi-faceted scent provides an escape with an addictive character.

name: dorsay-inspire
detail: The exclusive aroma of leadership. An elegant woody fragrance with exclusive raw material  providing elegance and masculinity.

name: choco-violette-1
detail: This fragrance is a sweet mix of fruity assortments touched by a soft hint of violet and chocolate.

name: grapefruit-lime
detail: This hero fragrance is as popular for its history as it is for its rejuvenating aromatherapy properties of sweet grapefruit  lime and basil.

name: erotic-me-6
detail: “I insisted that we keep it really free and strong in the combination of ingredients. I love that it's a really radical proposition. Erotic Me includes notes of milk and leather ” Julien Dossena.

name: santal-blanc
detail: Legend has it that the fragrance of white sandalwood can restore the sense of sight to the blind. White sandalwood  the most precious of the sandalwood family  grows in India. Its roots probe the furthest layers of the earth's wholesomeness in order to drink the sap which nourishes it. It is this essential essence that gives white sandalwood its unrivalled fragrance.

name: wild-flower-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Just like a wildflower that seeks its own way to grow in places that others  and perhaps even itself  would never have imagined possible  the Betty Barclay Wild Flower fragrance inspires its wearers to go their own way with confidence  to stay true to themselves and to surpass their own selves in their everyday lives: curious  courageous and inspiring.

name: amber-aoud-crystal-parfum-1
detail: “I fell in love with the perfumes of the Middle East when I was working there: the way the Aouds are worn and then sublimated by the scent of Bakhoor. The greatest compliment I ever receive is when my Middle Eastern clients ask  ‘How do you know our smell?' ” Roja Dove.

name: eau-de-cologne-lavande
detail: Eau de Cologne Lavande is an invigorating fragrance that provides a wonderful sensation of freshness  well-being and vitality. A simple  elegant and distinguished glass bottle.

name: lightfalls-1
detail: Dousing us in a waterfall of light and colour  Lightfalls is like the sun itself  pulsing and glowing with energy.

name: lemonade-pink-pepper
detail: Uncap the smell-good sauce with this juicy fragrance. Bright notes of lemonade and pink pepper will leave you feeling refreshed.

name: rose-muscade
detail: A dream made of curling amber vapors. Starting with spicy nutmeg from Indonesia  this sensual fragrance reveals the powerful and precious scents of Damascena rose. A warm wake of incandescence with a subtle  elegant roundness.

name: par-amour-pour-lui
detail: An anthem of love for a man. The warm virility of Andalusian leather  the honey scents of blond Tobacco leaves  the vibrant colours of oriental spices  the eternal nobility of precious woods  the masculine reassurance of amber scent  the sensuality of Tonka Bean and Musk…For a fragrance characterised by an original olfactory writing and strong hints of masculinity.

name: white-iris-n11
detail: White Iris Nº11 is a sensual and bewitching fragrance for contemporary women.

name: orchid-vanilla
detail: Orchid Vanilla serenades the queen of gourmand blooms  the orchid  whose creamy yellow blossoms protect the precious treasure of the vanilla plant.

name: bitter-end-1
detail: A fragrance inspired by the west of Ireland  a beautiful barren place of isolation. The sharp impact of its nonconforming beauty demands those who experience it to stop and consider. A unique approach to freshness.

name: merry-cookie
detail: A bake sale perfect for Christmas!

name: 301-santal-ambre-cardamome-2
detail: Enjoy the sensual and fresh notes of 301 Ambre Cardamome Santal. A unique and elegant fragrance suitable for men and women.

name: april-violets
detail: Violet  a spring flower  has been known for centuries and is commonly found in the wild woodland and comprises 400-500 species. Parma violet  at the very heart of Yardley London's April Violet fragrance collection  has a sweet  delicate smell which is often described as “flirty” because the fragrance seems to come and go.

name: libre
detail: Free represents the freedom to live it all to excess. Your limitless creativity  your complete emancipation  your constantly evolving femininity. The fragrance of a strong  bold and free woman who experiences her freedom at its most empowering.

name: rose-oud-4
detail: Rose Oud by Kilian is an invitation to discover the olfactory charms of the Middle East. A mysterious fragrance  rich and opulent  yet comfortably familiar. As always now  unexpected accords become Kilian's signature.

name: daisy-love-paradise-1
detail: Capturing the free-spirited allure of a sunset walk through a field of blooming flowers in a phenomenal landscape  Daisy Love Paradise is an addictive blend of delicate and sophisticated accords.

name: chronometer-1
detail: Chronometer - Elegance of a fragrance that combines freshness and refinement.

name: 4711-jasmine-eau-de-cologne-1
detail: The full floral scent of white jasmine gives its wearer a graceful charisma and emphasises her feminine style.

name: jasmin-kusamono-1
detail: Inspired by the Japanese floral compositions from which it takes its name  and echoing Giorgio Armani's love of simple Asian aesthetics  Jasmin Kusamono is a transparent  airy fragrance that highlights one or more natural elements and elevates them to new heights.

name: coffee-man-duo-1
detail: The Coffee Duo Man combines the unique strength of coffee aroma with cream liquor  with the freshness of spices with the warmth of the amber to awaken the senses.
ingredients: ['Coffee', 'Pink Pepper', 'Vanilla', 'Lavender', 'Bergamot', 'Mandarin', 'Tangerine Cilantro Iced Accord', 'Amber', 'Apricot', 'Benzoin', 'Cedarwood', 'Iris / Orris', 'Magnolia', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Rhubarb', 'Sandalwood', 'Tonka Bean']

name: sicilian-mandarin
detail: "Mandarin is the most complex citrus with an almost juicy floralcy. I wanted to showcase the natural mandarin and counterbalance it with modern musks and captive molecules." Pierre Negrin  Perfumer

name: molecule-01-patchouli-1
detail: "Patchouli is unique. It's natural. Unlike 99% of perfume ingredients  we associate it with a specific era  the sixties and seventies  and that bohemian spirit. It has a woody  fresh and distant air. I love it for its moody beauty " Geza Schoen  perfumer.

name: amber-ambre
detail: When the sun slowly sets on the shores of the Mediterranean  rockroses fill the air with their delicate amber and balsamic scent. These shrubs give off a resin with an intense amber scent  which gives strength and sensuality to the fragrances they compose and which are distilled by the perfumers of Grasse

name: pure-oil-of-sandalwood
detail: Pure Oil of Sandalwood is as distinctive as it is divine  adding a bold and woody personality to the fragrance composition.

name: new-york-patchouli
detail: It's a trusted aphrodisiac and chi-balancer. It captivated Napoleon and Belle Epoque fashionistas. And now comes Bond No. 9's updated  21st century New York Patchouli  all set to spice up the art of urban seduction.

name: rose-anonyme-1
detail: She turned the dial until the safe opened  revealing the diamond. She had stolen jewels before  but none compared with this one. She left a single rose and the scent of her perfume in its place for him to find. In a moment she'd be halfway around the world and he would be in pursuit. The chase began again.

name: infusion-de-vetiver
detail: "In Les Infusions de Prada there is a luxury that is rare these days. At first they seem very simple  as if you were tattooing water with an ingredient  but in reality it is a very complex formula. Just as water must be at a certain temperature to create the perfect tea  the base composition allows the beauty of a flower  a wood or a fruit to be revealed in a brilliant and sensitive way." - Daniela Andrier  Perfumer

name: boccioli-di-limone
detail: A sparkling yet powerful fragrance  exalting the freshness and juiciness of lemon. A floral touch in the heart adds a unique facet to this lovely fragrance.

name: bacche-di-tuscia
detail: Bacche di Tuscia evokes a land full of memories and inspiration.

name: harmonie-essentielle-1
detail: An airy neroli note filled with sunny citrus and delicate white flowers evokes the scent of summer holiday relaxation.

name: valentina-eau-de-parfum
detail: With a sensual and insolent beauty  this unabashed femininity eludes convention. Two master perfumers created a fragrance as a tribute to the Valentino woman of today. With attitude  sophistication and unexpected characteristics  the Valentina bouquet blends an irreverent Italian floral oriental in which every facet reveals a paradox.

name: cardamom-oud
detail: Smoke is combined with warmth to create a paradoxical fragrance  friendly and mysterious.

name: good-fortune-elixir-intense
detail: Good Fortune Elixir Intense is the ultimate spell to embrace your own destiny. A more captivating interpretation of the original eau de parfum. This is an addictive and sensual perfume for women.

name: lextase-rose-absolue
detail: Like the breath of a burning petal  the glimmer of gold on the skin  L'Extase Rose Absolue is the beating heart of a rose  a sensual trace  nocturnal magic.

name: biografia-caminhos-masculino
detail: A timeless and sophisticated fragrance for those who write their own story.

name: mandarin-1
detail: mandarine contains all the energy and positivity of sunshine. The fragrance radiates all the vivacity of this cheerful fruit  releasing its joyful aroma made up of sparkling green nuances  explosive fruity punctuations and soft floral hints.

name: for-her-santal-musc
detail: "Santal Musc was intended to be a totally unique fragrance. Very magnetic and intriguing. I wanted to capture beauty and desire in a scent that both men and women could covet " Narciso Rodriguez.

name: ser-al-khulood-gold
detail: Ser Al Khulood Gold is perfect for those who want to make a bold and lasting impression.

name: 1918-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A smell of old times. A proper old school. And a proper strength. That's 1918: a strong  spicy fragrance for strong characters. However  with great power comes great responsibility  so use it only for good (the original name of this Eau de Toilette was Cosa Nostra).

name: eau-boisee-orientale
detail: A unique  intense yet subtle fragrance. Woody and oriental notes for a unique and exotic aromatic experience.

name: eau-sucree-salee
detail: Attention  addiction is in sight! Crafted as a delicious cocktail  this gourmet vanilla fragrance enhanced by unexpected fleur de sel is for lovers of sunny scents and sweet/savoury blends. Soft  regressive vanilla crystallises on contact with delicate sea salt flower. A fragrance for both women and men.

name: mandarin-lemon-cedar-1
detail: Our unique chain of experts since 1959  have chosen essential oils of Mandarin  Lemon and Cedar for this eau de toilette with its energising benefits. This fragrant  energising composition  a combination of invigorating citrus fruit peel  lemon-lime and mandarin  enhanced by aromatic and woody accords of cedar  is a real vitamin boost.

name: nu-leather
detail: Leather  the first garment to be worn by humans since the dawn of time. Since then  this "second skin" has never ceased to fascinate us completely. Leather jackets  trousers  gloves and accessories will forever remain the most precious objects of our desire.

name: spicebomb-extreme-1
detail: An explosive concentration of masculine sensuality. Surprisingly  at the first breath  addictive from the next second Spice Bomb finds the perfect balance between power and elegance  intensity  and sophistication. Driven by a single characteristic olfactory signature  it leaves a trail of new energy and style behind. Powerful  daring  and sensual.

name: paco-1
detail: The essence of minimalism in a light  fresh scent for both men and women.

name: nina-rose
detail: Is it any coincidence if Edith Piaf sang that she saw life as being rose? This flower  with its pink colour  as a symbol of both romanticism and daring  has always played a part with Nina Ricci. Nina Rose makes for condensed optimism. The world of Nina Rose is at once tender and sparkling while being tinged with irreverence. It tells of an impertinent  vibrant femininity. Cool couture.

name: horizon
detail: Strong  accomplished  his attitude to life is to make it an adventure. To see new sights  feel new sensations  to live life more intensely. Elegant explorer of modern times  he's effortlessly handsome with tousled hair  a soft cotton shirt  well-worn boots. Nothing's going to stop him.

name: paloma-picasso-mon-parfum-1
detail: A bewitching  harmonious fragrance where the top notes are a blend of bright crisp citrus notes and rich green freshness. It then blooms the heart with fragrant classic florals  complemented by exotic spices. Its drydown notes are warmed by rich woody notes.

name: ck-one
detail: Cool. Clean. Refreshing. ck One is the original “shared” fragrance that inspires the confidence to be yourself and encourages you to connect with others. The brand belongs to everyone. ck One is an accessible  universal and easy scent.

name: obsession-1
detail: “I wanted to evoke the sensuality and ardor of an impassioned woman. A woman who allows herself to experience a romantic obsession and invites a man to do the same ”  Calvin Klein.

name: floriental-1
detail: Floriental is a disrupted floral fragrance that challenges the traditions of perfumery to reimagine a flower that has no scent.  A creative collision that blurs the lines between the floral and the oriental to create something completely new.

name: eau-de-yuzu
detail: Eau de Yuzu is a wonderful stroll through sophisticated Japanese gardens. A woody accord with a base that retains the volatility of citrus notes for a fresh and strong trail.

name: luminous-orchid-1
detail: In the Victorian era  giving exotic and rare flowers was a sign of love and affection. The rarer the flower  the deeper was your love. The fuchsia orchid is the symbol of opulence and love. Innocent as it may seem  its bewitching character surrounds the notes that make up this scent.

name: lemon-island-1
detail: Find your inner tranquillity with this refreshing cologne. Lemon Island will lift your spirits every day.

name: myrrhe-eglantine
detail: From the most improbable of encounters between a red resin and a small wild rose bursts love at first sight. In an irresistible attraction of opposites  powerful myrrh  in former times more precious than gold  mingles with a spicy and mysterious rose hip.

name: plum-tobacco-blossom-tonca-bean
detail: A luxurious scent with a sensual trail.
ingredients: ['Plum', 'Tobacco Blossom', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Notes', 'Dried Fruits', 'Spicy Notes', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Cocoa', 'Vanilla']

name: amber-empire-1
detail: It all started with a Chinese tobacco box  an exquisite object of Asian Art Deco art that sparked Atikinson's imagination. Amber Empire became one of the first oriental fragrances introduced to the Western world in 1927.

name: ocean-oud-1
detail: A fable born from the antagonism between Oud wood and seawater. They don't mix but are the model of coexistence. Over the strength and protection of the Oud  the traveller's soul floats like amber over the elemental liquid of the ocean in order to adapt itself and steer a good course through life's unexpected events.

name: fabulous-yuzu
detail: Rich and lively  greedy and tangy  woody and fruity. A journey inspired by the Empire of the Rising Sun that combines poetry and frenzy.

name: oliban
detail: Olibanum is a celebration of the purity of olibanum incense. It is a personal obsession of Keiko's and she wanted to convey its true magnetic sensuality  so she combined it with ambergris and rose powder to reveal its deep intensity.

name: grapefruit
detail: Abundant grapefruit groves on the Spanish coast. Rosemary  peppermint and capsicum add the perfect spice to the bright  sunny nature of grapefruit. Invigorating and refreshing.

name: aquavibe-frozen-lavanda
detail: Feel the maximum of freshness with the frosty tropical  citrus  and floral notes for you to feel amazing at any time of the day or night.

name: coffee-woman-paradiso-1
detail: Coffee Woman Paradiso  an innovative and modern fragrance that will transport you to paradise.

name: leau-kenzo-sunlight-pour-homme-2023
detail: An eau full of joy  colours and life.

name: amber-oud-tobacco-edition-1
detail: Haramain Amber Oud Tobacco Edition comes with a great scent and the perfection of a well-balanced perfume that will cater to all the needs of the user who wants more than what the ordinary user needs with life.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Amber', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Cocoa', 'Clove', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Star Anise', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Woody Notes', 'Cinnamon', 'Dried Fruits', 'Ginger', 'Black Pepper', 'Tobacco Accord']

name: black-suit
detail: A warm atmosphere  the expression of materials with a strong feeling  Black Suit is the embodiment of a dark obsession  a signature that can only seduce; a perfumery of prestige in full sublimation.

name: amber-pour-homme-intense
detail: A captivating fragrance for men. Amber Pour Homme Intense revives essential elegance. Prada has opened an intense chapter in its amber olfactory family  with a hypnotic and uncompromising fixation for fans of this heritage accord.

name: pink-pepper-grapefruit-1
detail: Pink Pepper & Grapefruit is a mood-enhancing composition comparable to a tropical expedition through the jungle of Brazil. A surprising scent experience that infuses with new energy and vibrancy.

name: nativa-spa-baunilha-real-1
detail: Nativa Spa Baunilha Real fragrance is powerful and sophisticated  able to connect us with our own royalty and awaken confidence and empowerment.

name: playboy-make-the-cover-for-her
detail: A tribute to freedom  liberation  positivity  equality and inclusive love!

name: habit-rouge-extrait
detail: Habit Rouge L'Extrait is a fragrance with a multifaceted voluptuousness and a devilishly fiery spicy heart. Its base  revealing notes of vanilla and patchouli  as well as notes of leather  is doubly stimulating.

name: elie-saab-le-parfum-bridal
detail: The signature scent of a moment steeped in emotion. Le Parfum Bridal is a luminous fragrance as pure and captivating as a bridal gown.

name: the-icon-eau-de-parfum
detail: Success is an attitude  it doesn't come alone. To achieve it requires a balance between intensity and duration  which is also true of Icon Eau de Parfum.

name: vanilla-sex
detail: Vanilla Sex is the epitome of sensual pleasure. Vanilla  one of the most sought-after ingredients in modern perfumery assumes a role that is anything but ordinary and far from innocent. A masterstroke in olfactive contrasts. An irresistible revelation. Vanilla Sex is maximalist vanilla in its purest form.

name: rose-load
detail: Self-love uplifts everyone  because if we can't love ourselves  we can't love at all. In this spirit comes Rose Load  a fragrance infused with deep admiration and self-sensuality. With so many societal norms around beauty  gender and identity  how do we relearn to love ourselves after centuries of being told it's wrong?

name: jasmine-sambac-marigold-cologne-intense
detail: Serene fields of jasmine. Buds plucked at dawn. Glowing vibrant marigold  entwined with rich resins...

name: osmanthus-4
detail: British springs can be fickle  but every year comes the day when nature announces the end of winter. Blue spring skies appear that can't fail to lift our spirits. Everything is simplified. Osmanthus is a joyful  uncomplicated fragrance that blends Japanese Osmanthus absolute with fresh flowers and golden citrus notes  on a bed of sweet Egyptian herbs. It's an experience as intense and fresh as a delightfully crisp spring day.

name: cherish-avon-1
detail: Cherish is a bright and beautiful blend with a diffusive  long-lasting trail that is truly unforgettable.

name: nightfall-patchouli
detail:
A fusion of fantasy and reality  this contrasting duality is reflected in the sweet yet bitter cinnamon. Benzoin resin adds a mystical Arabian touch  while sweet Indonesian herbal patchouli completes the composition.
On the line between fantasy and reality  nightfall is a time when anything can happen. Nightfall Patchouli is powerful  yet delicate. A unique composition  inspired by the magic and mystery of the night  it draws on the imaginary to conceive a world of infinite possibilities.

name: solid-black
detail: Solid Black will help you reveal the masculinity  strength and courage that lies deep within you. This fragrance exudes masculine power and will perfectly enhance your character.

name: orange-butterflies
detail: "Orange Butterflies is the story of two things I love  the South of France and the beautiful notes of Orange Blossom " Jo Malone.

name: ambergris-1
detail: Warm  earthy and spicy. True Ambergris is a whale by-product and currently over $5 000/pound. Our Ambergris is synthetic  but still maintains much of that animalistic musk  so unique to the original.

name: spiderman-marvel
detail: A  modern classic  for the modern man  a hero in every sense.

name: rose-ebene
detail: "I created an irresistible contrast between the fresh  delicate note of rose and the full-bodied  slightly smoky smell of black coffee " Jean Jacques  Caron's in-House Perfumer.

name: cherry-blossom-millesime-2021-1
detail: The exceptional piece  Cherry Blossom Millésime 2021 (2466 pieces worldwide)  is adorned with floral paper finery embellished with crystal and glass beads and golden metal composed by Lucie Touré. A French artist  a material and textile designer  Lucie Touré sublimates paper and associates it with clothing ennobling techniques.

name: colonia-para-meninos-homem-aranha-1
detail: Spider-Man Cologne is a fragrance with an electrifying combination of aromatic herbs and velvety musk for adventuring with friends of the young  or young at heart.

name: rise-10
detail: Rise is a summer-inspired fragrance  one informed by those unforgettable summer nights drinking piña coladas on faraway beaches  or exploring the city in search of new experiences and sensations. Perfect for whenever you’re in need of a winter pick-me-up.

name: quasar-drop-xy
detail: Quasar Drop XY brings an extra dose of freshness combined with the strength of woody notes and spices. Its remarkable freshness is ideal for everyday use.

name: oro-1920-1
detail: A firm and deep fragrance  partly dark and yet magnetic. An olfactory fantasy in which elegant nuances are interwoven.

name: essence-n-10-amande-tonka
detail: Two soft  delicious and desirable notes  united by a common point: the irresistible addictiveness and almondiness they awaken.

name: berlin-dream-1
detail: Berlin Dream is a fragrance that captivates you in the multicultural city. This fragrance is a quick stroll through Berlin. It flies through the different districts that are as different as their olfactory facets.

name: fleur-de-portofino-1
detail: Fleur de Portofino by Tom Ford evokes the perfect image of a citrus grove drenched by coastal ocean rains. The heart of the fragrance is a flirtatious New World floral sensation that beats in the heart of Italy.
ingredients: ['Lilac', 'Orange Blossom', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Acacia', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Cassia', 'Jasmine', 'Magnolia', 'Mandarin', 'Tangerine', 'Rose (Morocco)', 'Violet Leaves', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Civet', 'Honey', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Vanilla']

name: vetiver-extraordinaire-1
detail: The essence of an extraordinarily charming man. One who is magnetic without even seeming to try. Every gesture is infused with a sense of humour and sophistication. Not a rugged  shouting masculinity  but an irresistible whisper.

name: velvet-haze-1
detail: Velvet Haze is that dazed state that transports us to artificial paradises  that fiery moment when eternity seems at last recaptured. The opulence of this fragrance embarks us on a psychedelic whirlwind reminiscent of the hypnotic beauty of a bonfire.

name: replica-lazy-sunday-morning-1
detail: Recollection of silky skin  crumpled linen sheets and the reassuring scent of fresh laundry. With Lazy Sunday Morning  time stands still  leaving only memories and sensations.
ingredients: ['Orange Blossom', 'Aldehyde', 'Musk', 'Iris / Orris', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Pear', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: tam-dao
detail: Tam Dao evokes the scents of forests and temples  the slumber of tropical mists and the mountain air of Tonkin  the northern province of Indochina. The mountains of Tonkin tremble under the heavy footsteps of elephants transporting precious wood from vineyard to vineyard.

name: neroli-36
detail: Neroli is another name for the essence of orange blossom. The unique quality of our Neroli is its sunny floral character with an extraordinarily warm  sensual base. Rose  musk  mandarin orange (slightly aldehydic)  jasmine and vanilla  among other essences  complete the portrait  bringing Neroli 36 spikiness  ease  zest and heat…Well-being  elegance and charm all in a bottle !

name: oud-ispahan
detail: Sophisticated charm and a traveller's soul influence the powerful character and accents of Oud Ispahan. It is an uncompromising fragrance that highlights its woody strength with the spicy and resolute character of Damask rose.

name: bois-dhiver
detail: An iron fist in a velvet glove  Bois D'Hiver is a powerful woody fragrance rounded into a powdery and musky heart. Exquisitely wavering between strength and softness  this perfume symbolises the creation "à la Parisienne" of a great woody ambery heart that blends smoothly into a powdery musky signature. The contrasted version of a great and dynamic urban woody fragrance.

name: smoked-vetiver-1
detail: "This fragrance embodies the moment of standing at the edge of a rainforest waterfall  watching the water beat down hundreds of feet into volcanic rock. The scent released at the moment captures the mineral notes of the rocks and the watery infused atmosphere  all at one spectacular moment in time " Claude Dir  Perfumer.

name: hwyl-1
detail: ʻMy inspiration for Hwyl Eau de Parfum was sparked by walking amongst the remarkable 300-year-old Hiba trees in an ancient Japanese forest and experiencing the country's lush temple moss gardens ' Mr Fillion said. Hwyl recaptures the feeling of solitude and refuge in nature  and stimulates the olfactory senses with an eclectic array of potent botanical extracts.'

name: english-oak-hazelnut
detail: The magic of the forest. Climb. Dream. Drift. Wander through emerald moss carpets. Succumb to the scent of the fabled oak. Noble. Wise. English Oak & Hazelnut. Earthy. Enticing. Enchanting.

name: rose-splendide-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: The garden is completely transformed  metamorphosing overnight into a stunning show of nature. Thousands of delightful young roses peak through the mist  their soft  downy green petals sparkling with dew. Rose Splendide is a celebration of this special moment.

name: myrrhe-bois-brules
detail: The comfort and warmth of a chimney fire  the icy freshness of snow through the window  the delicious sweet scent of cakes just out of the oven and steaming black tea. This is the atmosphere of the founder Mariela's winter salon. This place dear to the creator of Carlotha Ray inspired the fragrance Myrrhe & Bois Brûlés. A woody gourmet floral which blows hot and cold and awakens the senses.

name: 103-fleur-de-tiare-jasmin-hibiscus-1
detail: Sunny escapade on the beach with your cocktail in hand.

name: lauder-for-men
detail: Elegant  sophisticated  exhilarating. First introduced in 1985  this clean  very masculine scent transcends time and place. The fragrance is bursting with the freshness and clarity of crisp citrus and brisk herbs. Floral accents and a rich woody complex lend depth and warmth.

name: individuel-tonic-2
detail: Warm  seductive  woody  and timeless. An unforgettable modern classic.

name: turn-1-eau-de-toilette-2
detail: Turn 1 expresses the stamina and determination of powering through the race  taking the first high octane turn  experiencing the force of the engine and feeling the emotional tension.

name: vanille-cuir
detail: Vanille Cuir is a soft  long-lasting fragrance that can be described as a symphony in four movements on the theme of vanilla.

name: tonka-sahara
detail: A noble and intoxicating fragrance.

name: patchouli-aromatique
detail: Enriched with the opulence of patchouli and the warm  earthy notes of vetiver  Patchouli Aromatique is a striking and warm fragrance. This enchanting offering from the Parisian perfumers is presented in a captivating glass and gold bottle that will take pride of place in your collection.

name: oud-nejma-6-1
detail: The sixth daughter of Nejma. Six is tinged with an almost summer freshness and a base that is fruity and nuanced with a touch of spice. Its exhilarating heart with woody and smoky softness  supported by a delicately woody base highlighted by the effects of musks.

name: straight-to-heaven-splash-of-lemon
detail: Straight to Heaven-Splash of Lemon brings a contemporary freshness to the original creation with an overdose of nutmeg.

name: davana-vanille-bourbon
detail: Davana & Vanille Bourbon is sweet  syrupy and multi-faceted. Warm woody notes are counterbalanced by rich balsamic  spicy and gourmand accents that bring an almost tobacco-like character  and a rich floral heart softens the luxuriously sugary tones.

name: aimez-moi-comme-je-suis
detail: With Aimez-Moi Comme Je Suis  Caron has designed a signature fragrance for a man who embraces himself as he is: free and liberated. An invitation to stand out and reveal the different facets of the man who wears it.

name: sugarful-dream-1
detail: Believe in dreams. Believe in love. Sugarful Dream.

name: nutmeg-ginger
detail: The first Jo Malone fragrance was created as a gift for the original 20 facial clients. The warm  woody scents are seasoned with nutmeg and vibrant spices in this unexpected combination of ingredients.
ingredients: ['Ginger', 'Nutmeg', 'Sandalwood', 'Cedarwood', 'Vetiver', 'Amber', 'Elemi', 'Lemon', 'Litsea Cubeba', 'Neroli', 'Orange', 'Petitgrain', 'Cinnamon', 'Lavender', 'Leather', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Clary Sage', 'Violet', 'Pine Needles']

name: colors-man-black-4
detail: In a world full of labels  prejudices and borders  we want to celebrate that we are different. We want to demonstrate that color is not something that can be written on the skin. It is a state of mind  a feeling  a mixture of cultures and ideas  a revolution initiated by those who desire change and believe that a world full of colors is a better world.

name: 105-bon-parfumeur-x-ymc-2020-1
detail: Discover an exclusive modern and creative rose perfume. Our Bon Parfumeur x YMC is a spicy rose perfume  mysterious and addictive.

name: peach-me-1
detail: A peach blossom between lightness and sensuality. Peach Me is Adopt's fragrance that symbolises softness and stylish elegance.

name: spiritueuse-double-vanille
detail: Spiritueuse Double Vanille  a perfume of light: the gold of vanilla and all its splendor. A carnal and aphrodisiac scent to be used without moderation.

name: ps-jusqua-toi
detail: Everyone's placing bets on our love acts. Everything starts with you and from now on we'll defy everything together. So we ride through the night  you terrifically vetiver  and I  slightly patchouli.

name: lavande-noire
detail: Treat yourself to a soothing  refreshing moment in the heart of the lavender fields with Lavande Noire.

name: un-jardin-sur-le-toit
detail: A perfumer's establishment is nowhere and everywhere. So one day I found what I thought was a remote garden. I went there several times. My footsteps triggered a burst of the smell of lush grass  of damp earth announcing that the garden was delighted for me to enter. It is a garden of pleasure  like us  who sing and love life... it is truly Parisian. Then I sprinkled it with a little light". - J.-C. E.

name: dynamic-move-blue
detail: The Dynamic Move Blue man is a doer! He takes matters into his own hands and looks to the future. Progress instead of standstill. He goes through life dynamically and is sure of himself. Lively  invigorating  sensual.

name: light-blue-italian-love-2022
detail: Dolce & Gabbana captures the essence of profound passion and summer intensity with Light Blue Italian Love.

name: utopia-vanilla-coco-21-1
detail: A warm  sensual and solar fragrance that will instantly transport you to the destination of your dreams  spray by spray.

name: bergamotto-1
detail: A fragrance that expresses the boundless exuberance of Capri  allowing you to experience its colours  lights and atmosphere as in a waking dream.

name: ylang-ylang-2
detail: The fragrance is in the same spirit than the fashion of Franck Boclet. The values are simplicity  elegance  passion  parfum d'exception as well as modernity.

name: island-vanilla
detail: Island Vanilla lives up to its name. This sophisticated fragrance is influenced by the exotic island of Tahiti. And that's why it smells wonderfully creamy and rich.

name: osmanthus-5
detail: The flower of the Rising Sun! The blooms of osmanthus  also known as sweet olive  exude sweet  fruity  leathery notes. Molinard's Osmanthus is a sensuously carnal creation brimming with insouciance and freedom.

name: il-capriccio-del-maestro
detail: A perfume created to reflect Puccini's private life: lazy and brilliant  neurotic  arrogant and shy  goliardic and primitive. He loved to be with his friends and  at the same time  he felt the need for solitude. That was Giacomo Puccini.
ingredients: ['Benzoin', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Rum', 'Coumarin (Tonka Bean note)', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Cinnamon', 'Orchid', 'Spicy Notes', 'Honey', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Tobacco Leaf']

name: ambre-2
detail: In the same way that a perfumer creates a fragrance  the task of the whisky blender is to combine a series of malt and grain whiskies in such a way that the resulting drink is more than the sum of its parts. Ambré was inspired by the authentic blending of whisky  giving rise to the first oriental note of its kind.

name: jasmin-17-1
detail: This natural Jasmine is the floral perfume par excellence and was created as a modern alternative to the old-fashioned traditional floral signatures. Its short formula gives it such a distinctive character that once you wear it  you'll never forget it. A unique floral impact whose sensuality and femininity are amplified by a majestically harmonious chord of musk  sandalwood  and vanilla. We refuse all responsibility for any havoc this perfume might create in your circle of male friends.

name: bergamote-boisee-1
brand: Au Pays de la Fleur d’Oranger
detail: Effervescent citrus notes are laced with laced with the sweetness of gourmand notes and surrounded by white flowers until you wander deeper into the woods. An aromatic composition for men and women.

name: loved-up-feel-good
detail: Ready to get emotional? Welcome to Loved Up Feel Good  a sensational fragrance designed to enhance your mood and fuel your feelings.

name: violette-fumee
detail: With the creation of Violette Fumée  Mona composed the melody of my favourite passions  memories and materials. With flirty floral notes  exquisite softness in the heart combined with deep resinous nuances  this warmly smoky scent evokes my sensory love of luxury and makes me feel  dream  travel and remember.

name: pomelo
detail: Pomelo envelops you with sparkling  fresh notes - a juice saturated with sun and zesty with summer fruits.

name: incense-oud-2
detail: Incense  a mystical perfume whose smoke was said to be one of the links between mortals and the gods  is combined with oud  giving rise to a mysterious and warm  yet astonishingly modern fragrance. With the creation of Incense Oud from the Arabian Nights collection  Kilian invites us once again to discover the olfactory charms of the Middle East.

name: hilfiger-woman-peach-blossom-1
detail: This feminine and sensual perfume is the new flanker to the last year's Hilfiger Woman perfume. Even though Tommy Hilfiger is popular for its casual and cosmopolitan style  his perfumes are always exquisite and sensual – which give an impression of elegance and grace.

name: forum-lavanda
detail: Forum Lavender is a fresh  modern fragrance designed for naturally elegant women.

name: benjoin-19
detail: Benjoin 19 is about a moment. A moment described in Tolstoy's timeless novel Anna Karenina  when Anna meets Count Vronsky at a Moscow railway station. Benjoin 19 is that moment. The moment when everything changes  when nothing will ever be the same again. A universal tribute to passionate spirits.

name: unica
detail: A sensual scent with fresh vibrations and surprising combinations for a floraliscious trail.

name: jasmine-od-1
detail: The natural scent of jasmine on a warm summer night is an ephemeral and fleeting scent. The aim here was to try to capture and enhance its intensity and longevity without altering its natural beauty. Intense  intoxicating and terribly beautiful.

name: habit-rouge-sport
detail: Its unique energy revitalises its fragrance heritage and updates the legend of sensual elegance  which it interprets with all the audacity of youth. This stimulant for the senses promises victory for one of the most irrepressible aspirations of man: seduction.

name: darley-1
detail: Darley is a rich masculine scent  full of interesting and unexpected notes.

name: acqua-di-gio-parfum
detail: Acqua di Giò Parfum is an olfactory escape into exhilarating sensations and experiences  exploring man’s intertwined relationship with nature. A charismatic  vibrant fragrance with an aura of mystery  emblematic of a rugged landscape meeting the ocean’s strength and immensity.

name: silence-the-sea
detail: The marine element of Silence the Sea makes you feel like you are diving underwater and moving among green algae. At times it smells placid and then turns earthy  and I've often imagined myself underwater  touching the plants  visualising marine life and the smell of dampness and dirt washed away with a salty cleanse. It sounds a bit odd  but it's an unusual and wonderful scent.

name: west-indian-limes-1
detail: Ever since Christopher Columbus discovered the West Indies  people have delighted in the exotic plants and fruits found there. Truefitt's first citrus fragrances were formulated in the 1870s and soon became a favourite of Queen Victoria. Bouquet Imperial  specially blended for Queen Victoria by Truefitts perfumers in 1876 to celebrate her coronation as Empress of India  was in fact a floral fougere from which the current West Indian Limes fragrance evolved.

name: fleurs-doranger-3
detail: A perfume as simple as its name: Fleurs d'Oranger... orange blossoms. An intoxicating and intoxicating fragrance born of fresh white flowers  flowers that sing with the scent of happiness... The blossom of the orange tree... the blossom of a tree  a whispering breeze  the kiss of a baby. And now  also  a sorceress. Pure happiness  on the skin and in the air.

name: bien-etre-eau-de-cologne-fraiche-verveine-romarin
detail: An inviting Eau de Cologne that promotes the benefits of well-being.

name: cest-paris-1
detail: An intuitive and mischievous personality. His fragrance sets the rules of the game. Ready to take up the challenge?

name: camp-nou-9
detail:
Citius  Altius  Fortius. The values of sport  competitiveness and family  why Barça is more than just a club. Champions League nights  league matches in a unique and special place where there are plays that can give you goosebumps. They all have in common the point of inspiration for this perfume  which is the smell of wet  freshly cut grass. A powerful grassy accord represents the spirit of this perfume which is complemented by a note of fine leather  like that of the bench seats and of course the leathery smell of the ball.
Green vegetal notes softened by fruity notes of green apple and peach combined with a fresh water chord create the scent of grass cut and watered before the start of the match and is combined with the velvety delicacy of a fine leather chord  very masculine which increases the character and quality of the perfume.

name: white-4
detail: A sweet and magical fragrance created for special occasions.

name: fresh-citrus-and-vetiver-eau-de-parfum
detail: A sophisticated scent for the refined gentleman.

name: cool
detail: A bracing fragrance  perfect for opening the senses and making an impression.

name: cuirelle-1
detail: Strength and texture. Not the essence of leather  but an interpretation of it. Feline sublimation with hints of gourmand notes balanced with greens and woody accents.

name: n-7-navy-rum
detail: A dry  uncompromising fragrance  exhaling citrus notes and aromas of rum  retro lavender and woody vetiver. A bouquet of delicate florals mingle with masculine accords of leather  juicy citrus and warm musk. Navy Rum portrays a modern dandy that smells like the gallantry of yesteryear. A fragrance of disarming and exclusive freshness.

name: les-brumes-1
detail: Les Brumes is the memory of a morning in a citrus field. It captures the moment when the morning mist descends on the citrus trees and the surrounding woods.

name: eau-du-ventoux
detail: Eau du Ventoux is an invigorating fragrance for men who favour natural and exceptional fragrances.

name: tobacco-vanille-1
detail: From the boardroom to a day in the park  sitting by the lake  turning your back on the madness of the world around you  this fragrance is a modern take on an old-world boys' club.

name: soul-of-amber
detail: A dazzling fragrance with tantalisingly luxurious notes inspired by gala evenings.

name: mon-vetiver-by-bruno-jovanovic
detail: Charismatic and elegant - but also surprising - this composition revolves around the natural essence of Haitian vetiver.

name: frescor-tukuma
detail: Discover Frescor Ekos Tukumã with its refreshing  enveloping notes of 100% natural Tukumã extract and Cumaru  ingredients from Amazonian biodiversity  for a joyful  versatile fragrance like an Amazonian sunset.

name: bulgarian-rose
detail: The softest  gentlest rose scent imaginable. Delightfully authentic and precious.

name: jasmine-15
detail: Enjoy the floral freshness and feminine sensuality of Jasmine. It is a tempting and exciting fragrance  while being classic and refined. Spellbinding and fragrant.

name: coffee-man-seduction-1
detail: Words that seduce  glances that excite. Coffee Man Seduction has been created for intense and naturally seductive men. Awaken your senses and live unique experiences.

name: cedro-di-diamante
detail: Cedro di Diamante pays tribute to the citrus essence by capturing the warmth of the sun rays  while accentuating the natural characteristics of the citrus with hints of cedar.

name: vivanel-grapefruit-vetiver-1
detail: Vivian Gray Vivanel Grapefruit & Vetiver is a deluge of amazing freshness that will energise you for hours.

name: la-yuqawam-orchid-prairie
detail: La Yuqawam Orchid Prairie is a romantic and sensuous modern oriental perfume for the contemporary woman.

name: jasmine-yuzu-1
detail: A light  refreshing scent for summer.

name: oud-nejma-7-1
detail: The seventh daughter of Nejma  Seven has a dynamic head consisting of a mixture of sparkling citrus fruits and the neroli flower by greedy notes of cacao and coconut. While white musk  patchouli and precious woods leave a mesmerising trail.

name: mandarin-carnival
detail: Sicily has the power to enchant you with its colours. Its deep blue sea and sky  fields of green  and rainbows of rich and aromatic flowers. It's like being present at a costumed ball  bringing to mind the aura and mystique of exotic lands.

name: palais-bourbon
detail: A fragrance of contrast and cooperation  Palais Bourbon appeals with a unanimous show of hands: those that gladly hold the bottle and apply the fragrance.

name: venetian-bergamot
detail: Venetian Bergamot is Tom Ford's singular interpretation of the ingredient known as the "prince of citrus." With Venetian Bergamot  the sun-drenched citrus from Italy's south is transported to the northern city of grand palazzi  remarkable canals  and the famous confluence of trade. Rich florals  precious woods  and warm spices anchor bergamot's fresh elegance and underscore it with the intriguing sensuality of Venice.

name: chess-black
detail: An elegant signature for the mysterious man. Chess Black opens with the sparkling notes further enticed by an aromatic heart. The signature is a rich and mysterious blend  ultimately giving  the fragrance a unique character  a long lasting personality.

name: amazonian-rose
detail: The journey that Amazonian Rose proposes has a very specific destination: Hacienda La Vega  the impressive residence of the Herrera family in the heart of Caracas  a refined paradise that for decades hosted the most elegant salons of Venezuelan society. The garden of La Vega was the true jewel of the house. In this garden stood an imposing specimen  Brownea grandiceps  a tree known as the Rose of Venezuela despite not formally belonging to the botanical family of roses. The reason is its spectacular flowers  grouped in large clusters to form a true spectacle of nature. “It is a unique and magical botanical species that represents the beauty of Venezuela and Latin America. And for our family  it’s a kind of metaphor for my own mother  whom we affectionately call Rosa de Venezuela ” explains Carolina A. Herrera  Creative Director. “Creating this fragrance based on this memory is  therefore  a tribute to her  as brave  vibrant  and full of surprises as the Rosa de Venezuela.”
