ingredients: ['Rose Damascena', 'Cardamom', 'Mate', 'Woody Ambery Note', 'Copal', 'Mandarin', 'Exotic Fruits', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Passion Fruit', 'Sandalwood']

name: strawberry-2021-1
detail: A reimagined interpretation of the common garden strawberry: deconstructed and unexpected  it reveals a memorable and genderless aroma.

name: 1-agua-vetiver-1
detail: In the summer  this Portuguese region bakes under an unrelenting sun. Lyn experienced a rare moment when passing clouds and a distant ocean breeze brought change to the parched air.

name: malbec
detail: No matter how high you set your goals  nothing can stop you  and Malbec will give you the resolve you need.

name: flora-notis-fresh-peony-scent
detail: Fresh peonies wrapped in happiness. The opening petals creating a freshness with a sense of life that captivates every moment. A sense of euphoria with feminine sensibility.

name: vetiver-iris
detail: The passion for opposites is staged through the alliance of vetiver and iris roots to remain still and always under the spell.

name: libre-eau-de-parfum-collector-edition-2023
detail: Discover the Libre Collector's Edition dressed for the holiday season with clashes of gold. A statement feminine scent for those who live by their own rules

name: cestrebelle
detail: C'est.Rebelle is the scent of eternal youth. Feeling unconscious  fearless  and free  being curious and willing to discover and explore new paths  breaking the rules.

name: rose-goldea-blossom-delight-1
detail: Rose Goldea Blossom Delight represents a girl on the edge of womanhood  at the start point of achieving her dreams. This fresh and radiant fragrance embodies these hopeful and passionate sentiments.

name: golden-osmanthus
detail: Golden splendour  You make the world light up.

name: kerose
detail: A juvenile Rose radiating with grace  freshly sunbathed and invigorated by the occasional bath of sweet musks. First  one finds it far too modest  this beauty who dares to indulge itself with spice. It is for better reaching another’s heart while seemingly not touching it.

name: club-de-nuit-private-key-to-my-life
detail: A mysterious scent everyone will admire.
ingredients: ['Patchouli', 'Plum', 'Magnolia', 'Melon', 'Pear', 'Pineapple', 'Bergamot', 'Grapefruit', 'Lemon', 'Lime', 'Mandarin', 'Orange', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tangerine', 'Black Pepper', 'Amber', 'Freesia', 'Jasmine', 'Leather', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Rose', 'Woody Notes']

name: cedarise-1
detail: Cedarise Eau de Parfum is an ode to its emblematic namesake tree in all its facets. The complexity and richness of nature are expressed through pure notes.

name: melograno
detail: Melograno tells an enchanting story  inspired by 800 years of tradition  and waiting to become your story. A journey through the senses that evokes the rare sensations of magical Persia  a hymn to fertility and abundance.

name: orson
detail: He is an intense and independent spirit  daring  ambitious  free. He inspires my creativity and listens to me without judging me because he knows me so well. He is my second home.

name: cherry-blossom-millesime-2022-1
detail: Of all the rituals of the Land of the Rising Sun  this is the most poetic. Each spring  the Japanese gather to admire the beauty of cherry blossoms. Guerlain celebrates this annual tradition with an exceptional limited and numbered edition of Cherry Blossom in its iconic Bee Bottle. For the 2022 edition  Guerlain has asked the embroidery studio Kyoko Création to create the delicate floral adornment of its flacon  crafted by a community of Japanese embroiderers.

name: fantasia-rose
detail: Fantasia Rose is inspired by the queen of flowers  the rose. Frolic in a fragrant field where the roses are ever-blooming and bright. Discover the dreamscape filled with sunshine like rose gold glitter  and fall in love with this enchanting fragrance!

name: 102-ginger-lime-1
detail: Olfactive facet 102 energises with its sparkling and complex composition. The citrusy top is coupled with spicy undertones  residing in a warm and delicate creamy base to create subtlely and perfect balance.

name: black-cedarwood-juniper
detail: City rain. The park at dawn  saturated with dew. Clean  revitalizing. A light shower  falling gently infusing the air with petal-washed scent. An afternoon cloudburst  drenching gardens exuberant with summer blooms. As dusk descends into night… the downpour.

name: musk-deer-1
detail: Musk Deer evokes the animal desire of a lusty musk deer amidst the seductive chill of a winter forest  all captured without a hint of menace.

name: nativa-spa-ginseng-cafeina
detail: A passionate and engaging scent that mixes fresh and spicy notes and invites you to a moment of self-care.

name: rose-31-1
detail: Roses for men! The perfume's aim is clear: to transform the famous Grasse Rose  a symbol of voluptuousness and unqualified femininity in perfume  into an assertively virile fragrance for men. The result is a model of its kind: alternating feminine/masculine with the disturbing ambiguity of the Centifolia rose.

name: the-icon-1
detail: An elegant blend of citrus and exquisite spices at the start of The Icon magnifying the masculinity of the heart in this fragrance. A savvy combination of seductive woods and warm notes  dressed in powerful facets  increases the personality and character to show the most bright and luminous facets.

name: highness-vi
detail: Highness VI (Blue) is persistent  loud and attracts attention without compromise. Let’s have unforgettable moments together!

name: a-reason-to-love-1
detail: A Reason To Love is the perfect fragrance for autumn. A fragrance imbued with sensuality and warmth.

name: jasmin-noir-1
detail: The precious jasmine  white and immaculate  in its noir interpretation a flower of the imagination.

name: framboise-noire
detail: The richness of red berries with a dark heart of desolate black forest. Darkly noir. A heart-stopping thriller. Go deep into the night.

name: magnifying-myrrh
detail: "I wanted to create a unique  unexpected myrrh for Bvlgari to match its extraordinary legend. A sumptuous balm  luminous yet mysterious " Jacques Cavallier-Belletrud  Perfumer.

name: violette-volynka-1
detail: "I opted for Volynka leather top notes. Its scent is so strong that I wanted to pull it in the opposite direction by pairing it with a delicate flower: violets ” Christine Nagel  Hermès Perfumer.

name: vince-camuto-brilliante-2020
detail: A sweetly seductive white floral fragrance  Vince Camuto Brilliante brings a sparkling and refreshing profile to the iconic Vince Camuto fragrance collection. This limited edition fragrance exudes optimism  confidence and individuality.

name: bois-diris-2
detail: I am inspired by the Tuscan hills. I am a fragrance of exception  my richness and my olfactory truth is the consequence of my very high concentration in natural iris roots. I am the result of a complex know-how that requires patience. My sillage is all the more unique and takes on powdery and sensual facets. I am Bois d’Iris.

name: soul-of-oud-1
detail: "I was dreaming of the Utopian fable of the power of the soul and imagined wild Oud wood and how powerful and seductive it can really be. Legendary fable. The myth of seduction. Chimera and reality. The quintessence of Oud!" Ramón Monegal  Olfactive Director.

name: this-is-him-vibes-of-freedom-1
detail: Vibes of Freedom is an invitation to get away. To cast off. A breath of fresh air that fills you with energy and lets your mind sail free. Press pause. The vibrations of the city give way to those of nature. Because the Zadig & Voltaire man can do without the city  but he cannot do without its vibrations.

name: 1902-verveine-yuzu-1
detail: "A concentrate of freshness subtly enhanced by invigorating verbena"  Corinne Cachen  Perfumer.

name: orchidea-reale-1
detail: The orchid is a gentle  mysterious and fascinating flower. We wanted to create a rich perfume  persistent  original  and sensual.

name: atman-xaman-1
detail: A timeless and enveloping fragrance for the sensual and refined man.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Vanilla', 'Spicy Notes', 'Tonka Bean', 'Mate', 'Patchouli', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Vetiver', 'Everlasting Flower', 'Ambergris', 'Citruses', 'Floral Notes', 'Leather', 'Musk', 'Tangerine', 'Woody Notes']

name: wild-herbs-and-tonka-bean-eau-de-parfum
detail: A sophisticated scent for the elegant man who appreciates the finer things in life.

name: the-brun
detail: Jean-Charles Brosseau's only desire is to show a unique elegance. His only premise is that elegance resides in charm  and according to him  this charm is in the air.
ingredients: ['Leaves', 'Cinnamon', 'Lavender', 'Lapsang Souchong', 'Cardamom', 'Bergamot', 'Cumin', 'Melon', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Pineapple', 'Amber', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Orange Blossom', 'Powdery Notes', 'Sandalwood', 'Vanilla', 'Vetiver', 'Violet']

name: blood-lime
detail: A citrus hybrid  Blood Lime produces a balanced scent of Blood Orange and Lime. While it looks like a regular lime outside  the flesh is red  like a blood orange. The Blood Lime was created to thrive in high salt environments  but at Demeter  we love it because it is an incredibly full-flavoured cross of two of our favorite citrus scents.

name: ginger-piccante-1
detail: "The fantasy of ginger flower from Asia. Beautifully enhanced to perfection  it exudes an exquisite and singular fragrance  a blend of fresh and candied ginger and rose " Thierry Wasser  Perfumer.

name: harrods-oud-patchouli
detail: For its latest Harrods exclusive  Bond No. 9 re-visits that Eastern world mainstay  oud  doubling up on its intense exoticism by pairing it with equally sensual patchouli. Result? Harrods Oud Patchouli—thinking outside the perfume box.

name: ireland
detail: The broad range of topography  and the different related smells that can be found throughout Ireland  provides an almost endless opportunity for iconic scents. We simply chose the ones closest to our heart - warm  soft  green and watery  clean and fresh. Think of an unspoiled meadow with a river running through it.

name: rose-peche-de-vigne
detail: Fruity and floral  this fragrance creation reveals the soft notes of a rose bouquet with the crisp and juicy facets of vine peaches. An enveloping scent.

name: invictus-intense
detail: Heroic new heights. A challenge beyond. Woods heat things up  nature's forces unleashed. Kick-off for an epic duelling duo: the vibrant and vital versus heightened sensual power. Dangerous charm wins. A conquering hero. Every time.

name: rose-imperiale-2
detail: Rose Impériale reveals the mischievous and subtle woman who flouts the boredom of her airy laughter and her mischievous eyes.

name: bergamotto-di-calabria-la-spugnatura-2021-1
detail: La spugnatura  an ancient and artisanal extraction technique  releases the rare essence of bergamot to create a lively and rich fragrance. Experience the joy of holding this 'golden fruit' in your hands and immerse yourself in this sunny creation.

name: for-men-power
detail: For Men Power embodies the desire for freedom and offers a modern olfactory experience.

name: happy-life-1
detail: “Happy Life is a special message to women everywhere to feel good in their femininity and walk through the world with a smile.” - Gabriela Sabatini

name: raspberry-jam-1
detail: Everyone has the talent to some degree: even making a peanut butter and jelly sandwich  you know whether it tastes better to you with raspberry jam or grape jelly; on chewy pumpernickel or white toast.

name: bohemian-orange-blossom-1
detail: A passionate retreat in a blooming Morocco. An ode to freedom and a tribute to the bohemian way of life.

name: cafe-de-paris-for-men-1
detail: An assertive scent that reflects the masculine elegance of young Parisians who like to meet in one of the many cafés in Paris.

name: prive-oros
detail: Chains of desire  essence of luxury: embrace the golden beauty of Prive Oros.

name: 202-melon-deau-groseille-jasmin-2
detail: A trip to the Mediterranean sea.

name: new-york-sandalwood
detail: Wear it  whether you're male or female  and you'll be noticed  for sure. And to underline its smooth  creamy scent  this composition surrounds them with some unexpectedly heady supporting players.

name: myrrh
detail: Myrrh is a classic and ancient fragrance ingredient  and like Frankincense  was one of the three gifts the Three Kings gave to Baby Jesus.  It is also an aromatic tree resin like Frankincense and has been used throughout history as a perfume  incense and for medicinal purposes.

name: aloe-givre
detail: A combination of aquatic and menthol notes for an invigorating breeze of fresh air.

name: black-orchid-eau-de-toilette-2023
detail: A vibrant take on Tom Ford’s perfect flower  Black Orchid Eau de Toilette introduces itself with sparkling floralcy enlivened by black plum and patchouli. A different encounter that leaves a long-lasting impression.

name: lavanda-imperiale-1
detail: It is an ancient  fresh and relaxing perfume. This plant has been used since ancient times to scent linen and was once spread on the floor because walking on it gave off the scent that perfumed the room. It grows throughout the Mediterranean  in rocky and sunny places  often infested with vipers  which have given it the symbolic meaning of "caution".

name: nutmeg-ice-cream-1
detail: Soothe your heart and soul with the warm  fragrant scent of Demeter's Nutmeg Ice Cream.  Enveloped in fresh cream and garnished with a touch of sugar  that's just enough to remove any bitterness  but not enough to make the fragrance sweet. Fragrant Nutmeg is the star here  but balanced to be wearable.

name: musk-pure
detail: A soft heart of white musk enlivened with floral and citrus notes  Musk Pure opens with a fresh  uplifting confidence  then unfolds into a sense of delicious comfort.
ingredients: ['Musk', 'Iris / Orris', 'Bergamot', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Aldehyde', 'White Pepper', 'Beeswax', 'Benzoin', 'Tonka Bean']

name: daisy-paradise-1
detail: Capturing the free-spirited charm of a sunset stroll through a field of blooming flowers in a phenomenal landscape  Daisy Paradise is a comforting blend of aromatic and floral accords.

name: flacon-aux-abeilles-by-atelier-truscelli-2024
detail: The House of Guerlain invites you to its exceptional rendezvous in numbered edition dedicated to the Chinese New Year. Its 2024 millésime is under the sign of the dragon  symbolising the year to come. Dressed in red for the occasion  the legendary Bee Bottle is adorned with a sumptuous dragon created by Parisian jeweller  Francesco Truscelli. This exceptional piece is hosting the powerful trail of Neroli Outrenoir like an imperial dragon.

name: coffee-woman-duo-1
detail: With an infusion of selected coffee beans  Coffee Duo brings the bitterness and energy of the coffee  and the sweet comfort of the milk  to prove that opposites can create a unique blend.

name: bleu-abysse
detail: Bleu Abysse is a perfume of contrasting sensations: a deep  yet dry  marine-blue note. Inspired by the French rose  ‘Rosa Moschata'  Bleu Abysse is a fresh fusion fragrance. In creating this perfume  the young perfumer sought to capture the waves of euphoria that sweep over us when we are near the sea.

name: la-yuqawam-ambergris-showers
detail: Ambergris Shower embodies minimalism  fantasy and the search for unexplored territories. It evokes harmony  luxury  timeless elegance  peace and balance. Created for a confident and sophisticated man  the perfume is the perfect choice for those seeking a unique and timeless signature fragrance.

name: rose-rose
detail: A flower emblematic of love and joy that radiates a romantic and graceful femininity. The most intimate and unique part of every woman has always been given over to this muse  to this amazing trigger of emotions. The Splendida Rose Rose woman is a "dolce diva" whose delicate nature and joie de vivre enchant  whose grace and ability to overcome dazzle. Her beauty radiates from within. The essence of her whole being strives to "fulfil the desire of the spark within".

name: manrose-1
detail: Masculine and unique  a rose blooms at the heart of ManRose. The fragrance gently envelops the elegant  cosmopolitan GentleMan as he walks lightly and confidently through convention. "If someone loves a flower  from which a single bud grows  in all the millions of stars  it is enough for him to look at the stars to be happy." (Antoine de Saint-Exupéry  The Little Prince  1943).

name: mercedes-benz-land
detail: The Land  Sea and Air trilogy represents a deeply significant return to the elements. Land represents culture  legacy and authenticity  the energy that we draw from what we build and protect. The trilogy is a tribute to layering: infinitely customisable  the trio can be worn separately  in harmonious balance  or in your own desired combination.

name: red-tobacco-1
detail: Incredibly potent and sexy  this fragrance is warm and mesmerising.

name: vetiver-terra
detail: Vetiver Terra evokes the roots in the earth and the sound of rain. Robust. Comfortable. Nothing else.

name: rose-disparta
detail: On the slopes of the Turkish mountains of Isparta  grows the noblest and rarest ingredient of selective perfumery  the Turkish rose. Highly coveted  its petals have the translucence of rose quartz  their radiance matched only by this organic jewel.

name: oriental-enigma-1
detail: For a collection exclusive to Harrods  French perfume label Alexandre J flexes its olfactive prowess to create scents that are truly and exceptionally unique  such as Oriental Enigma Eau de Parfum. Inspired by the concept of holding your cards close to your chest  this fragrance is made for those who wish to protect their soul. And what better way to do that than from behind an alluring yet mysterious haze of precious accords?

name: n-1-twist-cardamom-2018-1
detail: Spicy cardamom and soft orris unfurl into a base of cedarwood for poise and depth. Increased floral notes in the heart balance the sharp spicy notes with pink pepper sparkling from the top. Aromatic rock rose and rich benzoin capture the timeless refinement of the original No.1  fragrance with an element of surprise.

name: vera-wang-embrace-periwinkle-iris-1
detail: Inspired by the simplicity of its ingredients  Vera Wang Embrace : Periwinkle & Iris' floral gourmand opens with a radiant entrance blended with a tender heart. The gourmand notes create a sense of comfort and addiction at the base of this fragrance.

name: nuit-de-feu
detail: “It’s a perfume that does one a world of good. It’s a blend of essential ingredients that have traversed the ages and forged our civilisations. In a world that’s becoming more and more virtual  I wanted to create a perfume that anchors and reconnects us with nature and our collective history.” -  Jacques Cavallier Belletrud  Perfumer

name: ange-des-vignes
detail: With Ange des Vignes  Caudalie signs its first eau de parfum  both voluptuous and sparkling. Between sky and vines  a celestial flight  bewitching and sensual.

name: love-anne-opulent-peony
detail: Delicate fruity notes give way to a heart of soft florals and end with a comforting blend of musk and woods.

name: sophie-la-girafe-eau-de-toilette
detail: This eau de toilette is adapted for the fragrant pleasure of mothers and children over 5 years old. A very soft and tender fragrance.

name: tiffany-rose-gold-intense
detail: “There is a story about time here: Rose Gold Intense tells a tale of love that is as enduring  beautiful and radiant as a Tiffany diamond. A love that lasts and lasts ” Jérôme Epinette  Perfumer.

name: cuir-nilam
detail: Cuir Nilam is a patchouli dressed in a leather perfecto with typically Parisian elegance.

name: wind
detail: With the breath of the cedars of the mountains in the distance  I let myself be carried away. Feel the beauty of communion with nature. Here  we listen to the sound of the wind.

name: nice-bergamote-by-antoine-maisondieu
detail: A sunny sparkle of Calabria's most beautiful natural bergamot leaves in its wake an impression of luminosity.

name: absinthe
detail: Bodies brush past each other  tempting  touching  with reckless abandon  in the buzz of an electric club. The unrestrained exhilaration of a party that doesn’t know when to end. Deep into the night  as the decibels Increase  inhibitions decrease. This wild deluge of sounds and scents spills into the early hours. Absinthe is the scent of euphoria.

name: molecule-03-1
detail: The perfumer has paid homage to a single olfactory ingredient  or chemical scent. On this occasion  it is vetiveryl acetate  a refined note that is celebrated in its purest state in Molecule 03.

name: leau-kenzo-sunlight-pour-femme-2023
detail: An eau full of joy  colours and life.

name: romance-parfum-1
detail: Discover the sensual intensity of a confident  modern Romance.

name: dark-roses-1
detail: A deep  dark swirl unlike anything else you have experienced in a rose-inspired scent.

name: vue-sur-locean
detail: Sitting by the window  the scent of citrus fruits and spices waft delightfully into the room. Spreading across the balcony  they mingle with geraniums and blackcurrant buds and show a bucolic view of a magical landscape. In the distance  the calm and soothing ocean offers a dazzling landscape. The marine and fruity notes invite you to relax voluptuously.

name: santal-blanc-1
detail: "Impeccable and irreproachable  this crystalline peppery fragrance reveals its infinite delicacy on a honeyed woody base"  Serge Lutens.

name: dgvib3
detail: DGVIB3 captures the brand's essence  translating it into a complex yet perfectly balanced fragrance with refreshing and enveloping notes and made to be worn by everyone.

name: arabian-myrrh
detail: Arabian Myrrh is an oriental composition that satisfies the senses with a sweet-amber and woody aroma. It is part of the Museum Collection  which uses classic raw materials and olfactory families from Europe and Asia  reminiscent of the fragrance library of an ancient perfumer.

name: limone-e-verbena
detail: This unisex perfume celebrates the notes of Verbena and Citrus  highlighting the freshness and vivacity of its delicious scents.

name: fcuk-rebel-him-1
detail: A modern fresh woody aromatic scent that captures the sexy confidence of the man who wears it. An energizing blend of citrus and herbal notes balances the aquatic freshness. Versatile and charismatic  its heart is revealed through aromatic notes; effortlessly settling on a sensual woody base.

name: district-of-nolo
detail: "District of Nolo is a tribute to the historic tradition of craftsmanship that highlights one of the finest ingredients in perfumery that I adore: the sublime and mysterious iris absolute ” Aurélien Guichard  Perfumer.

name: sergio-tacchini-classic-1
detail: Sergio Tacchini Classic is a harmonious fragrance that leaves your skin with a fresh  bracing feeling right round the clock.

name: love-anne-pear-blossom
detail: Love  Anne Pear Blossom is a bright and sophisticated fragrance with juicy notes that give way to a heart of fruity florals and finish with a sensual blend of woods and vanilla.

name: amber-oud-2
detail: In Greek mythology  the Heliades were the daughters of Helios and Clymene. After the tragic death of their brother  Phaethon  the Heliades wept for four months and were still blamed for having participated in their brother's death. As a result  the gods turned them into poplars and their tears into amber. The tears  which fell into the river Eridanos in the form of amber beads  were found and used to adorn Roman brides. This amber  born of sadness but used to create beauty in times of joy and celebration  is exactly what inspired the creation of Amber Oud.

name: rose-ivoire-1
detail: A homage to the queen of flowers in the first musky floral perfume of Caron.

name: elie-saab-rose-couture-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: From haute couture to perfume  Elie Saab Rose Couture is floral poetry. Directly inspired by the exceptional work of Elie Saab  the floral theme takes centre stage. A sophisticated  delicate and harmonious fragrance.

name: durocaffe-1
detail: An impressive creation with a surprising  exceptional trail.

name: clash-radish-vetiver-1
detail: Radish and vetiver are roots that should never have crossed underground  yet the perfumer lifted them from their earthly homes in this green and woody confrontation.

name: tuscany-yellow
detail: A fruity  energising breeze that pleasantly cools the hot Tuscan air.

name: ambre-epices
detail: This luxurious perfume is a deep and hypnotic oriental blend. It is created by blending the EPC Essentials Bergamot Incense and Amber Iris.
ingredients: ['Incense / Olibanum', 'Myrrh', 'Pink Pepper', 'Bergamot', 'Iris (Florentine/Tuscany)', 'Incense (Somalia)', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Juniper Berries', 'Vanilla', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Tea', 'Ambrette Seed', 'Patchouli (Indonesia)']

name: cinnamon-bark-1
detail: It is one of those smells that just make you happy.

name: essencial-oud-masculino-1
detail: A fragrance that combines all the exuberance of oud wood - called liquid gold  as noble and rare as it is - with the sensuality of Brazilian Copaiba wood and an exotic touch of spices. The result is a luxurious  elegant and very intense fragrance.

name: neon-orange-1
detail: A fragrance inspired by the first Neon Art exhibition at La Maison Rouge gallery  with fluoro art from the 1920s to today's love of Day-Glo.

name: dazzle-color-champagne
detail: This combination of feminine  floral and fruity notes create a fresh scent with a touch of sophistication.

name: cowboy-grass
detail: A scent of wild grasses and flowering herbs. Earthy and slightly smoky.

name: citron-vert
detail: A fresh and lively fragrance for men and women designed to stimulate and produce an aromatic sensory experience.

name: lime-verbena-1
detail: An exhilarating journey opens on delicious pink lemonade essence and is sprinkled with the green  sparkling freshness of lime verbena and the bright accents of wild yuzu.

name: glistening-amber-1
detail: The Juicy Couture girl finds herself at the centre of her own fairytale with Glistening Amber  inspired by the rich surroundings of her infinite imagination  a magical key to travel through a new place and time.

name: aquavibe-lavender-1
detail: Refresh yourself in an instant and awaken your senses with the refreshing scent of lavender.

name: mind-energy-1
detail: A unisex fragrance supplement that invigorates mental energy and boosts concentration.

name: epice-volees-arsene-lupin-voyou
detail: "This fragrance  Jean-Paul Guerlain's last creation  bears such a striking resemblance to him. It's like a chicly dressed fellow who loves getting up to mischief " Thierry Wasser  Perfumer. Previously referred to as Arsène Lupin Voyou  this fresh-aromatic-woody scent is a trail with two faces  hot and cold all at once.

name: agua-de-santos
detail: Paradise in a bottle. Step into this divine cleansing experience and indulge in this citrusy aromatic blend with invigorating notes.

name: guatemala-cardamom-basil
detail: Run away from the daily stress and let your mood uplifted by the spices in Guatemala Cardamom & Basil. A complex rush of positive energy will envelop you.

name: cedar-n-pepper-1
detail: Cedar N' Pepper is refined with nature's most precious treasures. Mysterious  multifaceted  enticing. The ingredients combine to form a multi-faceted fragrance that boldly reflects modern nobility.

name: botica-214-wood-vetiver
detail: Botica 214 Wood & Vetiver celebrates the sophistication of the Chypre family. An intense and enveloping fragrance that contrasts fresh notes with the signature of Haitian Vetiver and Dark Woods.

name: acqua-di-parma-colonia-mirra
detail: The fresh notes of Cologne enfold and blend with the fragrance of this precious ingredient  a mystic oil with balsamic notes and special smoky facets  that blend with the fresh  clean notes of pure cologne.

name: fleur-doranger-4
detail: Fleur d'Oranger is an enveloping and cocooning fragrance with a dash of innocence  this perfume is dedicated to young and not-so-young adults.

name: patchouly-cedar-wood
detail: A fresh and modern fragrance  surprising and full. A winning blend  intellectual and sophisticated.

name: volpe-1
detail: Volpe is a striking fragrance  which carries the sophistication of a true woody masculine scent. Perfect for the man who finds courage and determination to achieve his goals.

name: gold
detail: "The original Gold was built around a sense of indulgence and the ability to attract attention from across a room. I created Gold Personal for the wearer who desires a delicate version of Gold  less intense but just as seductive. Its sense of indulgence is captured with sweet vanilla  warm woods and a creamy musk trail. Its pure  luxurious scent leaves a trail of sensuality wherever you go " Donna Ramanauskas  perfumer.

name: amber-aoud-absolue-precieux-1
detail: “Amber Aoud Absolue Précieux is the contemporary interpretation of Pure Amber Aoud. This rare and exotic material has been used for centuries in its pure form - The Absolue Précieux has all the depth  body  and lasting quality of pure amber aoud  and is a luxurious extension of the Aoud Collection  created for those who want the ultimate 'Aoud Tollah or Attar' it is richer  and an even more luxurious interpretation of the iconic Roja Parfums Amber Aoud.” - Roja Dove

name: ferrari-pure-lavender-essence
detail: Naturally resplendent at high altitude  lavender produces a timeless and unique floral scent that is often associated with authenticity and tradition. While the lavandin scent brings a surge of energy to the composition  the woody facets give it a distinctive character and a touch of sensuality.

name: luna-rossa-ocean-eau-de-parfum
detail: Bold and determined  Prada Luna Rossa Eau de Parfum is a fragrance built on the temerity of a seasoned adventurer  ready to further his journey beyond his limits and augment his capabilities through the mastery of technology.
ingredients: ['Grapefruit', 'Amber Xtreme (Woody Ambery)', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Clary Sage', 'Elemi', 'Juniper Berries', 'Benzoin', 'Iris / Orris', 'Patchouli', 'Vanilla (Bourbon)', 'Vetiver (Haiti)']

name: tododia-tamara-e-canela-2020
detail: An invitation to dress your body with a light scent. Sensations of freshness and lightness.

name: vanille-flamboyante-de-bourbon-1
detail: Vanille Flamboyante de Bourbon is a fragrance of absolute richness and exoticism.

name: strawberry-1
detail: Spritz some sweetness with this gentle  gourmand eau de toilette.

name: la-nuit-de-lorchidee
detail: "An enchanting flower with fruits that protect it like a leather sheath. The Vanilla Orchid is a sinner containing a storm of senses". Pierre Guillaume offers a dizzying sensation of liquid leather on the skin: the scent of black vanilla kissed by lightning on a stormy night.

name: for-her-amber-musc-1
detail: Amber Musc is a captivating fragrance that melds two iconic notes of perfumery  precious amber and the intoxicating sensuality of rare musc. The result is a voluptuous and enveloping scent.

name: tangier-vanille
detail: "From palaces and gardens to legendary bazaars  Tangier Vanille opens a secret door into the mystery and splendour of Morocco"  Aerin Lauder  Founder.

name: seduction-dark-orchid
detail: Provocative. Luxurious. The ultimate expression of sexy. Give in to Victoria's Secret Seduction.  Designed to seduce the senses  Dark Orchid is a signature blend of midnight orchid.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Blackcurrant', 'Orchid', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Amber', 'Tonka Bean', 'Bergamot', 'Blood Orange', 'Jasmine', 'Lily', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Pineapple', 'Plum', 'Yuzu']

name: woodstock-patchouli
detail: Woodstock Patchouli is the emblem of the bohemian spirit that lives in those who are audacious.

name: oudgasm-rose-oud-16
detail: Oudgasm Rose Oud | 16 is an ode to the queen of flowers  the rose. This rare elixir is an opulent blend of iconic notes.

name: cherry-blossom-millesime-2020
detail: An enchanting ode to spring  the fragrance is filled with lush facets that mirror springtime and its incredible power to renew and rejuvenate all the delicate beauty nature has to offer. The stuff of perfume legend  now Jean-Paul Guerlain’s emblematic creation makes a welcome return for 2020.

name: raspberry-1
detail: The dominant sensation of our version of Raspberry is bright  fresh and spicy citrus. It seems impossible to smell this and not smile. We've captured the memory of a perfect summer day in a bottle.

name: dolce-rosa-excelsa
detail: Complementing Dolce & Gabbana's unique signature  Dolce Rosa Excelsa features a new and distinctive rose heart.

name: cassis-pink-pepper
detail: A wonderfully feminine scent  intense and sensual.

name: aoud-orchid
detail: This fresh combination is a velvety  intense  and sensual fragrance.

name: iris-celadon-1
detail: "Celadon is neither blue  nor green  nor grey. It is an indefinable colour that fascinates me"  Giorgio Armani.

name: its-ae-sin
detail: "Everything I've done  everything I do  everywhere I've been  everywhere I go; it's a sin " Pet Shop Boys.

name: musc-noble
detail: Inspired by the lands of the Orient  this creation by Maison Guerlain  Musc Noble highlights one of the most mysterious materials in Perfumery: musk. Alternately powerful  warm and powdery  the musk sublimates the fragrance in an intense harmony and full of character.

name: q-by-dolce-gabbana-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: The iconic Q fragrance becomes even more intriguing in Eau de Parfum Intense version. The perfume releases a mix of strong  decisive  decidedly sensual notes. For uncompromising femininity.

name: coffee-man-lucky
detail: Coffee believes that love is always an exciting  striking and unexpected gambling game  so it brings something new to the world of men's perfumery at Boticário: Coffee Man Lucky for men who don't give up on a good move.

name: amber-musk-dor-1
detail: Amber Musk opens with an unwavering sense of tantalising warmth  offering an addictive pull  and a bouquet that smoulders blooms from the heart. Dark opulence unfolds in shades of sumptuous mystery  weaving its way through with enigmatic magnetism.
ingredients: ['Amber', 'Musk', 'Rose Centifolia', 'Coconut Milk', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Ambrox (Ambergris)', 'Sandalwood (Australia)', 'Benzoin', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Silk Tree Blossom', 'Praline', 'Magnolia Leaves']

name: iris-fauve
detail: Iris Fauve envelops the skin like a soft  comforting veil. A sensual and spicy composition  soft and powdery  yet self-assured and animalic.

name: santal-noir-1
detail: "Sandalwood is a sacred wood with warm  milky and comforting nuances. I have shaken it with a powerful ambrette  which blends notes of fruit  liqueur  amber and musk. It gives this round and enveloping wood a good dose of energy  accentuated by a very expressive Turkish rose scent"  François Demachy  Perfumer-Creator.

name: gianni-versace-couture-jasmin
detail: “I wanted to create something truly unique and exclusive  perfumes that are not linked to a specific Atelier Versace collection but that could immediately recall the atmosphere of sophisticated luxury " stated Donatella Versace  Creative Director of the Versace brand. With an aim to create the Couture collection  fragrances that she prefers were selected  violet  tuberose  and jasmine.

name: wish-you-were-here-1
detail: The coffee is running through a grinder  warm biscotti are placed on the cafe’s counter  a low melody plays on the patio speakers  while warm rain trickles down the striped umbrella you sit under looking out onto the cobblestone streets. Distance is no measure for love that makes us feel alive. Let your love feel closer with Wish You Were Here.

name: hypnotizing-fire
detail: Hypnotizing Fire is a seductive fragrance that nurtures the wearer like a gentle flame. Warm and glowing  it is an enchanting Yin scent that revives and restores.

name: valentina-assoluto-1
detail: "This perfume is a real creation  much more nocturnal  more seductive. The white flowers in question are warm and enveloping. It is a strong perfume  which brings a sense of mystery and noir. It is also inspired by Valentino's fashion". - Olivier Cresp  Perfumer

name: white-wood-vetiver-1
detail: A fresh  bright fragrance with an open horizon  capable of awakening the "wild" side of our soul.

name: vanille-de-madagascar
detail: At the heart of this fragrance  the purest vanilla from Madagascar evokes notes of chocolate  bourbon and caramel  producing a stimulating  hypnotic sensation.

name: cardamusc-essence-de-parfum
detail: Under the radiant influence of cardamom  one of the most ancient spices in the world  enveloping animal notes of musks intertwine and unfurl with unbridled allure.

name: osmanthus-9
detail: The fragrance of tenderness and sweetness  a memory of love and joy. When you smile  the whole world smiles with you.

name: santal-royal
detail: Memories and dreams  emotions and exoticism. Santal Royal pays homage to a natural raw ingredient whose divine values have cradled and bathed oriental civilisations since the dawn of time.

name: mandarin-ginger-lily-n6-1
detail: The feeling after a crisp  energetic walk inspired Trish McEvoy to create No. 6.

name: vanille-exquise-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: The slatted shutters filter the afternoon sun  plunging the living room into darkness. You can barely make out the silhouette stretched out on the sofa  but an exquisite fragrance wafts through the air. A bath of almond milk infused with vanilla pods has enveloped her skin in a sensual and delicious aroma.

name: infusion-diris-parfum-absolue-1
detail: Prada's new fragrance is the synthesis of modern alchemy  blending incredibly refined ingredients with reverence for the traditional art of perfumery. As precious and rare as gold  Infusion d'Iris Eau de Parfum Absolue is the pure essence of Infusion d'Iris  an invitation to experience supreme luxury and to step into the history of Iris.

name: rain-pear-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Rain & Pear is a delectable fragrance with mouthwatering notes of pear that give the fragrance its succulent appeal.

name: sexycrush-1
detail: “I wanted a perfume as light as a feather  that doesn't leave a trace on the planet  only on the skin  with an incredible wake and a strong signature. An inescapable personality of great generosity ” Aliénor Massenet  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Woody Notes', 'Vanilla', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Lemon', 'Citronella', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Gurjum Balsam', 'Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Rose', 'Tonka Bean']

name: yuzu-red-pepper-vetiver
detail: Let yourself be enveloped by the fresh scent of juicy citrus wrapped in timeless and elegant background chords.

name: gentleman-givenchy-eau-de-parfum-reserve-privee
detail: An intoxicating whisky-inspired fragrance where floral sophistication meets woody depths. This rare eau de parfum combines the olfactory worlds and unique savoir-faire of two master perfumers and a master whisky distiller. The ultimate in timeless elegance and refinement.

name: guess-bella-vita-rosa-1
detail: Bella Vita Rosa celebrates a luminous and joyful existence. "I sought to create a fragrance that has contrast but with smooth transitions. I wanted to give the wearer the ability to see light through rose-coloured glasses  seeing all that is positive and beautiful in this world " Gabriela Chelariu  Perfumer.
ingredients: ['Magnolia', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Moss', 'Freesia', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Bergamot', 'Quince', 'Amber', 'Cypress', 'Plum', 'Sandalwood', 'Skin Accord', 'Vetiver']

name: evening-rose-dor-1
detail: Evening Rose d'Or opens to reveal a modern and dramatic spiced edge. At the heart  beats the floral intensity with a modern sensuality of primal magnetism. Unforgettable intrigue reaches amplification in an aura of mystery and elegance creating a veil of immersive warmth for an allure that lingers.

name: coco-eau-de-parfum
detail: COCO expresses the intensity of Gabrielle Chanel's personality and her love of all things baroque. A luxuriant oriental symphony that gradually reveals its contrasting notes.

name: nitro-night
detail: Capture all eyes with a striking scent. If you like to stand out  feel free  and enjoy the night  this is the perfect perfume for you.

name: sicilian-limes-1
detail: Ruthlessly risky. The home of the Mafia produces the finest limes in the world. This Casanova of a fragrance is sharply tangy  a fizz of acidic citrus on the tongue with a shot of salt and danger.

name: myrrhe-55-2
detail: Myrrh  a resin once considered to be so sacred that it was more valuable than gold  is known in Chinese traditional medicine as a “blood mover.” It should come as no surprise  then  that Myrrhe 55  Shanghai’s City Exclusive  is a creation that will get your heartbeat thumping. It's understated elegance  emanating contemporary yet creative classicism that makes it hard to ignore and forget. It's a chypre  ladies and gents. Dark and electric  old and new. Just like Shanghai.

name: sea-salt-lime
detail: A walk along a charming Portofino. A warming sun  a carefree atmosphere full of cafes  a great mood  the breeze in your hair  and the scent of the sea that is so addictive as it mixes with the energising scent of citrus trees.

name: una-somos
detail: Una Somos evokes the spontaneity that connects women when they look in the same direction  when they inspire each other and recognise themselves in the multiple beauties that unite them.

name: sweet-diamond-pink-pepper-25
detail: Sweet Diamond Pink Pepper | 25 is an electric  floral  woody creation. Like a sudden impulse  this warm rosy elixir will spice up your mood or add a special twist to any fragrance combination.

name: grass
detail: Grass captures the freshness and sweetness of lush green grass.

name: white-tea-vanilla-orchid
detail: "In creating Vanilla Orchid  I wanted to capture the moment of pure tranquillity and comfort  like cosying up under a soft blanket. The fragrance is a warm indulgence of soothing tea  sensual vanilla orchid  and woody musks that blend together for a smooth and serene escape " Gil Clavien  Perfumer.

name: liberto
detail: Liberto echoes exotic  pure and floral notes in an enveloping and indescribable aromatic experience that takes hold of time.
ingredients: ['Patchouli', 'Peach', 'Carnation', 'Bergamot', 'Jasmine', 'Lavender', 'Amber', 'Green Notes', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Spicy Notes', 'Vanilla']

name: santal-cardamome
detail: We travel back in time and head to Siam  the fertile land of Asia and the cradle of spices. From green notes  its course intensifies to woody notes. The sensuality and the warmth of these woody notes accompany irresistibly delicate notes.

name: original-english-lavender
detail: Yardley's original English Lavender fragrance is inspired by a variety of flowers.

name: 902-armagnac-tabac-blond-cannelle-1
detail: The strength of the cognac and the smoothness of the vanilla just make you think of a sensual evening for two.

name: promise-2
detail: In the Middle East  a promise made between two people is accompanied by the strictest code of honour. Frédéric Malle celebrates this principle with a promise of his own  that this perfume is made of precious notes  in an unbreakable and invisible vow.

name: lacura
detail: Lacura was inspired by one of Stefania Squeglia's favourite songs and poems  "La Cura" by Franco Battiato. Take care of your true self. Take care of the path of your life. Take care of your soul. Wish yourself the best love song  the deepest love poem. Wish you this Extrait.

name: cargo-de-nuit
detail:
The perfume Olfactories - Cargo De Nuit was launched by Prada.
The dominant ingredients of the fragrance are cedarwood  ambroxan  aldehyde  ambrette seed and amyris.
The perfume is for women and men.

name: black-orchid-1
detail: Rich  bewitching  voluptuous  this fragrance combines the wild sensuality of black orchid with the enchanting power of amber and precious woods.

name: tabac-noir
detail: Luxurious  almost baroque  Tabac Noir leaves a wonderfully enveloping imprint on the skin. An invitation to the excitement of an evening in the East  Tabac Noir is a magnetic leathery fragrance that blends power with sensuality.

name: grass-1
detail: In Demeter's Grass pick-me-up cologne  we have captured the freshness and sweetness of a lush green grass pasture.

name: dahn-oudh-al-shams
detail: Like the golden glow of the sun  you shall shine  with our all-time favourite Arabic perfume created for the bold and beautiful. Derived from aged Indian agarwood  the eau de parfum radiates unique characteristics and are highly diffusive and long lasting.

name: natura-homem-madeiras
detail: For men with a great personality  who know how to enjoy life and face problems with elegance and a positive attitude.

name: black-orchid-parfum
detail: Created exclusively for Tom Ford  Black Orchid Parfum was born from his quest for the perfect flower: luxurious  elegant  pure and sophisticated. Stunning since its inception  this fragrance continues to envelop all genders in a world of its own.

name: legend-pour-homme-red-1
detail: A charismatic fragrance  fresh yet intense  bold yet sensitive. This unique olfactory experience evokes the thrill of speed and makes the heart beat a little faster.

name: hugo-intense
detail: Red. Electric energy. Hot temperament. Passion is on fire. Express who you are  without any limit.

name: cyber-garden
detail: Cyber Garden was inspired by a futuristic vision  an imaginary scent of what a garden would look like far beyond our present time. The essence is the result of a magical trip to the future where  like in a time machine  a sort of shuttle leads to a science fiction garden and abducts all its smells. Cyber Garden is the garden of the future… No boundaries  no limits....

name: orange-affair-3
detail: A spectacular extraction from bitter orange trees best flowers selected in Tunisia  Morocco and Egypt. An absolute fruity scent that evokes floral sensations. Inspired by both the Latin and New York heritage of Carolina Herrera couture's expertise  this fragrance is a timeless fantasy with the confident of seduction.

name: shalimar-millesime-tonka-2022
detail: In the sumptuous trail of Shalimar  Guerlain invites us to a truly exceptional experience with its 2022 Millésime  celebrating the most iconic of ambery fragrances inspired by the Orient. A scent of delight showcasing one of the most emblematic materials of the icon: Shalimar Millésime Tonka.

name: anticonformiste
detail: A fresh aromatic fragrance that starts fresh and zesty with intense woody base notes. The surprising association of contrasted accords allow all genders to wear this floral-ish fragrance that makes it "anti-conformist" per se.

name: colcci-silver-1
detail: A masculine and fresh composition  capturing the essence of a contemporary woody aromatic cologne.

name: sugar-rum
detail: Smells so good  you can almost taste it.

name: ruzafa
detail: An unexpected scent that will surprise you all day long.

name: hippie-rose
detail: “The rising sun of a new  carefree day. A warm wind filtering through the Californian desert. The perfumed air of a Himalayan temple. Waves of long  shining hair flicker over dust and sand and soft  tanned skin. Freedom is not far. Against the rose coloured sky of dusk  we dream of love and peace and better days ” James Heeley.

name: guipure-silk-ylang-vanille-1
detail: Guipure & Silk Ylang Vanille is a dynamic and mysterious fragrance that creates an extremely attractive aura around it.

name: bete-humaine
detail: Bête Humaine is an invitation to follow the fragrant and lively trace of a person of the forest who became wild after withdrawing from the urban world. Their wanderings across all the scents of nature and their meanders in the forest have made these green adventurers a Bête Humaine (a human beast) with a passion for chestnut trees.

name: lambre-des-merveilles-1
detail: "With Ambre  the woman becomes sensual and mysterious… It's full of mystique!" Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer.

name: 4-montabaco-intensivo-1
detail: Montabaco Intensivo is a perfume to capture the essence of Latin America: leather  suede  wood and tobacco leaf repeated over and over again creating a suggestive sensuality and Latino temperament.
ingredients: ['Tobacco Leaf', 'Leather', 'Suede', 'Tonka Bean', 'Ambergris', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Moss', 'Sandalwood', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Juniper Berries', 'Magnolia', 'Orange', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Rose', 'Clary Sage', 'Violet', 'Tea']

name: blissful-strawberry-1
detail: Bring some zen to the party and express your serene side with Blissful Strawberry. We know you'll love the refreshed look of our bestselling Japanese Cherry Blossom Strawberry Kiss.

name: rumeur-2-rose-1
detail: Rumeur 2 Rose. Seeing life through rose-coloured crystals  a very new and ultra-fresh fragrance whose modernity and sexy attitude reflect today's young woman: elegant  spontaneous and demanding. A new generation that combines glamour and audacity  creating buzz and juicy gossip wherever it goes!

name: earl-grey-cucumber
detail: Fresh and refined  but with a playful touch  Earl Grey & Cucumber cologne is inspired by the romantic retro ritual of "afternoon tea"  served seriously  but taken lightly.

name: miss-giordani-intense
detail: Miss Giordani Intense is a sophisticated and exuberant fragrance that lifts your spirits and helps you celebrate your passion for life.

name: fiorucci-icy-fantasy-1
detail: The inspiration for this perfume was the timeless "girls just want to have fun". A combination of juicy fruits and feminine florals was used to create a fragrance that is feminine  but also unabashedly sensual  fresh and fun.

name: ylang-ylang-musk
detail: A bright  floral scent with a hint of green. Wait until you smell the sweetness opening up!

name: coromandel-1
detail: "I almost fainted with happiness the first time I saw a Coromandel in a Chinese shop " Mademoiselle Chanel confessed. She had a gift of capturing styles and mixing them with great skill to create new forms of beauty. She thus covered her walls in Paris with precious Coromandel screens  teaming Asian flowers with the classic style of her apartments to give them an aura of oriental mystery and sophistication.

name: dirty-coconut-1
detail: A lusty masterpiece of exotic woods and warmed vanilla that seduces and relaxes.

name: madras-cardamom
detail: Dynamic  adventurous  exotic. Masculinity and mystery are expressed through the intense spices of the opening. Depth and character are revealed through the soft textures of the heart and base. Wear it on the go with a suede bomber jacket paired with trendy trainers and a fine nappa leather backpack for a long weekend with friends.

name: pure-pastel-lemon-1
detail: This spring  cool mint tones meet pastel lemon  giving rise to new and unusual combinations in the fashion world. When combined with pinks and reds  these contrasts create an even more summery freshness. The diversity of pastel prints with floral and graphic elements heralds the warmer months.

name: liquid-love-8
detail: Be careful  you might fall in love. Proceed with caution and wear with care. At first a gentle spritz of confusion  an enveloping sea of sensation  an absence of appetite  a tendency to day-dream  and at night  sleep that is deep and peaceful  or interrupted with dreams of desire! Soon however  one will be visited by an abundance of generosity and joy  unfaltering kindness  you want for nothing  your heart is open. You feel like you have wings  inexplicably confident and strong  and yet soft. Paradise is sigh all around. Suddenly and all at once. Nothing will ever quite be the same. Love and desire distilled. Fresh  sparkling notes gently caress  before the spicy  fruity head turns into something with more bite. Helplessly  passionately addictive.

name: kingston-osmanthus
detail: Perfumer  Alberto Morillas is fascinated by the fragile beauty and intense  musky smell of the white Osmanthus buds he once discovered on a trip to China. Together with Eric Buterbaugh  they decided to create a fragrance orchestrated with this unique scent at its core  featuring some beautiful and familiar notes found elsewhere in the collection.

name: amber-mystique-1
detail: Amber Mystique by Estée Lauder is a full-bodied  intricate and darkly ornate fragrance.

name: aqua-allegoria-mandarine-basilic-forte
detail: This scent evokes the delight of a sun-drenched mandarin. Delphine Jelk  Guerlain Perfumer  has created this fruit in the colour of the setting sun  picked in a Mediterranean garden at the end of a scorching summer’s day. Made languid by the heat  mandarin becomes more sensual and candied  almost caramelised.

name: yacht-man-victory
detail: A masculine scent  with lively top notes and a classical fougere heart. A smooth  elegant woody base rounds out the composition.

name: encens-feve-tonka
detail: A walk at sunset among the monasteries of Mount Athos  the roses give off their fragrance  time stands still. The incense smoke envelops us in a cosy warmth.

name: black-violet-2
detail: A noble and refreshing blend. The woody accent and the marriage of green notes and spices with soft floral and fruity elements  creates an hypnotic scent.

name: pure-oil-of-musk
detail: Extremely concentrated  Pure Oil of Musk adds an element of mystery and softness to the light florals in the composition.

name: scent-intense-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Magnetically erotic  Scent Intense opens with a fresh and elegant aura of jasmine and hibiscus tea  which is immediately undercut by punk rock; base composed of amber and precious woods. Warm  dark and deep  Scent Intense transports you to an unknown and exotically disturbing world. Unique and addictive  it is a fragrance of uninhibited seduction.

name: happy-chi-hello-kitty-2022-1
detail: A real addiction.

name: aramis-tobacco-reserve-1
detail: Aramis Tobacco ReserveA fragrance inspired by the finest Havana tobacco  rich and bold  inviting you to let go and escape into the moment. This fragrance embodies the Aramis man in every sense: seductive  sophisticated and complex.
ingredients: ['Tobacco Accord', 'Clary Sage', 'Tonka Bean', 'Iris / Orris', 'Nutmeg', 'Carrot Seeds', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Oakmoss', 'Blackcurrant Bud']

name: piano-santal-1
detail: Piano Santal is a white woody dream in which languid sandalwood  pheromonal accord and a milky creaminess define the composition.

name: pepe-raro
detail: Pepe Raro recounts the wonder of those who  light-hearted and carefree  stand on the threshold of discovering the world.

name: agua-fresca-lima-tonka-1
detail: An unusual balance. Solar. Vibrant. Nothing else.

name: phy-mountain-rain
detail: Phy Mountain Rain is great for men who are always ready for the unexpected.

name: paper-3
detail: "Paper Minus is also an ode to writing a letter to a loved one. I wanted this fragrance to be personal and very intimate. I created the fragrance around Iso E Super  a beautiful note that provides a wonderful feeling of warmth on the skin throughout the composition. To intensify this sensation  I added musk with fresh jasmine petals and the warmth of crisp amber to give it texture and depth " Jerome Epinette  perfumer.

name: paper-1
detail: Playing on the passion of the original Paper fragrance  Paper Bold takes your senses on a poetic journey. I've boosted the Iso E Super for a closer-to-skin feel  while enhancing the creamy sandalwood to increase warmth. To finish  I added a veil of cashmere musk and sweet vanilla to amplify and prolong that cosy feeling with the intensity of rich vetiver to give it more dimension " Donna Ramanauskas  perfumer.

name: amber-aoud-1
detail: Sumptuous  mysterious sensuality... Citrus mingles with a sensual blend of highly perfumed florals that are warmed by spicy notes swirling around succulent heart notes  adding richness to an opulent base that is underscored by a blend of some of the most expensive materials in all of perfumery.

name: mystery-tobacco-3
detail:
The skilful treatment of the raw material reveals all the secrets of its delicate leaves and praises the perfumer's craftsmanship  subtly combining touch and smell.
Mystery Tobacco is a rich  nuanced and warm fragrance  reflecting the character of an aged ingredient. Tobacco  the enigmatic ingredient at the heart of Mystery Tobacco  is the epitome of true luxury authenticity. Designed to exalt  its warm and enveloping aromas reveal the House of Herrera expertise.

name: tresor-en-or-2019
detail: A modern fluid and addictive scent  Trésor en Or  adds a twist to the iconic Trésor fragrance.

name: cristal-lavanda-light
detail: Lavender Light has a natural and refreshing scent that stimulates the feeling of well-being.

name: blossom-me
detail: An ingenue who exudes pure insouciance. Eccentric and in touch with her sensuality  she reveals beguiling maturity and unexpected depth.

name: honey-pomelo-neroli
detail: Honey Pomelo & Neroli is both fragile and strong at the same time  just like the feminine soul.

name: lime-nutmeg-1
detail: A bright composition  reminiscent of a sunny and warm day at the sea. The fruity  tart-sweet flavor of lime is stimulating and invigorating and gives the Acqua Colonia Lime & Nutmeg a refreshing effervescent.

name: oud-cannelle
detail: An Oud dressed in a leather boot  a fragrance between two worlds. One is round  comfortable  and wrapped in a vanilla veil. The other is darker and comprised of sensual shades of cinnamon and myrrh. A mysterious and captivating contrast.

name: 601-vetiver-cedre-bergamote
detail: 601 VÉTIVER CÈDRE BERGAMOTE is a refreshing scent of wildflowers and elegant woods  suitable for men and women.

name: blissfully-you-keep-it-cosy-2021
detail: Pamper yourself and wrap yourself in our enveloping fragrance  Blissfully You Keep it Cosy. Think of it as your daily getaway  where you can let yourself be transported to a place of pure bliss.

name: falling-in-love-with-neroli-iris-1
detail: It is located in the Mediterranean  in the epicentre south of Seville  Spain  where warm breezes sway through coastal citrus fruits. A fresh and inviting citrus scent that transports you to the heart of Neroli capturing the bliss of love in a bottle.

name: zagara-orange-blossom
detail: A highly aromatic citrus scent of Sicilian orange groves.

name: antaeus-pour-homme-1
detail: ANTAEUS celebrates the fleeting virility of a Greek hero who was only strong as long as his feet remained grounded. A nuanced masculinity  equally powerful and sensitive. A fragrance that contrasts the power of a myth with the sensitivity of a man.

name: violette-aubepine-malicieuse
detail: A sweet and tangy candy fragrance  that is both delicate and malicious.

name: ballet-nights
detail: A graceful balance of sweet and sophisticated accords.

name: santal-majuscule
detail: That night  just before dawn  it snowed. A boy  his neck bent to protect himself  was on his way to school. A thin white veil slipped under his feet and swirled around him  covering his mouth and muffling his words: "I'm going to be late! At first he thought of picking up the pace  but then  as if the idea came from somewhere else  he rejected it and decided to make things worse. From that moment on  the North Pole lived in him.

name: bake
detail: At Akro  we don’t have a lot of restraint. The temptations of everyday life are at the heart of what we do  and continue to inspire new scents and ideas. One of the aromas of modern life we find most alluring is that of bakeries and cake shops  the scent of fresh pastry and sticky sugar brightening up the most humdrum of days. One of our favourite bakeries in all of London is Carnaby Street’s Crumbs & Dollies  and inspired by their famous lemon cupcakes  we created BAKE.

name: end-game
detail: This fragrance reflects the halls of power and the corporate chess game of position and influence. A calm and strategic frame of mind.

name: white
detail: Designed to awaken the senses  White will make you feel like you're dreaming.

name: violet-petals-1
detail: Violet Petals is an extremely feminine bouquet that reinterprets the true essence of the violet flower. It is part of the Museum collection  which uses classic European and Asian raw materials and olfactory families  reminiscent of an old perfumer's library of fragrances.

name: les-sables-roses
detail: A timeless fragrance trail of rose and oud wood to taste the infinite desert.  The desert possesses a singular magic that captivates travelers. At dawn  the sun's first rays blend the dunes and the sky  night and day  and the earth and clouds into a majestic pink.

name: dune-road-1
detail: Inspired by summer walks along the beach with the crisp ocean breeze blowing through your hair  soft sand under your feet while hearing the whispers of the wildflowers and sea grass blowing in the distance.

name: le-cedre-1
detail: A spicy tale. A fragrance created for someone with a sense of adventure at the heart of everything they do. It is captivating and intriguing to the senses. Le Cèdre is about embarking on a great journey.

name: sacred-osmanthus-1
detail: Osmanthus has the mythological status of Tree of the Immortals. It was used to create long-life elixirs. Nature's secret of infiniteness unveiled.

name: bliss
detail: Discover the meaning of true paradise with Bliss. Remember the sublime emotions of paradise complete with serene comfort.

name: plein-fatale-1
detail: A sensual and dangerous scent to embrace your power. Live your life to the fullest. Celebrate your uniqueness.

name: gucci-bloom-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: Blossom your most intense inner light from the mystery of the night with Gucci Bloom Eau de Parfum Intense. Inspired by the magnetic forces of moonlight  this powerful fragrance is a catalyst for the creative spirit  encouraging everyone to blossom into their most authentic self.

name: la-voce
detail: An opulent fragrance that embodies the beauty  spirit and passion of opera  Grammy award-winning artist Renée Fleming.
ingredients: ['Lily Of The Valley', 'White Truffle', 'Ebony Tree', 'Jasmine', 'Passion Fruit', 'Dark Chocolate']

name: 31-tonka-bodykon-1
detail: Inspired by the chromatic palette of a sunset on the horizon  this fragrance is a "tonka liqueur" infused with balsamic and fruity notes. Intoxicating and fiery  we imagine it glowing on the body of a deity performing a dance of fire  billowing its veils in the evening light.

name: midnight-journey-1
detail: A captivating and atmospheric scent. Swirling heady aromas inspired by far-reaching travel and dream-like destinations  magical and enchanting winding streets  richly scented with spices.

name: rose-9
detail: Rose de Nuage is one of the most precious and elegant perfumes  based on the spiritual matrix and energy of the most powerful flower.

name: seduction-vibes-1
detail: A carnal and tangy scent.

name: gold-i
detail: This fruity-floral accord opens with subtly sweet fruity notes  entwined with a rambling floral heart. Patchouli and amber provide longevity and warmth in the base.

name: appear
detail: A fruity and gourmand fragrance  Appear combines the juiciness of a pear with the vivacity of a green apple accord for an intriguing and surprising result.
ingredients: ['Pear', 'Green Apple', 'Caramel', 'Gardenia', 'Heliotrope', 'Iris / Orris', 'Jasmine', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Amber', 'Mandarin', 'Peach', 'Raspberry', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Black Pepper', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Cedarwood', 'Moss', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Vetiver']

name: yuzu-garden
detail: A scent inspired by a golden and wonderful midsummer night's dream. Refreshing and fragrant.

name: elysium-eau-de-parfum-pour-femme
detail: With a strong  independent spirit  our heroine reigns over the open plains of the Elysian Fields  forging her own path across this fantastical landscape. Awakened by her touch  flowers bloom in their most beautiful and fragrant way  casting a kaleidoscope of colour across the horizon.

name: my-way-floral-1
detail: My Way Floral is an invitation to a journey of self-discovery  capturing the life-affirming feeling of a first encounter  with a refreshing sense of exhilaration that makes those who wear it blossom.

name: k-by-dolce-gabbana-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: K Intense embodies the intrepid character of a self-confident man. The perfume evokes a combination of strong  persistent and bold notes.

name: light-blue-pour-homme-1
detail: Dolce and Gabbana Light Blue Pour Homme - a masculine fragrance as overwhelming and irresistible as joie de vivre. A Mediterranean mood.

name: beyond-romance-1
detail: "A fragrance can make you feel alive and that's what Beyond Romance is all about  giving the feeling of living life to the full. I wanted to go beyond the traditional floral archetype to give each woman a strong  individual aura." - Honorine Blanc  Perfumer

name: classique-eau-de-parfum
detail: Classique  the irresistible temptation. A Jean Paul Gaultier fragrance of pure contrasts  carnal and intoxicating  to seduce and make everyone fall at your feet  the orchid speaks volumes of this strong woman's desires  balanced by Bourbon vanilla absolute  the most delicate scent par excellence.

name: le-male-8
detail: Le Male  as virile as it is sexy  pays homage to the symbolic figure that has always inspired Jean Paul Gaultier: the sailor.This masculine perfume has a non-conformist vision of masculinity. Lavender  evoking the familiar and comforting scent of shaving foam  is enhanced by the sensuality of vanilla.

name: amor-amor
detail: Your mission: Bewitch him by catching the Amor Amor love potion.

name: catch-me
detail: "Orange blossom was used for its femininity and freshness. For sultry sensuality  an almond-milk accord and addictive ambry notes. And for the fun? The bottle looks like a spinning top  or a piece of jewelry  or… lots of other things. Catch Me is an escape  a sense of freedom and self-confidence" - Dominique Ropion  Perfumer

name: ambre-nuit
detail: "The idea was to create a masculine rose by combining two of the most emblematic ingredients used by perfumers. This chord was particularly important to me  I worked on it for many years before successfully creating Ambre Nuit". François Demachy  Perfumer

name: tonka-25
detail: This one is dark. A good scent  addictive  warm  dark and sensual.

name: tubereuse-1
detail: A room with a view: on her bare skin  the reminiscence of ecstasy  and in the air  a slender trail of cigarette smoke. The indelible mark of love  the burning memory of lustful passion. Tubereuse is a narcotic perfume  the thrill of the forbidden  a return to perfume’s natural instincts.

name: sun-men-parfum-1
detail: Let yourself be captivated by Jil Sander Sun Men Parfum. A sensual fragrance with warmth and character.

name: where-my-heart-beats
detail: Hypnotising as a dream  enduring as a memory  Where My Heart Beats unveils itself layer by layer  like a blossoming bouquet with dancing butterflies.

name: jasmine-white-leather
detail: White Leather is a journey full of challenges and opportunities to a new place on earth. This composition strengthens self-esteem  gives courage and pushes to action to embark on the great adventure of your life.

name: oud-khasian
detail: Kashian Oud is a complex  dark and mysterious perfume. Its many alternative facets gently lead us into a voluptuous fantasy world of The Thousand and One Nights.
ingredients: ['Oud / Agarwood', 'Woody Notes', 'Patchouli', 'Saffron', 'Sandalwood', 'Vetiver', 'Ambergris', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Musk', 'Cardamom', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Black Pepper']

name: essencial-mirra-masculino-1
detail: A magnificent encounter with myrrh. A gift from kings  farmed myrrh comes from the east. And from the Amazon  we bring this rare and unprecedented resin  so precious that it became known as mirra brasileria. Essencial Mirra Masculino emerges from this encounter.
ingredients: ['Myrrh', 'Davana', 'Cardamom', 'Amber', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Elemi', 'Balsam (Peru)', 'Tolu Balsam', 'Vanilla', 'Plum', 'Wheat', 'Carrot', 'Bergamot', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Coriander', 'Lemon', 'Patchouli', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Woody Notes', 'Black Pepper']

name: star-magnolia-2023
detail: Spring arrives with glistening blossom trees scenting the air in the city parks of Shanghai: star magnolia is in bloom.

name: vetiver-dhaiti-au-the-vert
detail: Built around the purest Vetiver sourced from sustainable farming  this fragrance provides a comforting yet invigorating scent that fires the imagination.

name: deluxe
detail: Deluxe is for the woman with a unique personality  who loves luxury and exclusivity. She likes to attract attention and leave her mark wherever she goes.

name: vetiver-extreme-eau-de-toilette
detail: A powerful  modern reinterpretation of its famous original. Vétiver Extrême Eau De Toilette celebrates all the richness and the intensity of the green and timbered environment.

name: montabaco-1
detail: Montabaco is a perfume to capture the essence of Latin America creating a suggestive sensuality and Latino temperament.
ingredients: ['Tobacco Leaf', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Sandalwood', 'Orange Blossom', 'Suede', 'Ambergris', 'Hedione (light Jasmine)', 'Magnolia', 'Rose', 'Violet', 'Tea', 'Bergamot', 'Cardamom', 'Juniper Berries', 'Moss', 'Ozonic Notes', 'Clary Sage', 'Tonka Bean']

name: n-7-camellia-32
detail: A refreshing sea breeze with reminiscent floral and exotic scents. Intense green notes mingle with bright and soft white tea. The smell of sheets dried in the sun during a summer day. Camellia 3.2 is an olfactory watercolor of salt  sand and sun oil; a canvas of faraway islands and of large and fleshy white flowers  sublimated by a sumptuous Amber accord that evokes the warm kiss of a sunbeam.

name: radikal-jasmine-1
detail: Radikal Jasmine is an exotic floral fragrance that celebrates the beauty and nobility of the Sambac Jasmine.

name: pleasures
detail: One of life's simple pleasures. Never sweet  ever fresh  it delights your senses with pleasure after pleasure.

name: blossom-peach
detail: Forming part of our Contemporary Classics range  the Blossom & Peach fragrance by Yardley is inspired by a diverse variety of flowers. A fruity  spicy floral blend.

name: oro-bianco-1
detail: Elegant  impressive  demanding. The magnificence at the start  intertwines the refinement of the floral bouquet in the heart that creates the perfect blend of passion  gentleness and charm  while the dry down is enhanced by the breezy wisps of woods and gourmand offering a peerless intensity.

name: ambre-tonka
detail: A parable of sensuality illuminated by the balance of forces between amber and tonka bean.

name: lime-basil-1
detail: Lime & Basil is designed for everyone who likes to discover new opportunities and longs to experience unforgettable moments full of excitement!

name: rave-for-men
detail: Rave is for a man who embraces life and lives it to the fullest. His energy is infectious  his charisma magnetic and his appeal irresistible.

name: click-song
detail: Click Song by Une Nuit Nomade is the first fragrance of the "Une Nuit au Cap" collection. The creation is a tribute to the glorious singer Miriam Makeba  also known as Mama Africa. Especially her strength of character and determination left an indelible mark.

name: midnight-spell
detail: This scent smells like an enchanted walk in the woods.

name: white-stones-1
detail: Waves crashing on the rocky beaches of Marina del Pisa  the whisper of the sliding stones and sea salt’s white frost  the overwhelming freshness of clear blue skies. What does this moment smell like?
ingredients: ['Geranium', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Musk', 'Dry Woods', 'Sea Water', 'Coriander', 'Elemi', 'Fir Balsam', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Leather', 'Myrrh', 'Powdery Notes']

name: eau-de-pamplemousse-rose
detail: With its classical approach that emphasizes the vivacity and sparkling freshness of citrus fruits  this fragrance stands out thanks to its very modern composition and its refined floral notes. In a perfect alchemy of raw materials  the fruit dictates the colour in delicious complicity with a flower used as a light veil. Rose-pink grapefruit and rose  the subtle nuances in the worlds shift in the twinkling of any eye and… of a nose  the better to reinvent a form that has endless different resources.

name: alfa-romeo-blue-1
detail: Alfa Romeo Blue is dedicated to a charming  daring man with a free spirit and a lover of challenges. An invitation to travel and to experience new adventures. An expression of a free-spirited but truly masculine energy.

name: sunkissed-hibiscus
detail: Inspired by the mesmerising Voodoo Queen Hibiscus  Sunkissed Hibiscus captures the allure of this striking flower and the luminosity of a brilliant sunset.

name: smoked-plum-leather
detail: "I love riding horses in Montana every summer  and I've bottled so many incredible scents; from the warmth of the sun hitting the saddle  to the smoke that signals the end of each day. This warm  earthy  sophisticated fragrance instantly revives those memories " Jo Malone MBE.

name: uomo-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: Trussardi Uomo fragrance expresses a sophisticated elegance. A virile and modern fragrance to wear with style  Trussardi Uomo is the quintessence of soft masculinity.

name: handbook-for-the-recently-deceased
detail: A strange and unusual aura of ether  ghostly old pages  magic chalk and spectral fumes dosed with funerary incense.

name: jasmine-absolute
detail: Inspired by the most seductive summer nights.

name: cedre-1
detail: "Like a pastry made of wood. Another take on Féminité for an alternate reality. True to its name  it contains cedar  to which honey is the key. But I have added tuberose  barely perceptible but of paramount importance " Serge Lutens.

name: cheeky-smile-1
detail: A cocktail of engaging notes inspired by acid house beats.
ingredients: ['Amber Xtreme (Woody Ambery)', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Ambroxan (Ambergris)', 'Ambrocenide (Woody ambery)']

name: dawn-30971
detail: Energising and revitalising  Dawn is a powerful and confident blend designed to seize the day.

name: vanille-orient
detail: Vanille Orient is an ethereal and sensual fragrance that can be described as a symphony in four movements on the theme of vanilla.

name: oriana
detail: A cloud of joy. A delicate  airy fragrance like a linen dress. A nostalgic pleasure. An addictive world of indulgence. Oriana is the story of a heroine with character and a hypnotic scent.

name: cuba-orange
detail: Cuba Orange is designed to make you the centre of attention. Its unforgettable composition displays confidence  seduction  and coveted style.

name: lafayette-street-1
detail: It's about time! For 19 years  Bond No. 9's been headquartered right around the corner from Lafayette Street  yet only now  with this once unsung thoroughfare in revival mode  are we naming an eau de parfum after it! But trust us  this smooth scent was worth the wait!

name: woody-black
detail: This perfume gives you a feeling of ultimate energy all day long with light incense  soft carnation  and cedarwood; a true feeling satisfaction.
ingredients: ['Ambrocenide (Woody ambery)', 'Fresh Cut Grass', 'Saffron', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Calone (Marine)', 'Cardamom', 'Clove', 'Musk', 'Clary Sage', 'Tobacco Leaf', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Green Leaves']

name: charlotte-aux-fraises-1
detail: Charlotte aux Fraises is a delicious scent that will seduce just like the cake bearing the same name.

name: lilac-wine
detail: Distinguished and mysterious. "Lilac wine is sweet and heady  like my love " James Shelton  Songwriter  1949.

name: vetiver-patchouli-1
detail: A tribute to sophistication  whose freshness cannot mask the voluptuousness of its hypnotic scent. Bold notes combine with sweetness  a magnetic warmth to give this fragrance a very masculine  vegetal depth.

name: note-vanillee-nectar
detail: Even more intense  gourmand and suave  Note Vanillée Nectar creates a case of rare elegance for an exceptional bourbon vanilla.

name: santal-kardamon
detail: Assemblage of sandalwood in two different extractions  brightened by a radiant and spicy green cardamom signature.

name: golden-myrrh
detail: The bold Golden Myrrh eau de parfum boasts a rich and woody personality  composed of unforgettable and sensual notes  complemented by a mysterious trail of its eponymous myrrh.

name: tobacco-oud-1
detail: Private Blend Tobacco Oud explores a secret history of addictive Arabian passions  crafting fragrances from precious oud wood and aromatic smoking tobacco.

name: mandarine-eau-des-bienfaits
detail: Let yourself be carried away by notes of lemon and mandarin for a toning  invigorating and refreshing stay!

name: acqua-di-parma-leather-1
detail: A unique leather accord that creates a rich sensory experience; a surprising fragrance from the start  bright and unusual.

name: magic-fizz
detail: Magic Fizz is a hymn to purity. Like a recharge of emotional energy  the fragrance makes life lighter and sparkling.

name: miss-edge
detail: Miss Edge is a fresh and lively fragrance that captures the youthful spirit of a modern woman whose charm and elegance are inimitable. She is elegance. She is ambition. She is Miss Edge.

name: ylang-ylang-espresso
detail: For the rebels. The thinkers. And leaders. A powerful fragrance with its own electric current. A surprisingly modern blend.

name: eau-de-strawberry-birthday-cake
detail: The mellow cream and the soft strawberries of this smooth scent will envelop you in happiness.

name: french-flower
detail: The intoxicating scent of a field of tuberose at night.

name: salty-wood
detail: Salty Wood is a wonderfully salty kiss that lets you drift away to infinity.

name: 401-cedre-prune-confite-vanille
detail: 401 CÈDRE PRUNE CONFITE VANILLE is a game of seduction! Play to win!

name: la-victorie-intense-1
detail: Live the happiness of each moment intensely with La Victorie Intense.

name: perry-ellis-midnight-1
detail: An uplifting and intoxicating scent of masculinity and sophistication.

name: poire-santal-blanc
detail: This fragrance evokes the relaxing evenings of Carlotha Ray's designer Mariela  surrounded by books in her library  and encapsulates rest and meditation.

name: patchouli-dangkor-1
detail: Angkor - Its sculptural temples  intertwined with millennia trees  mix with the mysterious patchouli and its essence with many virtues.

name: romance-eau-de-parfum-intense
detail: Ralph Lauren invites you on an adventure with Romance Intense  a fragrance curated for those who live fearlessly and love passionately.

name: e-pur-si-muove-1
detail: A scent that pays homage to the incredible mind of Galileo Galilei  who brought us the infinitely large and the infinitely small  telescopes and microscopes. An olfactory mirror with the added sensation of being unique in the universe.

name: rose-prick
detail: "The prick of a rose. The slight pain that produces such sensual pleasure. Inspired by my own rose garden  Rose Prick is a wild bouquet of heady  rare hybrids. Crisp and pristine. Warm and sensual. A heady bouquet of flowers in pink perfection. The danger of being so close to beauty heightens the seductive power of Rose Prick " Tom Ford.

name: cafe-verde-1
