detail: With carefully selected ingredients and exclusive designs from artists that enhance Brazil  our high quality products reflect the natural and cultural wealth that Brazil has. Café Verde is the fruit of the collaboration with Renata Moura  a designer known for her work  retro  playful and emotional.

name: la-nuit-tresor-musc-diamant-2019
detail: La Nuit Trésor Diamant Blanc is undoubtedly the most luminous  radiant and poetic perfume of the entire collection. It evokes a carnal embrace in the early morning  as passionate love is suddenly illuminated by the whiteness of dawn. White Diamond Treasure Night evokes an absolute love between two beings who are simultaneously attracted to each other like two magnets.

name: hundred-silent-ways-x
detail: Hundred Silent Ways X is a deliciously captivating fragrance that combines the elegance of floral notes with the richness of gourmand accords.

name: today-tomorrow-always-the-moment-for-her
detail: Relive your most precious moment of love with Today Tomorrow the Moment for Her. This fragrance captures your most special moments with your love in a bottle and transports you back in time so you can live them endlessly.

name: maxima-1
detail: A heavenly fantasy awaits you as you immerse yourself in its mystery  enveloped by the sweet and illustrious aromas. With a sparkling and unforgettable entry  the radiant divinity and sheer brilliance of the floral bouquet of blossoming petals at the heart will fill you with power. With a supreme statement  the drydown adds temptation and warmth along with an intoxicating sweetness that amplifies the dream of heavenly heaven fragrance with its mystical sensuality.

name: nassak
detail: The Nassak diamond is the muse. Also known as the "Eye of the Idol"  this large  deep blue diamond (43.83 carats) was mined in India in the 15th century and was the original third eye of the deity of the Shiva temple at Nassak.

name: agua-de-loewe
detail: A sensory  timeless and universal fragrance. A unisex scent  without artifice  with the pleasure and luxury of simple ways as a guide.

name: iso-gamma-super-1
detail: A fascinating scent  this fragrance is enchanting on its own or as an amazing amplifier of other fragrances. The woody scent is smooth  clean and addictive. Created via green chemistry  this unique synthetic note is allergen-free.

name: chance-eau-de-toilette-1
detail: A decidedly young scent for those who dare to dream. The Chance Eau de Toilette woman is a young woman who embraces life with passion and enthusiasm  believes in her lucky star  and reaches for happiness and adventure. Innocent and determined  impetuous and dreamy  unreasonable but not without reason  she is unpredictable and utterly romantic.

name: arsene-lupin-1
detail: Created by perfumer Jean-Paul Guerlain who no doubt identifies with Arsène Lupin  a great seducer of women  but also a man of the shadows  like perfumers for the most part are or prefer to be.
ingredients: ['Guaiac Wood', 'Cardamom', 'Pink Pepper', 'Sandalwood', 'Incense / Olibanum', 'Clary Sage', 'Violet', 'Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Ciste Labdanum', 'Leather', 'Palisander Rosewood', 'Patchouli']

name: berlinher
detail: The grey city has exuberantly rediscovered its colour with spray-paint attacks. From the somewhat austere Bahaussian architecture come the heavy metal sounds of music absorbed by concrete. Behind the threshold of a door  we pass from the icy desert of the dark road to the excitement of a room where partying and freedom reign. Soon it will be dawn and we hear Marlene Dietrich singing. In the ruins of Berlin  trees and flowers perfume our path...

name: armani-eau-de-cedre-1
detail: An elegant and sophisticated men's fragrance inspired by the scent of a man's velvet jacket that is soft  delicate and utterly elegant.

name: bvlgari-man-rain-essence
detail: With Rain Essence  Bulgari explores the regenerative energy of water  captured in the transformative power of rain. Like that magical moment when the last raindrop falls and everything looks different  Bulgari Man Rain Essence is an invitation to experience the force of this natural phenomenon through a fresh  invigorating mineral signature.

name: mandarino-1
detail: "Mandarin is the most cheerful of all citrus fruits. When I want to give my fragrances a radiant smile (and I often do)  I use mandarin essence. It can be used on its own  but it is also compatible with all fragrances and gives them the smile you want to have on a particular day. Plus  it's long lasting. So smile! You have been perfumed"  Jean-Claude Ellena  Perfumer.

name: boum-1
detail: Dare to pull the pin from Boum  and your love will explode and engulf all with its sweet and sensual charm.

name: blood-cedar
detail: Wild  woody  lushly green and resinous. We’ve created a fragrance that fully evokes the feral aspects of the forest.

name: cedarwood-2
detail: Cedarwood is an opulent and elegant fragrance with a veil of mystery. It is part of the Museum Collection  which uses classic raw materials and olfactory families from Europe and Asia  reminiscent of the fragrance library of an ancient perfumer.

name: breeze-lavanda-light-1
detail: Breeze Lavender Light is a fresh  soft and summery fragrance that will make you feel effortlessly comfortable.

name: orange-flowers
detail: The sparkling citrus combination of the top notes of Orange Flowers is infused with a complex floral heart. The base of woody  gourmand notes provides a long-lasting veil on the skin.

name: celestial-jasmine
detail: Celestial Jasmine is a romantic and tender fragrance with a sensual base.

name: ylang-in-gold-nectar-1
detail: As soon as this sunny nectar comes into contact with the skin  soft accords are revealed  evoking a subtle elegance with exotic accents.

name: vanille-7
detail: In composing Vanille  Mona di Orio imagined a romantic backstory of an old ship of yesteryear sailing to Madagascar or the Comoro Islands with a precious cargo. Amidst this elegant orchestral arrangement of notes is the key ingredient of Vanilla  the pulpy  sensual creaminess of a split vanilla pod  right in front of your nose. Delicious.

name: frenchy-lavande-le-frenchy
detail: "This lavender-verbena duet  formerly known as Le Frenchy  echoes the similar composition written by Aimé Guerlain in 1872. I have made it more modern  sophisticated  and urban with the presence of tonka and vetiver " Thierry Wasser  Perfumer.

name: cacharel-pour-lhomme
detail: Audacity and elegance. Strength and serenity. Cacharel pour l'Homme is a burning fresh fragrance  intrepid and refined.

name: tonka-sesame
detail: A toasty scent that is delectable  delicious and smells good enough to eat. A medley of nuts all succulently roasted in unison.

name: peony-white-musk
detail: An essence that expresses sensuality  passion and joy for life.

name: betty-barclay-wildflowers
detail: Just like a wildflower that seeks its own way to grow in places that others  and perhaps even itself  would never have imagined possible  the Betty Barclay Wild Flower fragrance inspires its wearers to go their own way with confidence  to stay true to themselves and to surpass their own selves in their everyday lives: curious  courageous and inspiring.

name: oriental-flowers-1
detail: The sublime freshness of Oriental notes  followed by the essences of citrus and a rich bouquet of flowers are sustained by the bewitching Balsam in the base for lasting richness.

name: narciso-eau-neroli-ambree-1
detail: Narciso Eau Neroli Ambrée celebrates the nature of attraction and the fine art of seduction with a vibrant  unique femininity and a fresh luminosity. A continued tribute to the seductive powers of the sun  the fragrance evokes a woman’s aura with a rare intensity and a vibrant warmth.

name: rive-dambre
detail: “In reading about the Orient's rituals and history  I became entranced with the refined art of gift-giving. Rive d'Ambre is inspired by the tradition of presenting precious citrus fruits as gifts. True to my nature  the sparkling fruits are wrapped in rich and warm sensuality ” Tom Ford.

name: rose-gold-7
detail: Rose Gold  is a golden  velvety  and very luxurious scent  worn  depending on the mood  time of day  or the occasion. A composition made with high-quality ingredients  intended for both men and women.

name: cinnamon-cedarwood
detail: This warm  sensual scent is like a road trip on the route of spices

name: eau-de-neroli
detail: A refreshing and soothing fragrance with sweet and floral notes.

name: live-in-love-paris
detail: Live in Love Paris is a peaceful respite of spring-summer meadows.

name: mon-jasmin-noir-leau-exquise
detail: Full of sparkles  Mon Jasmin Noir L'Eau Exquise is a new fresh floral interpretation of the Eau de Parfum. This Eau de Toilette reveals a Jasmine Eau that captures the vitality of the Mediterranean garden  where luxurious nature meets fresh and gushing fountains.

name: i-am-extrait
detail: Her sensual  tender sillage charms and captivates. She is mysterious and dreamy—she is every woman. She is THE woman.

name: tangier-vanille-dor-1
detail: Tangier Vanille d'Or opens with a sparkle and a touch of velvet succulence  the mark of pure opulence. At the heart  an irresistible aroma is delicate  paired with a power to become positively hypnotic to awaken and evoke a mysterious warmth. The background moves like the seas surrounding Tangier delivering a sensuality of ever-enveloping luminosity for a modern sense of addiction.

name: iridium-1
detail: This fragrance is the equivalent of charcoal coloured cashmere; possessing all the powdery sophistication from the precious iris concrete yet with a strong silvery spine.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Iris / Orris', 'Juniper Berries', 'Vetiver', 'Angelica', 'Carrot Seeds']

name: choice-of-champions-be-strong
detail: Choice of Champions Be Strong is the perfect fragrance for champions. With notes that exude confidence and power  it is ideal for intimidating the opponent  bringing more certainty to victory. Developed for true boxing champions  it is the perfect essence to take boxing beyond.

name: rondo-armaniano-2023
detail: A joyous woody aromatic citrus  combining brightness and singular intensity.

name: accord-violet-1
detail: Accord Violet is a fragrance designed for the innately sensual woman who knows exactly what she wants and how to get it. A delicious bouquet featuring peach and blackcurrant that rest voluptuously on a spicy-floral heart of clove  violet and jasmine. The fragrance mellows with a base of sensual Tuberose with vanilla and patchouli providing warmth and longevity.

name: lemon-meringue
detail: Lemon Meringue is a bright and bold full-bodied lemon scent without any of the bitterness or shrillness that lemon can have. It has creamy vanilla undertones without becoming sugary or sweet. The fresh lemon cream is the star of this beautifully balanced fragrance.

name: kate-spade-new-york-eau-de-parfum
detail: Kate Spade New York is a joyful scent that celebrates women and their sense of individuality. The modern fragrance portrays the vibrant and clever essence of Kate Spade that women around the globe know and love.

name: rose-magnetic-by-sophie-labbe
detail: The most sensual of all the flowers displays all its facets in this creation  joyful  addictive and modern at the same time.

name: eau-de-rochas-orange-horizon
detail: Eau de Rochas Orange Horizon invites you to a fragrant escape on the Mediterranean Riviera  around a sparkling  juicy and sunny orange.

name: cherry-blossom-7
detail: No flower in nature marks the birth of early spring like the cherry blossom – delicate and light  the cherry blossom is not just a flower; It is at the centre of this spectacle that nature provides each year  flowering trees that unfold their miraculous sight at the slightest breath.

name: 110th-anniversary-2021
detail: An exclusive limited-edition scent that celebrates the essence of Fila through its most iconic symbol. A scent that is for everyone but who sticks to the rules. The only kind of fragrance that is by its very nature unisex  not easy to label or put under any type of constraint  yet easy to adapt and fit the skin of who is wearing it.
ingredients: ['Iso E Super (Cedarwood Note)', 'Cedarwood', 'Ice Cube Effect', 'Ambermax (Woody ambery)', 'Amber', 'Musk']

name: polo-earth-moroccan-neroli
detail: Moroccan Neroli captures the very essence of neroli in all its floral and aromatic intensity.

name: kuwait-parfum-1
detail: “Kuwait is one of the most ancient lands on earth  famed for its love of family and friendships  and the happiness of its people. I decided that I would start with a note that makes us all happy  Vanilla  which is as soft and warm as a greeting from somebody you love.” - Roja Dove.
ingredients: ['Ciste Labdanum', 'Ambergris', 'Sandalwood', 'Benzoin', 'Tonka Bean', 'Vanilla', 'Oud / Agarwood', 'Birch', 'Cashmeran (Woody musky)', 'Civet', 'Leather', 'Musk', 'Oakmoss', 'Patchouli', 'Rhubarb', 'Saffron', 'Cedrat', 'Geranium', 'Heliotrope', 'Orange Blossom', 'Peach', 'Rosemary', 'Violet', 'Blackcurrant Bud', 'Jasmine (Grasse)', 'Rose (Grasse)']

name: rose-in-wonderland-1
detail: Capturing the delicate scent of a rose garden in full bloom on a summery morning with the dew drops glistening on the petals  Atkinsons Rose in Wonderland is a joyous and radiant eau de parfum.

name: hot-couture-eau-de-parfum-1
detail: Hot Couture is a creation that aims to complement the woman's body  combining sensuality and glamour with refinement and elegance. Hot Couture is a voluptuous fragrance with spicy and woody notes.

name: jasmins-marzipane
detail: “The fragrance stands out with its lively yet enveloping femininity  making its trail deliciously irresistible ” Blend by Dominique Ropion.

name: iris-des-champs
detail: An olfactory interpretation of the iris flower that will make whoever smells it feel as if he was taking a walk in a blossoming field of irises  in the Tuscany countryside  on a beautiful spring day.
ingredients: ['Iris / Orris', 'Pink Pepper', 'Woody Notes', 'Lily Of The Valley', 'Rose', 'Ylang-ylang', 'Jasmine (Sambac)', 'Amber', 'Bergamot', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood', 'Vanilla']

name: good-fortune
detail: With Good Fortune  Viktor & Rolf set out to create a fragrance that expresses modern spirituality and resonates with those who are on an inner journey to discover the essence of their being. The fragrance is an invitation to those who wish to embrace their inner modern mystic  follow their own path and trust their own innate power.

name: pamplelune
detail: Pamplelunechispeante and lively  it flows from its generous and tender sun-kissed flesh like an exotic juice  freshly squeezed and chilled before melting into a delicious blend of patchouli and vanilla.

name: bergamotto-di-calabria
detail: Bergamotto di Calabria pays tribute to the citrus essence by capturing the warmth of the sun rays.

name: vanille-fleur
detail: Vanille Fleur can be described as a four-movement symphony on the theme of vanilla.

name: vanilla-powder
detail: "Vanilla is a raw material I've always wanted to include in the Matiere Premiere collection. This fragrance is a dark refined vanilla. Its dark richness meets an explosion of white modern powders " Aurélien Guichard  Founder and Perfumer.

name: santal-de-mysore-1
detail: Sandalwood. Found long ago in the perfume coffer of Alexander the Great. Legendary perfumery wood  mythic  mysterious  the sandalwood tree. Some fifty years are needed for the full flowering of the sandalwood tree; only then does it completely transmit its true perfume. The heart of the wood is the most intensely fragrant. Once it is cut  it develops a red-brown colour.

name: bien-etre-eau-de-cologne-a-la-fleur-doranger
detail: An energetic scent that will dazzle you.

name: infusion-de-fleur-doranger-1
detail: A delicate and charming fragrance with the orange blossom absolute  neroli and the luxurious and voluptuous jasmine. A fresh and irreverent parfum emphasised by sparkling Mandarin water.

name: plein-fatale-rose
detail: A seductive scent for the self-confident woman who wants to be the heroine of her life.

name: peony-silk-1
detail: Experience the flows of delicate florals embracing themselves around smooth warm woods with Peony Silk. Allow the romantic temptations of this perfume to dance on the skin throughout the day for lasting  empowering wear.
